title: Does anyone want to write their heart out here? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve always tried to give my best in friendship or relationship, but none reciprocated even half of what I did for them. It is something that’s hurting me today. It feels as if all my wounds have become fresh once again. People can’t get away with all the shit they threw on me with a mere ‘sorry’. Years of suffering can’t be washed away with a mere ‘sorry’. You can’t break me and then tell me to be happy.  Actually, I’m done with giving people innumerable chances. I gave someone three chances, only to get cheated later. I gave one of my friend infinte chances only to not get chosen in the end. I wonder why the damn people beg for another chance when they don’t even have a pinch of respect for that another chance or for the foundation of relationship that we are sharing. I wonder why people shower with mushy talks and false promises when in reality they don’t even mean it. The more chances I give, more I get disappointed. The more I get disappointed, more I get skeptical of connecting to new people. Yes, I’m skeptical. But it’s the only way to save myself from furthur damage and infidelity. I’ve survived bad phase of my life all alone with no one’s help or support and I’m proud of it. At least, I’m content that I have never wronged anyone both in friendship or relationship so far. Not even to those who once broke me completely. But I am sorry. I’m done being played and manipulated. I don’t care who you are, or the years of friendship we have shared but I’m done with giving another chance!

I fell in love with someone, and we got our happy ending. Emphasis on the "ending." But also on "happy." I met my boyfriend just a few months before high school ended. We were two shy kids in the same economics class. We slowly fell in love. He asked me to senior prom, his first and last school dance (he's an introvert). He was my first boyfriend, and I was his first girlfriend. It was very special. Unfortunately, we are heading off to different colleges this fall (after just 4 months of us dating). On top of that, just weeks after summer break began, I went on vacation to Asia for more than a month. So while we were together for 3 months, we virtually have been physically together for only 2 months. I know 2–3 months seems very trivial, but it wasn't. We made many beautiful memories and were falling more and more in love. It was extra special since this was the first relationship for both of us, so we were learning many new things and experiencing love for the first time, together. Anyway, we briefly talked about our relationship plans for college, and we came to a light agreement that we'd stay together. We did not know what that meant until I went off to Asia and we got a taste of what long distance relationship would feel like. It was hard. Very hard. I was so used to seeing him every single day at school. Once summer break began, we saw each other every other day. So being apart from him for more than a month was, to say the least, extremely difficult. I missed him a lot and couldn't wait to see him again. I started worrying about how much harder it would be in college. And honestly, his lack of showing affection through texting and facetiming had made me quite upset at times. Sometimes I felt like he lacked emotion and care for me, or for anything really. That was hard for me to accept, as I'm a very emotional and affectionate person. I wondered if it was because he didn't like me as much as I liked him or he just wasn't as invested in our relationship as I was. Little did I know that he had depression. I found out a while after I got back from my vacation. When we were reunited, we hugged like there was no tomorrow. We were both absolutely ecstatic to be together again. We had a great time that day. I even spent the night at his house. And then, things started to downfall. He wasn't texting me as much, which I just sort of brushed off since he's not a big texter so we usually didn't text much. But my concern grew bigger when he wasn't asking me to hang out again when it's been days (and in my mind, we should be hanging out a lot since I finally got back home!). I asked him if he could FaceTime one night; he said he was going to the gym but that he could try to afterwards. Nothing. No call, no text, no nothing. I figured that he might have forgotten about it and just went to bed since he usually comes home from the gym pretty late. But I was still very concerned since he usually always calls/texts me back. He wasn't the type to forget things like this… was he just ignoring me? Well, we had made plans a while ago to go to a movie-in-the-park kind of thing that was coming up soon. After waiting to hear from him (and get an explanation for him not calling me that night), I finally called him to ask if he still wanted to go to the movie. I didn't talk about anything else. He said "yeah," but he seemed a bit disconnected. I said that I felt like he didn't want to hang out with me, and he asked "how come?" I just said "I don't know… am I wrong?" All he said was "yeah." I just let it go and said I'll see him tomorrow then. When he picked me up, we said hey. But he didn't smile at me like he did every time he saw me. Something was clearly off. We didn't even talk for the majority of the ride. He wouldn't talk much or smile at me when I tried to start a conversation. I felt so disconnected. When we got to the movie, I confronted him. I asked him if something's wrong. He said no. I told him that I felt like he didn't have feelings for me anymore. He said "oh." That's it. I asked if he had anything else to say. "No," he said. I gave up. He was not the guy I knew and fell in love with. He had changed into a completely different, cold person. Throughout the entire movie, I was frantically trying to think of possible reasons for his behavior. I couldn't find anything. The last time I saw him, just a week ago, we were so in love and happy. What could have gone wrong? He dropped me off at home that night. We didn't talk much during this car ride either. I cried silently while facing my window because I reminisced on how we used to be and on my memories of when he was so sweet and kind and loving to me. When we got to my house, I told him to park the car. I was determined to get an answer. He knew I was serious. I asked, "you don't like me anymore, do you?" He seemed a bit startled, like he didn't know what to say. He just shrugged. I repeated my question. A tear dropped down my face. When he saw it, it was like he snapped out of it and suddenly became really concerned by the fact that I was crying. He put his arm over me and asked if I was okay. I just kept crying, he was rubbing his hand on my neck to comfort me. I repeated my question once again. He still didn't say anything. I asked him, "can I ask why?" He looked really uncomfortable, as if he was slightly panicking because he didn't know how to act in this situation. I asked, "was I being too clingy?" He didn't respond. I asked if it was because of what would be the most probable reason: college. And yes, that was the right answer. He said, "yeah, I don't think college is going to work.." He said it very solemnly. When he said those words, it hit me very painfully. But I remained composed; after all, it's expected. I called him out on how he treated me that day. He apologized and said he didn't want me to feel bad. He was being genuine, I saw it in his eyes. I said that even though I knew that college long distance wouldn't work for us, that I still love him a lot. I told him that I would like to spend the rest of the time we have, together. And that's when he broke the news to me. Boy did I not expect to hear this from him. He said, "There's actually something I have to tell you. Only my family knows." I gulped. "While you were away, I was diagnosed with depression and anxiety." When he said that, my heart dropped. All of a sudden, everything made sense. How he seemed so emotionally numb and absent-minded all the time. Then I felt like a villain. Flashbacks stormed my head of the few times I got very upset at him because of super trivial things. And how I assumed that he didn't care for me and that he'd never faced adversity in his life like I did. I swear, I thought he had a perfect life. I thought he was happy. I immediately hugged him. I couldn't say anything to him other than that I was so sorry. He said, "it's ok, it's ok. It's not your fault." He's been getting therapy and taking medication. "I'm focusing on that right now.." he said. Which I knew basically meant that he didn't have the leisure to date someone right now. I understood, and I respected that. After all, how could he love me and try to make me happy when he doesn't even love himself or isn't happy himself? I'm sure he had a hard time juggling with that. Because a relationship is a two-way street. Both people should be happy and should be able to make the other happy too. I just kept crying, and he asked if I wanted to hug. I immediately said yes. As we broke apart, he kissed me on my cheek. It reminded me that we're breaking up, yes, but we're breaking up with love. And that made me very happy. I kissed him back. I saw his face as I left the car and closed the door; he looked very dark and… sad. It was my first time seeing him look so sad like that. That's the story of my first love. It's been a couple of weeks since I last saw him. Life has been tough for me. I am heartbroken, and I even feel miserable at times. I miss him very much. But hey, if we're meant to be, then we'll be meant to be. I guess I'll just sit back and let life take its course. Meanwhile, I wish the absolute best for him. I still love, cherish, and care about him so much. He will always remain special in my heart. I will always love him.

This is an entry in my journal Lately in HOPE Squad. We've been talking about "Why Me?" Why do I have trials and why do I have these specific trials.So I'm going to answer that question. Why Me?Why did (and probably still do) I struggle with depressionWhy can't I explain my emotions to my familyWhy do I procrastinate? Because of my faith, I am told that the Lord God gives us trials to test us. That this whole life is one big final exam. But I want to throw that out for a moment. Like the Kelly Clarkson song, I believe that trials are given to us to make us stronger, to make us more resilient to the world. I honestly don't know why I struggled with depression other than God wanted me to experience it. I can say with most certainty that I am a naturally closed off person. I find venting my anger on technology and with close friends to be more effective than talking to my parents about things. It's just the way I am. As to why I procrastinate. I recently listened to a TED Talk by a guy named Tim Urban. He said that in the mind of a non-procrastinator, they have a rational decision maker controlling their brain.A procrastinator's mind has the same rational decision maker just with a first mate along for the ride.Its name is the Instant Gratification Monkey. Now the Instant Gratification Monkey is quiet for most of the time, but when you really decide to be productive... Ooh your new favorite YouTuber released a new video today. Or ooh that news article looks intriguing let's read it. The monkey takes control of the wheel and suddenly 3 hours have passed and you haven't gotten a single thing done. It's not until you're nearing a deadline that the Panic Monster gets the monkey off the wheel and guides you to where you need to be. I have been trying hard not to let my inner demons and that monkey control my life but sometimes it's just so hard to. That's my "Why Me?" story

Yes, I do. I spent most of my life in daydreams that led nowhere in order to escape an extreme case of bullying during much of my childhood. I ended up making a bucket list out of it and have attempted to cross off the list I made when I was thirteen. I was looking back at the list today and broke into sobs. I failed myself. This was my list, it's very short… Be married by eighteen and have two babies, or girls. I'm thirty and never been even in a relationship that lasted more then six months.Publish a book and get famous. Technically if I erase the last part, I can check it off. I did publish a book that I love. It's dark, depressive, scary, and traumatic…just like me. I hear good things from those who read it but I never been good at marketing and I have no idea how to promote it more. I learned it takes generally seven novels to get enough money to be able to work part time so that is my new goal.Dont be a virgin when I'm thirty. I accomplished this oneBe a slut for a day-dont ask. Apparently, little me wanted to sleep around. Maybe she thought by sleeping around I wont end up alone. Well, jokes on her, I'm still alone.Don't be raped. A teacher pointed me out in class in the fourth grade saying I'll most likely be raped. It scared me back then definitely since sex only ends in three scenarios: STD, rape/murder, or pregnancy. I know think the teacher never experienced a good lay and was bitter about only having disappointing sex and took it off on a fourth grade class.Have lots of friends. When you go from zero friends, dreaming about being popular is amazing.Dont commit suicide.Get rich…I laugh about this one. It'll never happen.Get big boobs…damn child me…That's it. That is all a sixth grade child wanted out of life. I was shocked to see how dark this list was. I have accomplished probably four out of the nine. The only thing I'm proud of is that I published a novel I wanted to write. The rest…I wished at times I did die. I wished I did get ran over by that tractor when I was four. However, I made it to adulthood, and I am happy about that. I still dont expect to live to old age. I still think I'm going to end up murdered like the teacher told me in the fourth grade. I was almost kidnapped more then once and had a couple of stalkers so I guess it could be PTSD talking but it is a feeling I remember having since childhood, that’ll I will be killed. I look at the list and I can see my very blonde self sitting on the monkey bars and staring over the fence of my school and overlooking what used to just be a field. I remember my best friend sitting next to me, chatting about movies and starting a band together. I remember my other friend still alive. I remember my classmate with her ten toes (she would lose eight in a lawnmower accident which was really not a accident. Her dad purposely ran over her toes). I remember the two mean brothers who lived on my street and whose father committed suicide after being found out to be a pedophile, I remember my bullies getting ready to climb up the bars to throw me off. I can remember being young and naive and too hopeful that I trusted too easily. I remember the nice teacher assistant who spent time trying to motivate me to try in both school and life. I remember crying when I woke up every morning and realized I survived the night and that meant I had to go to school only to be emotionally abused by nearly the whole population at school. I remember my own teacher calling my parents to pick me up to give me a day break of the abuse. I remember my mom and dad begging me to let them move me to another school and I declining every time because I didnt Want to let them win. I didnt want my bullies to know they beat me down. I remember when I stopped feeling accepted in society and that it took four years for me to give up on people. It has taken me twelve plus years to trust people and even now, the first time they lie, our relationship will never be the same, again. I remember thinking my adulthood would be better then my childhood. I still stupidly think it'll get better. I'll give it another five years and then I'll give up. I don't care about being rich or famous, I just want to know I made a difference, even to just one person.

Well firstly i wrote this answer being anonymous now i am writing it with my account! I wrote it previously to question https://www.quora.com/What-is-the-most-emotional-picture-youve-ever-seen/answers/122214111?ch=3&share=b2b91624&srid=ugrzf  Who is she? What happened to her!! U all might be thinking! Actually she's a seven year old girl who was found in a public park in delhi before she was raped and murdererd brutally and her face was completely destroyed! Ashamed of humanity? According to reports // before her postmorte Less than 12 hours after she went missing from her house, the body of a seven-year-old girl was found inside a park in outer Delhi’s Nihal Vihar Sunday morning, police said. While her limbs were tied together and two ropes were found dangling from her neck when her relatives found her, police suspect she died of an injury to her head caused by some “blunt object”. Seju P Kuruvilla, deputy commissioner of police (outer Delhi), said even though the girl’s clothes were found to be intact, the police are waiting for the autopsy report to ascertain whether she was sexually assaulted. Maintaining that a murder case under IPC section 302 has been registered at Nihal Vihar, the officer maintained that the probe was still its preliminary stage and there was no clue about either the killer or the motive behind the murder. This is the fourth incident in the last 20 days wherein bodies of girls or women have been found in the national Capital. On January 27, a six-year-old girl’s body was found stuffed in a sack and dumped near her home in Samaypur Badli. On January 19, the body of an unidentified minor girl, with her throat slit, was found in a sack in central Delhi’s Daryaganj. Two days later, dismembered body parts of an unidentified woman was found in an agricultural field in outer Delhi’s Alipur. So far, all four crimes have remained unsolved. Elaborating further on Sunday’s crime, police said the girl who was murdered used to live with her parents and younger sister in Nihal Vihar and her father works at a factory. “The two girls were born to the family after lots of prayers. The younger one was born deaf and mute. The girl who was killed was a support to her parents,” the girl’s aunt said.  Reminiscing about the fateful 24 hours, the girl’s mother said that her two daughters left for the local market around 8pm on Saturday. “My younger daughter who is five years old wanted momos and was crying a lot. So I asked my elder one to accompany her,” said the girl’s mother. But suddenly, the elder girl went missing from the momo stall so the younger one returned home crying, the mother said, adding, “We immediately began searching for her but in vain. Around 10pm, we approached the local police.” Alleging that the police were not responsive, the girl’s aunt said, “Had the police searched for her actively, she would not have been killed.” But the DCP said a kidnapping case was registered at Nihal Vihar police station on Saturday night. “We searched all night but couldn’t trace her,” he said. On Sunday morning, the girl’s family again set out to look for her. “We visited the Nihal Vihar park. We found her body around 6.30am at a garbage-littered spot in the park,” said the girl’s aunt. “Her hands and legs were folded and tied together,” said the aunt. Are girls in our country so un safe? Or that 7 year olf was wearing a mini skirt and seducing men? I feel shame Save girl! Save humankind

About my Evil Mother. She doesn't have basic manners and discipline. Her suspecting attitude was apathetic and filled my childhood, adolescence with insecurity and hopeless. I was a helpless victim all my childhood constantly under abuse. My adolescence was worse. She started having an affair. And she wanted to get that guy married to me, so her affair would continue without glitches. My mom and her lover. Both would torture me. Their cruelty was beyond hell. To shift the focus from their affair, she diverted my dad's focus on me with complaints and allegations. She alleged that I have a boyfriend and I was characterless, so she could use the same reason to get me married soon to her lover. When I was in class 12. One day, My maths teacher took my help to write a letter to get her gas connection change of address since she shifted to new house. I tore two sheets out of my books to write a letter. I wrote two letters. One for practice and one final. Unfortunately, the practice letter was retained in my book. When I returned home, as usual. My bag and books were checked. They found the letter. The gas connection was on my teacher's husband's name. So, the letter was addressed with his name 'Venkatesh'. This was enough. My mom pinned stories around. She alleged that, It was the letter I wrote to help my lover when he shifted the house. My helpless cries fell on deaf ears. Though my teacher herself called to clarify that, my Evil mother didn't listen to it. Because she was so adamant to pin false stories and allegations on me. Poor naive me, was the victim to her evil nature and I failed class 12. I was traumatized. God's grace or my luck. I was saved from this torture by my grandmother and maternal uncle. They rescued me. They took me to their house and I stayed there for 2 years. Gave exams again after 2 years, I passed with 65%. It seemed like an achievement. Being college topper in class 11, struggling to get 65% became an achievement. Can't help. Because the trauma and abuse made me so weak, that I lacked confidence. It's okay.. at least I got an opportunity to go to college again. She forcefully took me back, though I was reluctant to leave my granny's place. I believed I will be treated well now at least. But didn't. Amidst trouble I studied, took part time teaching job to fund my studies because my parents didn't pay for my education. Almighty bestowed me with enough strength and will. I completed MBA, worked in a good organization, now I am happily married to a good person.

My dad once told me before “marry someone who love you not the one you love” Actually, i don’t know what does love mean and how do i know if i’m in love though i’m 25 years old, not a young girl anymore not pertty either. So i decided to let love a side and marry someone suitable anyway.. and here it comes the problem  Someone very suitable, at least in my family’eyes, asked to marry me . My family became very happy with the engagement and they started preparing everything for the upcoming wedding.. At first i refused the idea saying i’m not ready for a relationship and so on, but later i gave in with their insistance. After the engagement i behaved normaly like i do every day, i tried to adapt and not to forget about my fiance , then he began complaining about how i neglect him and i don’t look happy when he contacts me or comes to see me and so on .. I tried to make excuses saying that i wasn’t used to being in a relationship and i wasn’t used to having to look after someone else .. After that he complained again saying that if i wanted this engagement to continue, i had to change and let him feel that i really care about him , which wasn’t true on my side. I told him “ i’m not ready for a relationship” and broke the engagement . I told my family “ i feel nothing for him” and of course they didn’t like my answer as the engagement didn’t last long enough for me to feel anything . Now, they tell me that even we ,me and my ex-fiance, broke up 4 months ago he still wants to get back to me and try again , of course i refused. It’s not a matter of getting back to him or not sometime i just feel worried that i might end up all alone by myself so i should get back to him if there’s a chance. But then i say “no i’m absolutly fine alone i don’t need anyone” Am i wrong ? I don’t know all i know that i feel comfortable now Sorry for my boring story..

I belong to Pakistan, I am newlywed 3 months before, we had a court marriage first and then informed my husband’s family. My husband’s Family did not want us to get married so we opted for a court marriage. After this they accepted our marriage.My MIL didn’t accept me from heart. She is very religious but her behaviour with me is not good, she taunts me everyday. I'm pregnant too. My mother was divorced when I was 2 years old. My grandma and grandpa raised us(my siblings and me) as they were British citizens while my mom stayed at home in Pakistan with us. MIL always said that people are used to saying bad things about my mother that she is characterless in front of her guests. Today she did it again. I just got shattered. I belong to a very respectable family. No one thinks about my mother like that. My mother lives her life like a tigress. Everyone respects her. When she said that, I was shocked and didn't say anything to her. Just came to my room and started crying. My mom doesn't deserve that. I told this to my husband and said I don't wanna live there. He said everyone has separate room here. If you felt bad, go and tell her. I can't believe someone who is very religious, near to God, how she can hurt God’s creature. If I say something bad to her, what's the difference between me and her. I just wanted a shoulder to cry on. Just to tell my feelings. My husband is very good, loving. But I don't want to hurt him and I know he can't do anything, he'll just console me. Please pray for me and my child. Please pray that God gives me enough strength to protect me and my family.

I am a 68 year old father. Father to a son whom I lost , not physically but yes mentally socially emotionally. In the year 2010, my son had got admission in Aiims New Delhi.Like any other parent I was very happy. But all this was short lived.the freedom lent at Aiims, New Delhi turned my child into a drug addict. This drug and alcohol culture at Aiims is rampant. Classes I can't tell what they teach but as far as I have heard from current batches it is bad to worse. My son's friend who joined mamc is a budding surgeon now whereas my son is seeking psychiatric help. Trust me, I am not the only parent facing this. Plz share this post so that more and more people become wary not to send their child to this institute and be very cautious. From a depressed papa.

Yes I want to. Do you know what emotional trauma children go through the most? Watching mother's cry. Yes that's what is heart wrenching even when you are 6 or 16years. For obvious reasons, the latter age helps you understand that situation better for worse or better that's another question. No child will ever be able to forget who or what made their mother's cry. And I really mean it. I have seen my mother cry for days and nights For whole damn 2 years. Which made me question the word, Family. Being a child, I am not allowed to question them even after growing up. I still remember the helplessness I felt. I still remember having heard no apology for the trauma they made me and my mother go through. You know what, this 22 year old still remembers. I learnt one thing, if you have issues please talk and solve. Donot take it to the extreme end where a mother cannot even hold back her tears infront of her children. I literally beg all people out here, both mothers and people living with them. I understand there will be certain days when there will be glitches in the family. There will be times when moms will be at fault. All I ask of you is understand that a child cannot ever forget the tears of their mother. Be it because of their mother's fault or someone else's. I have been in that situation. I cannot forgo a single person even after 6 years. Everytime I see those people, I find myself standing by the days when their words had hurt my mother. I won't say don't, I just say this is what changes a child. It changed me.

The only thing I ask of you is to be patient with that man and treat him right. Treat him like a king that he deserve treat him way better than we treated each other. I don’t regret what happen in our lives. I came to realized everything happen for a reason.

Depression is just a little phase, and I don't think you're trying hard enough. That totally shook me. I mean, I've been in depression for months, been suicidal, have urges to cut myself suicidal and kill myself to end the suffering. But founding just a little ray of light, I'm walking on, carefully holding each piece of me, and then this person comes and speaks that and shatters my once-collected self again. And I believe that does happen with most of us suffering from this. Guys, I have just one request to you all: do whatever you wish to do, but please don't say such a sentence to a depressed person. Personally, I felt like life was moving so quickly and I was missing out on everything and I wasn't able to catch up, and there's no point in living anymore. You never know what can hurt a person's heart. You're completely oblivious. Depression might be a “phase”, but telling person to just “stop being lousy and get yourself together” is just like telling a cancer patient to remove the cancer on the spot. Makes no sense, right?

I never want to forget what I'm going to write here, but I feel like I need to get it out of my thoughts: Today I thought and reflected on all the possible things I could have had, and suddenly it was assessing my self-esteem, it was realistic, it had always been a big problem, everything about my self-esteem, as if I cared too much for others to think about Me like negative comments: "ugly, fat, tall, etc." All that kind of comments. You constantly ask yourself questions like: "I'll be enough" "Why am I having this?" "Why am I not sure?" And, probably, he forgot the most important things, he also kept away from the new things, simply because you think you're always going to fail, the thoughts started from i was teenager and at the beginning not My faults. It was just what others said and the things I received, until it stayed in my mind. It is very sad to think that we always evaluate the perception of oneself by comparing ourselves with others, and we believe that we did.. what we did? ... the comparisons are not healthy, unfortunately we always do it unconsciously. I completely changed my physical appearance in recent years, now I am a different person ... but even though sometimes those thoughts come back, it does not feel good to have ups and downs about self-love. No matter how much weight you lose, no matter how many things you do, it does not matter at all, but first I love myself, that will simply be useless. Being afraid and insecure is not fine, it is good to cry, it is good to feel pain, that makes us human. But I just want to leave those thoughts and start being completely happy. .. you can not live your life stagnant, it's not fair! I know it's not easy, but ake your time and have small changes daily. And block those thoughts from your mind. I HAVE FAITH ON YOU. RESPECT AND LOVE YOURSELF FIRST TO LOVE OTHERS. "Treat others as you would like them to treat you."

Nearly 45 years ago, a beautiful girl as my age goaded me into appearing in the Civil Services Exam. She had been herself preparing for the exam already for quite sometime. As I had an instant crush on the girl I was all too happy to go with her wish. Now on, our long sessions of preparation for the exam. began in right earnest. I, on my part, had a double mission or motive you can well understand - to pass the exam. and (consequently) realise my crush. One day while studying together our ‘Indian History’ subject at the lawns of some scenic place, as we stumbled upon a particular race, she began taking undue interest in the topic asking me questions like : Are these people really very valiant? Her facial expressions sought an affirmative answer. But I was stubborn, ‘No, they hadn’t ever won a single battle against the Mughals while my race had won many,’ I declared excitedly. Though she looked a little morose at my reply, I failed to realise that she did not relish my reply. And so it went- while my race was valiant, the one she referred to wasn’t. As I had taken up the preparation at a very belated stage, hardly three months before the exam., I had no time to prepare for my optional subjects. Under the circumstances I chose to appear in the compulsory subjects only to gain experience and then go wholehog the next year. To my joy, my marks in the compulsory subjects were impressive : Essay-112/150, English- 100 plus/150, GK-100 plus/150. The essay I wrote was - The economic and political impact of oil bomb. However, my crush who failed had other grand designs. In fact she had been in another such association all along with a boy of the so-called valiant race that I had belittled unintentionally and who had made into the allied services of the Central Services Exam.,a year or two earlier availing himself of the reservation quota. This is how my race went down fighting and the battle was won by the non-valiant without a fight. Today, I am an established grammarian to reckon with.

I’m afraid I might kill myself in the future. There are multiple reasons why I think that will happen. I think as soon as something tragic hits our family, which i’ve been feeling for a while to happen, I will fall into a greater depression than I’m currently in and just kick the bucket. Let me tell you why i feel like this will happen. I don’t think anyone knows i have a Quora account, so I really hope people that know me don’t find this out. It would just bring unnecessary attention. Reason 1: I have major anxiety problems that make my life a misery. I’m not a psychologist, so I can’t say for sure whether i have depression, generalized anxiety or something else. I’m afraid of going outside. Even a few steps. The tought that tomorrow I will have to go outside and be there for more than a while makes me sick in the stomach. My muscles get really tense, especially my leg and neck muscles. I can’t breathe properly. I’m afraid everyone watches me, since I’m reallllly skinny and my cheap worn off clothes don’t fit me well ever. Whenever i have to go to some new place I’ve never been with people I’ve never met I have major panic attacks. I feel like throwing up. I get pale. My stomach hurts. My hands get cold. My legs stiffen. This anxiety problem has gotten so bad in time. I am afraid to look for a job. I’m afraid volunteer, I’m afraid of anything new. When I’m with people I know, however, I calm myself down a little bit. I don’t feel 100% miserable which allows me to eat a little before a panic attack hits again. Another thing happens though. I have 0 energy. I can’t hold on conversations too long. I get really quiet. I just stay, staring into nothing and thinking. People noticed that too. They think I’m ignoring them because I’m too cool. Reason 2: I don’t fit in anywhere. Literally nowhere. Never have i felt like i fitted in. School, highschool, college. Nowhere. I don’t fit in anywhere. When I’m at some bar (which rarely happens) I feel like I’m an intruder. When i eat out somewhere, I feel like I don’t belong there.  Reason 3: I have few to no friends (which is connected to the previous reason). While I, as a person, prefer not having friends, I have just a few, 4 max, out of which only one lives in the same town, the others being scattered in the whole country. I don’t know what to say. My relationship with my friends has always been different from what your typical friendship looks like. We don’t go out. We don’t spend time together. We don’t talk like normal people about normal problems. It’s a cold relationship. I just wanna go out with people I share similar interests with, and have fun, spend time together, forget about how stressful life is. I’m not looking for a girlfriend. I don’t care about that much. I’ve already accepted I’ll probably never find someone to match me well anyway due to this crippling anxiety. Reason 4: I don’t have dreams. I don’t look into the future. I don’t have a dream job. I don’t have hobbies. I don’t look forward to tomorrow. I don’t wanna visit some cool place in some cool country. I don’t wanna “watch the sunset off of the cliff of Himalaya” or whatever. I barely have any energy to function let alone go to some place. I only have myself and the university. When I’m not at uni, I’m home alone. When I’m home alone i get stressed out because i don’t volunteer or get into any extra uni thing. My CV will suck. I will end up having a damned job. That’s just how things are in Bucharest. Everyone can get into uni. Anyone can finish it. It doesn’t matter to the manager all that much if you have a uni degree. He cares about extra. I am too anxious for extra. In the last 6 years i haven’t had a break. Yes, I did stay an awful amount of time at home. Is it a break? No. It isn’t. When you have nothing else to do but stay at home and wait for time to pass it’s not a break. It’s a prison. Reason 5: My family is sick. They never go to the hospital. I know they are sick. Headaches, back pains, body pains, memory loss, short attention span. My grandmas definitely are very sick both physically and mentally. When they will die, which i know it won’t be very long from now, sadly as it is, my parents will live a few years of peace finally. Never did they have peace ever in their lives. When they will be gone…idk. It will break me. Reason 6: You know how people think of getting mature fast, having a family, getting a dream job, getting a dream house and car growing up. I’m repeating myself, but i’ve never had those. Not even as a kid. I never wanted to grow up. When kids were going out to date and see each other I was still trying to be oblivious of anything and watch cartoons. Till i was 14 I not only looked extremely young but also acted extremely young. Then the high school kicked me self-esteem all over the place. I didn’t want to have to do stuff just for the sake of fitting in with the people. I didn’t want to start drinking, smoking party and fuck. While you could argue that, yes, you can fit in without having to do all these stuff let me explain. I’ve said i got major anxiety. It’s not new. I’ve had it my whole life. So, who did i have to spend my time with mostly. School colleagues. Who were they. People i didn’t choose myself to fit my ideas of friends. Of course, in order to not stand out I’d have to try at least to appeal to the loud masses (i.e. cool kids oblivious of anyone that like being loud and scream for no reason). However, I didn’t really start trying to fit in until very late hence I’ve always had a notorious status of the “quiet shy little kid”. It’s a dark place to be in the friendless quiet shy little kid spot. Reason 7: I don’t know. My mind isn’t well organised right now. I might have repeated myself very often. I can’t think of other reasons. I feel like crap daily. I’m not looking for help here. Please don’t write nice comments to support me or convince me oh life can be bad but you gotta toughen up and stay straight. I’ve already given multiple people these pieces of advice trying to convince myself of them. Please, don’t write these kinds of comments. I don’t need you to upvote either. This answer is not for views or upvotes or anything really. I’ve already intentionally crafted a few “easy viewers bringing answers”. You can check my profile. They are the most viewed answers. I wanted to see for myself that sex and pretty girls in the thumbnail brings views, and oh boy did they bring some. I write this for myself. Trying to fill some empty space idk. This is a long ass answer man. Anyway, If i stop using Quora for over a few years it either means i got bored and forgot about it somehow for a few years or..you know. Since not many will read this anyway, since I didn’t place any typical “sex, hot girl, i’m a single mom and have been doing this and that with this and that person, lemme write anonymously for the sake of privacy” (not to be disrespectful but these answers are everywhere and they are all the same), for those who DO read it, I’m saying, don’t try to comfort me or give me pieces of advice however good they might be. I’ve never asked for help and will. That’s just how I am. It’s sad and close-minded but that’s just how I’m used to it. My mood swings from wanting to throw myself in from of the subway to being extremely cheerful and obnoxious all the time. I don’t even know who i am anymore. If you don’t hear from me for a loooong time that means I either forgot about Quora for a long time or…yeah…

My parents showed his matrimonial profile to me and asked for my approval. Since, I am already scared about arranged marriage, I started to search him in Facebook. I found him and started to have conversation. I started like, We will talk for some days, if our frequency matches then we will proceed orelse we drop. He agreed. We met, he came along with his well wisher (his dance teacher) and teacher's family. They gave a good confidence about that guy. He also seemed to be a good guy. I disclosed everything about me and cleared my doubts. I told him that I had undergone a minor surgery which won't cause any complications in future. I even told him that we can go to hospital to prove myself. He said that he won't need that and was happy for me. He gave a short note about him. The last line impressed me. Because, I m the person who like to live the life with full enthusiasm.  After that we had a official meet(bride seeing event) at my home. Both families were satisfied. My family asked for next event which is their family and relatives have to visit my home , followed that we have to visit their home with relatives. They denied to come. My parents got scared and did a background check. They rejected that guy due to some reasons. Since we felt that we are a having a good sync with each other. I convinced my parents that I won't get a guy like him. I, he and his well wisher made a plan to convince both sides. We had a met and executed everything( To initiate conversation between two families since it's stopped officially). Everything gone in a positive way. In between his well wisher supported me a lot. She said that he is mine. His nature is he won't use mobile much. I am the girl who expect a good conversation to understand each other. I didn't care about but I adjusted because, he is a good guy. Once the conversation went like. I : Everything going in a right direction. Are you really interested in me? Because I didn't receive any frequent conversation from you. He: See Sindhu we have more time to speak in future. Don't get scared about everything. We can gradually move into life. You are fixed to my heart. I can't think about any other girl. I m impressed by you. I have fallen for you. If we decide something we shouldn't turn back. I : I felt completed. He used to share all things with his well wisher. I didn't care about it. Once we had a meet. We went for a dinner. He had cut the dance class. Because of that she(well wisher) became really angry and told me that you can't do like this. I asked sorry since I had good respect on her. He shares each and everything with her. So, We couldn't meet after that. He gave lot of Hope and lot of confidence to me. I started to love him. He too expressed it. He have a tight schedule from yoga, office and dance class( his passion). I am happy that he have a very active lifestyle. I accepted it. I didn't complain that you didn't spend much time with me. He spoke about future. Our both parents fixed and booked mahals for engagement and marriage. One day he pinged me to ask about how much gold we are giving from my side. I told him to ask his parents. He told that his parents are disappointed. I told like your parents should have discussed about it before. He said that his mother is crying since it's a prestige issue infront of relatives. ( His parents said we don't expect anything you can do whatever you could do). I became disappointed with him and after lot of conversation he asked me sorry and I got convinced. The very next day he asked me to tell about the surgery to his parents. ( He and well wisher stopped me to tell about it before) . I asked him are you mad?. This is not a right time to tell and it's not a big problem at all even to hide. I even said to stop this marriage by telling I am characterless girl to his parents instead of telling that surgery thing, because anyways it's going to stop. He denied. I told, there were many opportunities I asked for your approval to tell this thing to your parents. But, you have stopped me and my parents. Now, all the right time gone , if my parents say means they will get a bad name and this marriage will get stopped. His well wisher joined with him and forced me to tell it to his parents. I convinced my parents and opened that news to his parents. His well wisher asked my medical reports to get medical opinion. They didn't even get any opinion and stopped my marriage. Above all , he called me and told, Sindhu, My mom is crying , I can't marry you, you have great character you will get a better match. If you love someone in future , tell me I will help for your marriage. You should have talked with other matrimonial profiles not only me. I stopped him and said I m not that much cheap. I was so confident , I stood by him when my parents said no to him. But he didn't. My heart is saying that he won't deserve me . But , I still couldn't come out of mental trauma because of all his words of hope. I asked him that don't u feel that you have cheated a girl mentally? Why did you give hope if you can't withstand it? He blocked me everywhere. His well wisher disappeared.

I was shocked and terrified. My friend stood up for me and fought against those people. He got severely beaten by them. He was covered with blood. But he ensured that they cant even touch me. Falling in love is one of the biggest step you can make, or one of the biggest mistakes you can make. This girl named “Mia” (not her real name), she is popular. Smart yet a bit lazy, quite a gamer and she enjoys retro music as much as I do! It all started one day when I was listening to Queen, “Hey oh my god you know the song I want to break free by Queen? Holy shit!” Since then I became a friend of hers and listen/sing/dance to retro music with her a lot. We usually talked about Marvel and go on about the hottest male actors we know or the cutest girls in school (I’m bisexual studying in an all girls school). Everything was fine, nothing was out of the ordinary until… “Love of my life, don’t leave me” She sang while she stared deeply at my eyes, wha-what? Why was my heart beating fast, my cheeks feel a bit weird oh what the fuck why am I blushing? Fuck, took me a few days to realize that; I had feelings for her.. I tried my best to convince myself that it was simple infatuation but as the feelings lasted for about 2 months I knew it wasn’t infatuation. It wasn’t any “Love at first sight” shit, overtime I started realizing the small things about her. She loved drawing and at times when she disagrees with her popular friends she just keeps quiet as to not start a fight. She grew more and more intensely cute at my eyes each day. The thing is, my best friend had feelings for her. Does it seem unfair? I remember teasing my best friend last 2017 for liking Mia but hey who would have guessed I would also develop feelings for her one day? I want to be with her but I don’t stand a chance, it’s already a miracle that we’re friend regardless of our “school clique social status”, (But I am commended by a lot of people to be really beautiful and have such great tastes in fashion.) I am a social butterfly and have a lot of friends whom are popular! But my clique are labeled as the “Bisexual Fashion Icons” clique (not in an offensive way)! So we are quite different and I have such a low chance of pursuing a relationship with her. Plus I think she likes this other girl who is her best friend, not sure but I think. I don’t have the balls to confess to her because rejection is really harsh on me. But I like to focus on our “cute moments” together! One time we wore casual clothing (we have uniforms to be worn everyday in school) because of our annual Christmas party in school and I looked stunning! I really liked the way I presented myself that day, I had natural make up on with an aesthetic hair do and a choker with a chick outfit. The moment I entered the classroom all my clsssmates complimented me and although I was showered with compliments like “You look so cute” “Gorgeous as always” Mia’s compliment of course meant the most to me, “Hey you look like this one cartoon character I like! You’re so beautiful today omg” I kept that in my hair for the whole day. So fast forward party ended and I realized I didn’t have a picture of myself (good to make my profile picture in instagram and Facebook) I was with my best friend and begging her to take a photo of me when Mia stepped in and said that she would do it. So of course my best friend knowing I liked her left me with Mia and yes Mia took incredible shots of me. Oh and aside from me and Mia having small talks during that day there was this one part where we had to line up to get the food in our mini buffet and my friends were behind me then suddenly Mia decided to “scare/shock” me by just randomly popping up behind me, in which she succeeded. She had a good laugh at her small prank on me and this is the part where I was internally dying, I was wearing a crop top of shoulder and Mia placed her hands on my waist and rested her chin on my shoulders. Mia: (whispers to my ear softly) Caught you off guard didn’t I? *soft chuckle* Me: Ha ye-yeah a bit Mia: Wanna sit with me after you get your food? Me: Sure! Mia left and my friends eye widened as they looked at me and began talking about how she couple potentially like me (which is a zero chance). That is all I have to say! I will give you updates on what happens on my “Love life” and shit.

Recently, I started listening to some of the current songs and started having weird feelings about a singer, Dua Lipa. After developing these thoughts, I become more sad when I listen to her songs. Why? I am not so certain either. Probably the thought that I have a crush on a famous singer who has no idea I even exist makes me want her even more. A person who I'll probably never meet. All of a sudden, I start to question myself wether I make the best out of my reality. A reality in which I can enjoy life and be together with people who I can actually see a future with. You know what's worse? The fact that I have to unfollow her and totally block her out of my mind. Because when I see a video of her going for tours after tours, gorgeous photos of herself with fans, my heart literally sinks knowing that nothing will probably ever happen. Here she is doing what she loves, not giving a f**k. Probably enjoying herself (maybe not) going to a different country every 3 days. Here I am, obsessing over someone like her. I honestly used to think people who can actually have feelings for celebs were physchos, now realising that I'm probably one too. This may seem stupid to a lot of you. But I feel better after writing this down on Quota.

Disclaimer: Might contain inappropriate and offensive content to some people. I’m like a secret writer, generally crime fiction. It’s been like 6 years since I’m working on this particular story about a anti-hero. So in every story, I add a narrator part like an intro. Here is one of the narrator part of one of the sub-section titled “FALLEN” of the story, which is after the first phase after the rigorous and violent attacks on a city. Narrator: “Thousands of corpses lying, blood-wet outside and inside, the pillars have cracked and thrashing the ground as they fall. The sculptures are half burnt and rest melting, blood runs through the blasted doors, through the sewers, recoloring the sculpture once praised as wonderful, there is nobody to praise, none to mourn and grieve. Once again, the darkness has beaten the light, but the people have understood one thing now, that there are no heroes, just people. The people who see the darkness as a serious problem, who believe that there must be an inspiration in their heart that tells that the darkness has no source, but light must have. The fight is just beginning, thousands will fall, let them. There must be sacrifices, so that people who has grew tired of all these lies will understand when it comes to take their homes and families away. To let them feel, what’s it like to lose someone you truly love, with all your heart. Now there is no one to avenge but you. How does it feel, when there is no response from anyone when something precious is lost, and nothing can replenish it ever. Other people see the capital as a place, but the one who live here. Imagine of Alfea, what they think of Alfea? They see it as their homeland, not all but the ones who were born here, they call it their family. The old who still confuse their ignorance as patriotism, so what can they do but burn to death, there must be unfortunate incidents to revitalize the potential in patriotism of young people. The old must be put to their graves. Alfea have to rise if it is necessary to prove that patriotism is for the country and so are the souls.” There is a war to come, we must be ready before it begins, when it begins, there should be no one to refuse to call it a war, to rest inside their houses for rest. Hail for the martyrs! PS: It took me really long time to prepare this piece, so kindly don’t copy or reproduce the above without my consent. Thank you for reading, Have a nice day!

I convince myself that I have moved on. I convince myself that I am over you. And yet, late at night as I lay down to sleep, I fantasize, our moments together on repeat How is it possible to think about someone every day who broke your heart into a zillion pieces It has been 2 years since we broke up, but why do I believe there is an apology overdue. For you to take me to highest level of happiness, intimacy with your white lies and then banging me right on the floor I remember the feeling of being cheated on, I remember how it feels like somebody has taken out your soul from your body People say when you can tell your story without shedding a tear, it shows that you have moved on And yet here I am writing my story with a heavy heart and tears in my eyes Do I hate you ? Have I forgiven you? What do I want from you? Why do I feel like your demons are still haunting me? There gotta be a solution to this, there gotta be an end to this. Please release me from your demons. Please let me go emotionally. Sincerely An ex who loved you from the core of her heart.

I did not expect that I have to write this answer one day. Today I lost my BEST friend. Yes! We were together for the last 10 years, and suddenly he left us out of nowhere and just left us alone. I am still crying while writing this answer. I understood that “Death can come anytime anywhere”. While writing this answer, just thousands of memories flashing in front of my eyes. Those school mastis, those roaming around, those games we used to play, how we used to abuse each other etc. Everything is flashing in mind. He suffered a very bad road accident day before yesterday. I exactly remember it was 12 pm, I was in my hostel room, when, a friend of mine called to say that he is admitted in ICU. I did not have a clue of that till that time. I thought she was just doing some prank with me by telling this. I first did not believe this. But just for confirming, I called his number, with the mindset that I will just beat the shit out of him to do this type of bad pranks. But after a while, a different person picked up the call(his hostel friend) and told the truth. The day before yesterday, in morning 8 a.m., some of his friends planned for a short bike trip. I and some of my friends told him not go on a bike like this, as he was nearly 2000 km away from home, but he did not listen and the thing we all feared, that happened. His bike met with an accident with 4 wheelers and he smashed on the cemented road with bike on top of him. Fortunately, the friend sitting behind him did not even have a scratch. His bike was at a speed of 100km/hr and he did not have any helmet. That's what is the mistake he did. He was rushed to CMC, Vellore, where doctors put him in ICU. He had abdominal internal bleeding, till that time. His parents were informed and one of my friends help them get to the airport fast. His parents reached there by 10 p.m. at night. That day, the abdominal bleeding operation was done and he was quite stable. But later we got to know, that he also had intestinal damage along with spinal cord and pancreas damage. We all friends, out families, his parents broke down. Still doctors told that he may recover and we can place the artificial intestine. We still had hope. We were constantly praying for him. But today morning, neurosurgeon gave the shocking news that, his brain was becoming dead slowly. He was put on ventilator as he stopped breathing. Now 2 hours before, doctors declared brain death. He is still in ventilator, but by means of artificial breathing, artificial heart pump, basically, everything by mechanical means and not natural and doctors told he has 0% chance of recovery. I just can’t take it more. For me, he was my life, not just my best friend. He was my brother. He wanted to be a robotics engineer and we used to share everything. But his dream can’t be fulfilled anymore. He left us. We could not do anything. He was the only child of his parents. But I promise that from today, I will take care of his parents because they are my parents too. Just 2 days ago, we had talked, and now when I call on his number, no one picks up. The last WhatsApp message I sent him 2 days back, will remain unseen forever now. Idiot, you left me like this. So many trips remained unfulfilled, thought to dance like hell on your wedding and you did this. This is the photo with that idiot.(Yellow)  Really love you bro. And guys please please wear a helmet while riding bike and please keep the speed slow. Had he wore a helmet today, maybe he would be with us now. For college students, please avoid bikes. It does not look cool riding at high speed. And parents please do not allow your children to ride bikes at underage. Thank you for reading. Edit : Thank you everyone, but its really tough to get over it. I am really proud of him and his family, that they decided to donate his eyes and other organs so that another person can live. Also his parents have decided that, they will give his body for medical research purposes. I just can’t imagine this. Such great people on this earth. Why does God, do such with such good people. :( Edit: Though my brother is not with me now, but still I am proud, he saved the lives of 6 people. Really proud of him and a huge respect for his parents.

“Men empowerment” Let me tell you a story which I watched few years back in YouTube. There was an innocent poor guy travelling in bus to office. Since it was a peak time the bus was fully loaded. The innocent guy was standing beside a lady. When the bus took right turn, he missed his balance and fell on the lady beside him. So, his forearm touched her breast. She became furious and slapped him in the crowded bus. She shouted, “You bloody pervert, I will teach you a lesson so that you should never repeat this again. You should be afraid even to touch your wife's breast henceforth.” People gathered and slapped him. The bus driver took the bus to the police station. She filed a complaint against him. The news became sensational and telecasted on all national news channel. TV channels held the debate and discussion on this. TV channels showed the innocent guy's pic 24/7. Every news channel showing the same news. The innocent guy lost his job!He lost his respect!People looked at him in a different way after that incident.His parents faced lots of tantrums from their neighbours.The innocent boy couldn't even step outside of the house, because everyone was cursing him.He decided to kidnap that girl who made false allegations on him. I'm caught between a rock and a hard place. One of my friends is being kicked out of her house because her dad is a gigantic piece of shit. In the past 6 months he has been arrested at least twice for DUI, one of those times involving the possession of an unregistered firearm in the second degree (I hope its the second degree). Also, she mentioned that he might be on cocaine. He is physically and verbally abusive to her, and I'm trying everything in my power to get her out of there. I offhandedly suggested that she move in with me, and she took that idea and ran with it. The alternative is for her to live on the streets--in winter. A woman, sleeping on the streets, at night, in winter, is about the scariest combination I've heard since 12 year olds, microphones, and fortnite. So I've talked with my dad about her moving in, and he's not opposed to the idea. They are suppose to meet this afternoon to talk about the idea, and I've been having this nagging feeling that one of them is going to say something wrong and it's all going to fall apart. This anxiety doesn't stem from nothing (though it often does). My friend has multiple personality disorder (not sure if that's the actual name, but you get the point), and there are a couple sides to her that I've seen, that I don't want my dad to see. The “I don't Give a fuck" side, the “I need a blunt" side, and the “I need a beer" side (You know…the more I think about it, the more I'd prefer the hotmicing 12 year old). Now before you get your dick in a knot, im kidding, I would much rather have my platonic sister living with me than listen to a hotmicing 12 year old--on fortnite. The one problem I have personally, is that I show different sides of myself to different people. I am not sure how I am going to balance the side my dad sees, with the side my friend sees. I'm normally really exuberant around my friend, and I'm rather dull around my dad. It's definitely going to be a balancing act. My apologies if this doesn't make sense. It was kind of rushed. I might try and clean it up later.

I was gential mutilated (Infibulation) by my parents when I was 9 years old. For those who don't know the Infibulation… its a pharaonic mutilation, which is done through cutting the girl’s external genitalia. I live in Sudan. I was 9. One day morning, my sister and I were taken to a woman who used to do this surgery. I remember the room, it was meesy and untidy.There was no privacy, lot’s of women were in the room looking, and some kids (who I don't remember where the hell did they come from!), were on the windows sneaking the glances and laughing, while I was crying. On the small table, there were cotton, water, razors and other stuff. I was terrified, loudly screaming and flinging. Two or three women held me so I can't move. I was begging. The womon took the razor and killed me. At house People were celebrating, food and songs. I had to stay in the bed for several weeks. Visitors came to congratulate and give me money and gifts! the suffer didn't stop here. It was extremely hard to move, or sit for several weeks. Bathroom was always a catastrophe, the pain was untolerable lots of scream, blood, and tears. Many years after, I questioned my mother. Why did she do it? As I was taught at school how devirly it is. She answered “to make you clean. It's our tradition, my mother did it. I did it, and you should do it to your future daughter, as well”. By the time I realized that my mom doesn't like to speak about it at all, I don't know was it because of the guilt or for she was avoiding her bad memories from her childhood. I mean, to make me clean of what!? They never tell the reason, and I doubt if they know the reason in the first place! People where I belong have fear of thinking, they rather choose to follow, for its easier. Finally, and thank for education, I got answers. old practices related to purity, for maintaining us virgin, to not bring the shame to our families. “you have no clitor..difficult to get lust.. you stay virgin!. And when you get married, your feeling doesn't matter, you are almost like a sex doll” I wish no more girls will go through what I went through. although the law prevents it now, but it's still happening secretly. I have a freind who comes from an educated family, and didn't have to go through it. She asked once “ what is it feel?” I answered “ I don't feel”. Sorry for my bad English and poor narrating. I needed a vent. EDIT: Thank you so much for your kind words, and support, it really means a lot. Just to make things clear… Some people in the comments considered me to be a Muslim, and started attacking Islam although, I didn't mention my religious background!. I am not defending any religion here, it's just that Sudan is a divers country, these practices aren't done by Muslims only, Coptic Christian and some animist groups are known with it, as well. People keep doing things and traditions, then attribute it to religionsYes, there are some organizations in Sudan fighting to stop it. It's less now than in the past .I don't feel any grudge toward my parents, they are victims of illiteracy. Whom I can't find excuses for are those educated girls and women who are still proud of it as if it was a privilege! and would do it to their daughters just because of the society.

I don’t have a hobby. Hi everyone. I’m 19 years old and grew up to be an introvert. But still there are time that I go to parties and it doesn’t drains me. It just frustrates me that from my childhood up to know, I have come to face the harsh reality that I don’t have any hobbies that makes me an uninteresting person and an individual. Because who even wants to be with someone who doesn’t have any interest in anything right? It’s kind of sad that I didn’t really have an amount of friends since I don’t play any sport even basketball. I only watch it in TV, it excites me yet frustrating because I don’t understand a thing. I can’t even play an instrument yet I’m interested in playing violin. I want to do any manly hobbies like fixing a car, doing house repairs, fixing a leaky faucet, in short i want to be independent and responsible to my family and to the community. I want to contribute largely. From a week before up to now, I am starting to let myself learn basketball and many others. i’ve been searching lots of hobbies i can try with. Because if majority can do it, why can’t I, right? I want to be back on track. I want to change. I want to be interesting and popular too. Thanks for hearing my story! Hope i can receive feedbacks or comments.

I am a 15 year old CBSE student in India. Like every student who scored above 90% in their boards or was considered among the “good kids”, I decided to pursue engineering. Now don't get me wrong, nobody forced me into this decision, sure, my parents might have been a little disappointed if I didn't, but I wasn't forced, it was my own choice. So, till 10th grade, I was the top student. I got marks without working too hard for them, was a gem in teachers’ eyes, used to take part in all functions and read books, drew, danced and painted as hobbies. I had a huge group of friends despite being considered a nerd and I was truly happy, life was perfection. I thought I could do anything if I set my mind to it, so I took up what most people considered difficult, engineering. And boy, was I wrong. I entered class 11th with a sense of optimism, I believed I would be able to handle the pressure everyone warned me about. I also joined FIITJEE to prepare for competetive exams, specifically IIT-JEE (which, now, I have no hopes of cracking). Most of my friends had been taken away by the commerce and arts streams. No worries, I'd make new friends. I went to my first FIITJEE class and came back intimidated. I had trouble understanding what we were taught, it took me sometime to digest all the new information, I was used to the CBSE method, the method I was so perfect at. No worries, I'll adjust. Maybe I'm a bit slow at understandind advanced stuff, I'll learn how to do it quickly. Gradually I lost my optimism and started believing I couldn't to do anything. I drowned everyday in the endless amount of practice sheets and assignments we recieved in every class. It took me at least 15 minutes to do one question while others came back the next day with all their work complete, and one or two doubts. We were really encouraged to ask doubts. I thought, what's the point of asking 1 doubt in 50, I would still not know 49. Also, growing up, I had been an introvert and a self learner. I just couldn't digest the fact, that even after being taught, I couldn't do something, when I used to learn and do everything by myself. My school exams arrive. I had been so lost in all that coaching stuff, I forgot I had to do well at school too. Maybe it was the intense pressure, or maybe it was my inability to handle slight pressure, I didn't perform as well. My confidence hit rock bottom. What would I do in IIT if I can't do well in a simple school test. Meanwhile things were going really unwell at FIITJEE. I saw myself as the least intelligent one of the class, felt hesitant to ask a doubt, had no friends there, rather, people looked kind of down upon me. One day I plucked up the courage to ask a doubt, but it was ruthlessly ignored to solve the doubt of a more vocal, reputed and intelligent student. My first FIITJEE exam is in a week and I am the definition of demotivated. This is the reshuffling test, which will decide if I will be in the first, second or bottom batch, meaning, it will decide if I will get the best, average or worst teachers. I have made a timetable to study throughout the week, but I just feel it doesn't make a difference. I still don't know anything. My mom is really supportive and wants and believes I can do well. I just don't know how to tell her I'm not as perfect as I thought as was. I think I'm the one who has more trouble accepting the fact that I am not perfect. She keeps asking me how she can help me feel good about myself, feel determined. I am really grateful to her for that, I am, but I don't know what to tell her. I am just a dumb young girl who got glory when she was a kid and grew up and realized she wasn't a perfect little Mary Sue anymore, and now has self esteem issues. I still want to do engineering. If I keep aside the fact that maths torments me and chemistry just doesn't get through to my dumb brain, I feel actually interested in physics, which I have trouble understanding too. I want to learn more about space and relativity. But to get to the stage where we have to learn that, I have to learn what we are being taught right now, and I just can't. I sit down to study, I pick up the pen, I look at the question and drive away the intense feeling of hopelessness that I'll never be able to do it on my own. I try and try and try and keep trying different methods for half hour and then get tired and search the question on the internet. Turns out I was doing it right, but I just didn't progress further because I thought it was wrong. I take up another question. Repeat. I study a lot, more than those toppers, but I still achieve less in all that time. It takes me sometime (a lot of time) to digest new information and while we are just being stuffed with new information everyday and everyone is learning, even with no time for self study, this new information just goes to my brain’s information sector where it waits to be digested. That sector feels like about to burst now. I'm scared that I'll perform bad. Not on this test, but in every test I will give. I feel like I should have taken some other stream, but my interest was here. My mom deserves better than this hot mess of insecurity she got. My parents invest their money to get me educated so I can get a good job, live a good life, and I throw all of that away. I feel like a failure. Everything makes me break down into tears. I'm tired of not being able to do anything. I'm tired of wading through all this advanced stuff when other students just have to take a look at it and they learn it. I see myself when I see them, this was me a few months back. How did I get in this state? I am tired of feeling inferior and jealous. Drawing, reading and painting are a thing of the past. I never thought I was one to give uo my hobbies for studying but here I am. I feel like I have lost a more significant and lively part of myself. I just feel dull inside. Hopeless.
