I've been thinking a lot about writing this out and if you're reading this, it means I decided to just go for it. I met my now ex-boyfriend 3 years ago. He was new to college, we shared one of the classes. I had a crush on him and believe it or not, I actually told him, to which he said: “you don't even know me". So, I decided to get to know him. We started off by speaking in our lesson then I added him on social media and finally after a good few months, we exchanged numbers. Now all these 3 years he cared for me deeply, helped me with everything. I did too, missed my own lessons to help him with his work, waited for him every day outside the college to walk with him even though I lived an hour away and he lived 20 minutes away. I used to get so late, get stuck in traffic but still, it was a small thing for me. Then after a year or something, he asked me out, happiest day. We did everything a couple would do, from sex to shopping to talking about families. But at the end of 2018, just after Christmas, he said to me that he doesn't feel like love is there (out of nowhere) I didn't expect that. So I asked him what made him say that. And I do agree that we're so different and he wanted someone who would share the same ambitions as him and because we were so opposite, it was a problem for him (it was never a problem for me). So I felt hurt, of course, all the memories of us being together and our future came in my brain and I seriously didn't know what to type. So I just said that's okay, I explained how I felt hurt and of course who wouldn't. After 3 years you're telling me you don't love me, I was hurt still am. He said he tried to love me but couldn't. He said he still cares for me deeply because I was always there for him. He wants to be just friends like friends and have sex as well. So basically in simple words friends with benefits. I don't know how I feel about that yet because I do miss him and lot and he cares about me so so much which makes it even harder for me to just cut the communication. Last night, he said to me that I argue a lot these days and it's turning him into a bad/angry person. I don't know how I feel about that. I don't know, I'm so lost. I wish I had never said hello to him in the first place and all this would have never happened but then I would have no-one who actually cared about me. I feel like I always want someone in my life to tell me that they care about me and love me and atm I feel like I've only got him. That's why it's hard to just leave him. I don't know urgh why is this life so messed up.

Okay. I finally got the chance to write because I don’t have my own device. I have to borrow from my cousin. I just want to share about things I have been holding inside since I feel like I can put them here. Since nobody knows I have Quora, I can safely say that my enemies will think of me doing this. So anyway, on to the story. People nowadays are so glued to their phone that they don’t seem to notice what is going on around them. Selfies, Facebook, chatting and Youtube are few of the things they are so busy about. They spend hours and hours on the phone which I know most of you knows, is common to see these days. Your classmates when there is no teacher? They browse Facebook. That cashier guy waiting for his customers? Phone. Your friends when they get together? They play mobile games such as Candy Crush or Mobile Legends. Everyone is keen on being updated on having phones that I worry they will break their neck due to phone usage. This answer of mine is not some kind of advocacy against using mobile phones. No. I am not against it. Sure, I don’t have my own since I lost it and people might say I am jealous, but my concern is different. It’s about how people act and interact these days. When I was a prepubescent boy, my parents would often pressure me to make friends. I was fine with the idea since I am a bit of a loner and I am the only person in class who didn’t belong to any clique. I tried joining social circles but they all rejected me because I am simply different. They say I am a weirdo. That may be true but I am just asking for attention. That there is a boy that just wants friends. But no. I was an outcast until college. Anyway, my experience with people taught me that they will not be friends with you for who you are but what you have. Those cliques in school demanded I do/give/have something first before being part of them. If I wasn’t given the gift called common sense, I would have said yes immediately. Sure I complied and was “accepted” but I later on found out that I was just a toy to them. So I became a loner. Years later, I am now a teenager who prefers the company of movied, books, and video games. I was rather fascinated with stories that take you anywhere rather than chasing people who doesn’t even see you. Yeah, I didn’t know how to make friends. If they would shot me out, I would not try again. If I tell them what is wrong with them…well I will tell that later. At this time, smartphones are now trending so almost everyone has one. I saw this an opportunity to make friends. I would chat a classmate and then talk to him/her. My plan failed however since they seen zone me 99% of the time. I was devastated. So I let my parents know that I won’t make friends with people who won’t let me in their lives. They weren’t happy. And I didn’t have a good relationship with them. They are good parents. They always want the best for me but how they deliver their laws….I didn’t agree. So I still tried making friends. This time, I tried to overcome my fear of socializing. I talk to people first because I get ignored most of the time. That doesn’t mean I wait for people to approach me. Usually if they do, it means they want something. I don’t believe in friendship based only on giving. These time though, peeps are now glued to their phones, browsing nonsense stuff. Whenever I try to talk to them, I get ignored or I get called papansin which is in my language means attention seeker. I was annoyed. Do you know these people who made me feel like a trash? They act all sanctimonious online. They post in Facebook all that stuff about Jesus and how they follow him. They post stuff saying “I am depressed” and they’d get attention. Alot. Sometimes, they even post selfies then put a caption that it isn’t even related like….a selfie with filters then captioned: I may be ugly but God thinks I am perfect. Then that bitch would get comments saying she is an angel. Oh, I also forgot that those people act mean in real life. They love criticizing others and pointing fingers but they are arseholes themselves. Now that I am in college, I got tired of chasing a dream that I can never have. With the first heartbreak, the hardest sacrifice, and my parents just being recent, I decided to just focus on my future. Yeah, I have alot of stories. I experienced and seen alot. I have a different perspective with my generation. I guess you could say that I will not hesitate to choose what is right. But still, a question bothers me. Where did I go wrong? -EDwin Gregorio salazAR

My best friend and I have been friends ever since we were 5. We are currently 17. We've been through ups and downs together and she's basically a sister to me even though we are very different individuals. She's the popular one, the thin, slim and pretty one;most of the guys she talks to somehow ends up falling for her. I'm short, kinda chubby, introverted,shy, and weird. There's been times where we had backstabbed each other and times where we would sacrifice a lot for each other. She had hurt me multiple times and I used to be pretty quick to sulk about it but at this point I'm quite used to it. She was the reason my first ever relationship failed. She's the reason I often feel insecure about my self. Throughout my life, out of the 7 guys I've had feelings for, only 2 reciprocated my feelings. Both relationships didn't end well. Because of her. My second relationship had me feeling like I was the third wheel because of the fact that she was closer to my ex than I was. They would hang out together with another close friend of theirs and they even made a band, though they didn't mention it to me. They just started posting about their band on social media and I just look at their pics and vids feeling left out. So, I ended the relationship. That was 3 years ago. Late last year, there was a new kid in school. It only took me a few days to start getting curious about him, but being the shy person I am, I never made a move. Early this year, I fell for him even more after getting to know about him and his interests. How? Through my best friend. (I had told her about my feelings for the new kid and she knows how much I really like him.) Turns out, she had been talking to him and he would share some of his personal issues with her. At first, I didn’t really mind because they're just friends (according to my best friend). So I just continued liking him like a fool. A few weeks after that, my best friend told me that he confided in her about the fact that he is infatuated with another girl in class. I was, of course, sad about it but the girl had a boyfriend so I still had hopes. I started talking to him online bit by bit. But we never had a conversation for more than 10 minutes. As time passes, his attraction towards the girl didn't waver. He continued liking her and telling my best friend about his feelings and struggles. I was starting to feel worse. But I kept on telling myself everything is going to be okay. Then, somehow, last week, things took a turn and I started to notice that he has started to pay a lot of attention towards my best friend and she continues to talk to him everyday. I would sometimes catch her chatting with him on her phone even outside of school. I realized what was happening. The guy I was head over heels in love with was falling for my best friend. What's more heartbreaking is my best friend is probably attracted to him too. She recently said to me, there's a new guy in her life, not so new but fairly new, who she had started talking to and she felt like he was going to confess to her about his feelings. She said that she kinda likes him too. She legit said that to my face, thinking I'm not aware of the relationship going on between them. I didn’t want to ask who the guy is because I wouldn't know how to reply anyway. It was obvious anyway. Today, they went out for the first time. My best friend posted a vid of him and her hanging out. Now I'm aware that I may seem like a jealous and pathetic person but this isn't the first time something like this happened. She had liked the same guy I liked 4 times throughout our friendship even when I had expressed my feelings about them, and all of those guys ended up liking her. I'm just tired and really heartbroken about this. I go to school everyday having to face them flirting with each other and getting closer as each day passes. It really hurts. And the worst part is that I don't have anyone to talk to about it. I’m not the type to easily cry but these days thats all I do, alone in my room. I'm sorry for the long rant, I just really need to let this out cuz like I said I don't have anyone to talk to it about.

When I was young I worked as a lifeguard in the summers, and had taught most of my nieces and nephews to swim. A few years later my younger brother drowned during a whitewater rafting trip on the Snake River, and it took three days before they recovered the body. I had to explain to his three year old daughter that I couldn't find her daddy, while she held full faith that I could swim well enough to go get him and bring him home. The hardest part was that she kept bringing it up over and over, because she just couldn't wrap her toddler mind around losing him. Over and over she kept begging me to just try. She's an adult now and doesn't remember those three awful days. I won't ever forget them.

I am currently living in Kolkata. I am 19 years old and I live in a hostel. Two years from today I entered this institution( India’s highly acclaimed). I got into the first merit list. I didn’t wanna purse commerce further, something stirred inside me and made it clear. I told my parents. They asked me “So, then what do you want to do? “ I wasn’t prepared with an answer and the admission was the next day. “ If you are baffled about one thing doesn't implicate that you’re clear about the other.” In the very first semester, I was seated next to the most brilliant minds in my class. Our college has a strict seating arrangement. They were all pursuing CA. I was not lured into it. But the kind of pressure and seduction it created on the outsides outweighed my instincts. Having a handsome academic isn’t affirmative always. “The salted expectations saturate on our spirits like weights and then break them.” In a gradual weightless sort of feeling, I appeared for Level 1 (CPT) ( I studied decently though, the pressure of a “fail-kar-gaya” embarrassment. Unfortunately, I cleared. They were already in their 2nd level. I had had to rush to catch on. Something I couldn’t understand. My father poured in a sea of money into the coaching business for Level-2 (IPCC). He is not that rich of a man who wouldn’t feel a thing at the end of the month plunging thousands of rupees once at a time( It sure was hard on their budgets). We call it Investment. I slogged into the frantically burdening lifestyle of a typical CA student juggling a regular engaging college, handling sullen ambitious expectations and at the same time armoring myself against twitched sharp comments of ‘slow-movement’. It seemed like a war with no enemy to fight against, no territory to conquer. Just battle. Gradually, the entire environment around started judging me, despising me, rattling my esteem like rag dolls. I registered into the comfort of an unknown darkness. Depression, they name it. That scrotum-tightening, cheerless, mouthful-mouthless feeling. Taking calls, meeting friends, visiting home and things like that just deleted out my to-do lists serendipitously. I got arrested in the company of self-indulgence and withdrew from the lively silently. It sounds too dramatic when I write like this, but the truth is truth you can’t mess with that. I have grown accustomed to this silent style of living, aloofing from conversations, hiding in my own vacuous spaces within the structure. To think, try n understand but never voice. I read sometimes and exsist in my depressingly protective shell in a sort of sanctimonious style. I feel sorry about that. It isn’t that I have been disturbed about my positional melancholy. I am concerned about the repercussions, this tide would ripple in my parent’s lives. Their stringently indisposed futures glued to mine like magnets. I am worried.

Sometimes there are people that you really love and would do anything for them. But, those people just don’t understand how much you love them. You could even die for them but, they wouldn’t care one bit. You try your best to make them laugh if not laugh then just smile and when they do smile you start smiling too. You wait and wait for them to say something but, they just don’t understand They don’t care. You love them everyone else can see that but, they will not understand you And when you realize that those people don’t deserve your love you try to forget them but, every little thing reminds you of them. Everyone tells you to forget them but, it hurts to forget such people who have played a major role in who you are. No matter how hard you try to forget you just can’t forget them. They live in your heart but, they don’t even think about you. Because of them, you can’t love anyone else and they just don’t care. They have time to do other things but don’t have time to talk to you. Just saying one word ,they can put a smile on your face. And you start imagining that they like you but, this just can’t be possible because people are so stupid that they just don’t realize who loves them and who doesn’t. And we are stupid to love the people who will not love us back. It is really hard to get angry at such people. You can get as angry as you want but, in the end, it's just not possible. You start blaming yourself even though it's their fault, not yours. You think about them every hour, every minute, every second ,every milli second ,every micro second,every nano second…but they don’t care even the littlest bit. You think about the times that you spent together. You start shedding tears on someone who doesn’t deserve those tears to be shed on them. After a certain point, you start caring about them more than you cared about anyone else. And every time that you see them and they are actually nice ..making you start falling for them again. But you don’t realize that you were on top of a big mountain and there is no one down there who can save you from falling and hitting the ground really hard. You accept them as they are and you start changing yourself. You change yourself to the point where you forget who you truly were. You can’t recognize this new self because you are completely changed and a different person than you were before. You pray that they could become your’s but, some things in life don’t come so easily. They are heartless and don’t give a care whether you love them or not. You are afraid that what if you say something that could make them sad or angry. You don’t want them to get hurt but, they don’t realize this. Life is filled with people like that some people might say stop wasting your time on such people but, you are the only ones that realize that if you forget them then you will forget a part of you...

I really fucked up my life pretty badly. I mean, I’m stumped here and I always figure everything out. I have no idea where to go from here. The problem is that some awful, horrendous shit happened when I was a kid. And I was young and wasn’t sure at all how the world worked yet so I guess maybe I just wasn’t sure what to do about it. Apparently it made sense to me that the solution was to start flipping the fuck out about nothing to my mom. Violently towards myself and others. I was only two though so isn’t that understandable? The problem is I never learned another way to tell anyone. And it just kept happening. The awful shit. I couldn’t verbalize it to anyone though. I don’t know why. Maybe I was afraid of being hurt? I don’t remember ever being afraid. I remember being angry though. And fighting. I definitely didn’t make it easy. That’s a consolation still. But anyways, fast forward to being a teenager. When I became my own abuser really. It’s funny how if you fuck someone up bad enough for long enough, they eventually start doing it for you. Humans are strange creatures. I was being violent towards myself and others. I was getting really, really fucking high. Almost killing myself constantly but the worst part is that’s what I was looking for. Getting as close to death as possible without going over. Get a taste of that high and nothing will compare. That’s fucked up isn’t it? It’s true nonetheless. I stopped going to school. I used to be in high honors. But I’m so narcissistic about my intelligence it’s not even funny so I had to be too smart for school right? Yeah, if I was as smart as I pretend I am I’d be a neurosurgeon by now. I could’ve. But smart people use their intelligence to create. Ignorant people simply consume. All I do is consume. What a waste. Everyone always used to say to you “but you’re so smart”. Yeah. I just enjoy being destructive more. So then they had to start calling the police on me all the time. Cuz I was just a little fucking monster. I never got arrested though. I have no idea why. If I was a guy I would’ve been arrested so many times. They used to force me into the hospital though. Men go to prison to be punished. Women go to hospitals to get fixed. I mean really, who has more rights here? That’s besides the point though. I was scaring everyone. They put me in a hospital for violent people at one point and I didn’t even realize it. I had zero self awareness. No, actually. I had negative self awareness. Because not only could I not see how what I was doing affected other people, I had an entirely different view of myself. That’s how people like me are able to hurt so many people all the time. I literally had no idea I was doing any of it. Or really, that it mattered at all. I didn’t care how anything was affecting anyone maybe? I’m trying to work on caring about how other people feel now though. It’s pretty hard, not gunna lie. But something happened when I got off methadone. I still hate that stuff more than anything. The withdrawals fucked me up so bad I basically went insane and spent all this time in my head, like some wall broke or something. I don’t know. And I just read everything about psychology I could to understand what the hell was wrong with me. The doctors had no idea. I wouldn’t be honest. But I finally remembered why I was doing all this shit to myself and others. I remembered it was because I never told anyone what happened to me most of my life. So I told someone. Told the wrong person. The wrong fucking person. It’s alright though. People do the best they can right? I try to remember that now. But then the next person I told was the right person. I suppose the first part was just practice. Figure out what parts people want you to leave out, what’s too far to say I guess. And for once they actually helped me. But then I realized in group one day and I said it out loud. I’m having an issue accepting the fact that if I just said something years ago I might be that neurosurgeon today. Why the fuck wouldn’t I just say something? Makes me feel like it’s my fault I’m where I’m at right now. Maybe someone did some bad shit to me but yourself is all you have and I didn’t do anything to help myself. I should’ve handled my own shit. I don’t really know what I’m trying to say here. I guess I’m just sad my life’s a waste. I’m still young but I don’t know how to make up for it all now. Like where the hell do I go from here? No one can tell me. And I’m out of ideas. Now that I realized I have no idea how to correctly judge reality, how do I make a plan? How do I know when I’m wrong or when everybody else is? I suppose for now I’m just watching the wheels go round and round. We’ll see what happens.

A common question which most of the guys ask me and to people with good physique. (FAQs) Guy1: Bhai mujhe bhi tumhaari tarha achcha dikhna hai. Please tips do.Guy2: Bhai mujhe ladkiyaan bhow nehi deti. Mujhe bhi ladkiyaan pataani hai tumhaari tarha.Guy3: Yeh chutiya gaar mey injection daal daal k body banaya hoga. Girl1: This guy must be a beast in bed. He must have got a good cock.Girl2: This guys seems a playboy to me. I know these kind of guys well.Girl3: No guy makes six packs just to date one girl. A common suggestion to all of these folks is that don’t chase the temporary goals like sex, opposite gender or good looks and don’t judge people like us so easily. Trust me it takes hell lot of an effort to maintain a fitness lifestyle after doing a full time decently paying and very demanding IT job. It is difficult. Life is difficult and what it is meant to be. If any of us has chosen these temporary goals specially gals, money, sex, good looks etc. we wouldn’t have been where we are any ways. The pics that we all share of ours, it takes years and years of hard work, dedication and a hell lot of a compromises to reach here as this is not the only thing we do. We have to go out and earn our bread at the same time. Like you folks we also go through very ugly break ups, evil bosses, depression, health hazards etc. But we don’t give up. We work for >12 hours a day, some of us earn a seven figure salary from it, do our own cooking and hit the gym at the same time. We are sleep deprived, we are over worked, but we have a passion that don’t let us take rest. WE ARE MORE THAN OUR MUSCLES !!! We are not Bodybuilders, we are just Fitness freaks.We may be villain in someone else’s story. But we are a hero in our own story. Finally your choices in life will take you from left to the right one.

Later in Singapore, I pursued 2 diplomas related to accounts / finance. I am unlucky in my career. I want to write why it is needed to be man to be a man enough? . I don't have a desire to fit into the broken definition of masculinity. Dishonoring your life partner.  Beating her up for no reason but to show that am a man and i can beat you. Girls are weak that's why you should keep mum and get beaten up by me with no offence.  Making her realise that by saying 3 times talaq and you won't be my wife anymore. My point is not that men should stop being men but all we need is balance and equality. Why do still have a society where being a soft boy is always bullied for no genuine reason at all.  According to them men should be tough, hard and strong enough to suppress women. Frankly speaking " My father did not teach me to hunt, to fight,to say cussing words about anyone in the society." and for all this am eternally grateful to him!  Instead all about this he taught me being a man is about sacrifice- You need to sleep less to facilitate your kids with soft beds. You need to sacrifice your bread to give them a slice of pizza. Why to showoff your masculinity every now and then?  The boys who don't smoke, don't ride bikes faster,cannot hit sixes in cricket why they are always bullied and criticized for their masculinity?  I know while growing up we tend to challenge each other.  We have got to be the toughest, the strongest and the bravest man that we can be.  But the question is why?  To all the men out there... here's a challenge because men are bound to love challenges and they love challenges.  I challenge you to see if you can use the same qualities that you feel make you a man to go deeper into yourself. Your strength, your bravery, your toughness: Can we define what those mean and use them to explore our hearts? Are you brave enough to be vulnerable? To reach out another man when you need help. * Are you strong enough to be sensitive to cry whether you are hurting or you're happy even if it's make you look weak? Are you confident enough to respect the women in your life and to see her with equality? To hear their ideas and solutions? To all the man out there... Is it necessary to discuss over girls' figure and pornography to be a man enough? Is it needed to look at every girl with wrong intentions to be a man enough? If this is what defines masculinity then i don't want to instill this masculinity in me! Why don't you stand up when guys discuss about 'locker room talk'  Why don't you stand up when your frnds discuss about girls' harrassment incidents. We have to stand up for all this because one day we should not have a worse world where women have to risk everything and to come forward to say words "Metoo". Are you a man enough to be a man enough?  As i concluded- in this society, a man is not a part of problem but we are the problem. ‌I know it's a long journey to bring our thoughts from our mind to our hearts but it will the most beautiful thing we could ever think of. ‌To all the parents out there, instead of teaching your kids to be brave boys and pretty girls can you just teach them how to be a good human? Thanks for reading!

Please leave, find help. Look online in order to know how to best escape (do research). I escaped my abusive family, and found love, and I know you could too. I am currently homeless with a wife, and two little dogs. I have EBT and I get 352 a month for food which isn't enough to last for all of us, because food stamps doesn't cover dog food. I sleep outside on the streets, because a lot of shelters have individuals that have stolen my stuff, or try to rape my wife. Shelters also do not accept dogs. I am currently living in Santa Monica and I go to the Peoples Concern fromally known as OPCC. I look for and apply for jobs everyday, and I don't look homeless when I do. I have a case worker in Chatsworth that really needs to just be swapped out by me to another, because they have not done enough for me. I recently just took Chrysalis classes and got certificate of completion, however I have only been able to get gigs in the five years I have been homeless. Everyday I wake up and don't get enough sleep, because we been unsafe on the streets, I have had so many phones, tents, sleeping bags, backpacks, food items, and cash stolen from me at gun and knife point. I been beaten up for my stuff before, and punched in the face for just being homeless and walking with my wife. Whenever I need a bus ride I either ask for a free ride nicely, or try to not get caught. I also steal a chicken or other food when I have to, because people will ignore my sign that says I am “Hungry anything is a blessing. Please and thank you.” or I get told to get a job as I try to open the door for them. I have tried to wash windows at gas stations for change, however I get told to go away, and I never make enough money to buy food or drinks. I don't smoke, drink, or do drugs and neither does my wife. I network with people I meet and tell them I just moved and I am looking for a job.

Khushboo's answer to What is it like to be a woman living in India? I wrote this answer some days back. As I have disabled my comment section and inbox, I had attached a link to Sayat.me and Sarahah in my bio for some honest reviews. After writing this answer, I got hell lot of messages. Except a few, everyone expressed how will they rape me. WHY? Because they believe I tried to defame India through that answer but I didn't defame India per se. I only shared my personal experience. I didn't write any abnormal incident but only those which a girl experiences almost everyday. But I got so much hate.  (Image courtesy : Screenshot from Sayat.me) A glimpse of what type of messages I received. Sorry, I don't have the courage to translate it into English but he has cursed me a lot. He has used a very very cheap language. I am not an active writer but definitely an active reader. I saw many questions asked by foreigners related to teen pregnancy and all. I won't say this is common there but this isn't rare also. They share their problems. They share their views. Do they think what people of other countries will think? No. They don't care. But in India, doesn't matter how much serious is the issue Log kya kahenge (what will people say) is the one and only criteria to decide whether that problem will be discussed/solved or not. But I also want to say Thank You to all those who supported me. All those shares, comments…..thank you very much. I erupted like a volcano when I saw those messages where people used cheap language just to show their anger. I don't think I wrote something for which I deserve rape. Please don't use this word for a girl. This is very painful to hear. *Pens down*

I went for my studies to an institute. I had worked hours to clear its entrance test as it was a prestigious one. A senior faculty member of that institute has crush on me(I suppose). In initial days, he looked at me with a smiling face and I even felt that his eyes had some miracle in them. He made me feel so special, so worthy that I began feeling that he should have been mine (btw, he is married) . I could even remember his eyes, his way of looking at me while asking a question to class, his glance at me if I accidentaly looked at some other guy, his melodious voice which I wanted to hear all through my life, his everything. Results were as expected. I failed after 2 years and am not in the institute currently. I remember meeting him for last time. I was in a crowd of more than five thousand people, and he identified me among them in a second of glance. His eyes tried to speak the same untold secreat as were some months back (I was on a voluntary leave from institution due to some tragic incident at my house for some months). Some details about him: *Very very very intelligent *His age is above 30 but for me he is most handsome man ( he is actually very handsome) *Best teacher of this world *Married Some details about me: *Initially I considered myself to be very studious and focused(but now I know the reality) *Good looking *Am at the age of below 20 You know what my actual pain is? I have loved this man from the deepest core of heart. Once I saw him with his wife, I waited for him to atleast look at me once while standing next to her, but he didn’t. Never knew where was his miraculous smile that day? I understand that his heart would have torn apart between two. I have always been an introvert, a focused person before his entry and I went to his institution for a specific purpose. He made my life heaven. Just look into his eyes and I would have got all the happiness in my life. One more twist here, after failing I have been on such a vulnerable situation of life. I have to pass that exam for which I have been preparing there. Exam is after 2 months. I am here busy writing an answer for quora on him. I have no one whom I can tell this (not even quora, that’s why I am writing anonymously). Cause no one in this world could understand the purity of love between us. It begins and ends in eyes. Does anyone has a method to give me any kind of motivation in this sort of situation? But before writing an answer, make sure that do not use any bad words against him, he has been my soul for 2 years and I can never see or hear anything bad related to him. His heart is pure.

Nowadays Having a normal life is not a normal thing. let see how …. It is good to see how life proceed. You come on the earth with the help of other. You start this beautiful journey, whenever you cried there are your parents to console you. whenever you need anything there are your parents to fulfill your demand. Some spend their childhood with every demand fulfilled some might have many of them or some might be only which is necessary. You grow up and you're loved once try to provide you a best possible education which they can afford, some of might have worked hard while others haven’t but this is the normal, not everybody has some things right. But somehow you grow up more, started earning by every possible way and you get married (arranged, love or love after arranged ). Now you have a partner also with whom you can talk share your happiness or many things. After some time you become 3 from two new responsibilities knocked at your door and you get busy in fulfilling that. You try to give your child happiness in a best possible way. Time flew and you start getting old, life seems to slow down a bit. It revolves around your son/ daughter and other loves once and after completing this beautiful journey you died. Beautiful isn’t it. But have you ever thought if that boy who died before even coming to this world? Or the child who born with some abnormality. Or you have ever thought about those parents who don’t have enough facility to have a good or at least a satisfied life. Who have to work hard in order to meet their daily demand. Whenever you are going to school, have you ever paid attention towards that child who was begging or carrying a big plastic bag to pick some rage or that chotu working in tea stall to help his family he might be the eldest among all children in the family. While you are getting ready for office that boy who is getting late for his interview because he has the whole family to feed. In your own marriage, all the food which has been thrown is being eaten by the poor. When you were pressuring your child to go to school there will be children who don’t have any other option to go to work. By why I am writing this, I want you to give a thought that you need to be happy in the life when you are cursing your life for whatever it is somebody might be wishing for life for at least like you. Everybody deserves a happy life and not everybody is having a life like you so start praising it.

Okay. So, I read alot of stuff in Quora. And what I read regularly is, either few girls are gold diggers or few boys want nothing but sex. And, the answers end up by relating their story to either the nirbhaya case or the ‘Jasleen Kaur’ case. Plus I've read such answers in which the writer very clearly states the word “FEW” i.e only few of the girls/boys are like that or may be they met with such kinda people only. They don't mention the word “ALL” at all. Right? But the thing is everybody loves to read the comments. No matter what the question or answer it is, people are attracted towards the comments section. Even I'm. We read the answer and go towards the comments section. And I don't know why, I don't know who, but people comment very negatively. Like, All girls are gold diggers.All girls date multiple guys at a time.All girls care only about the looks.All girls take undue advantage of feminism.And, well, the list goes on.OR Like, All guys are playboys.All guys use girls for sex.All guys care only about the sexual features of a girl.All guys stare the fuck out of us.And again, the list is endless.So coming to the question, I want to write my heart out here, regarding this. Just because you came across such kind of people, doesn't mean everyone is like that. And, sorry, if I'm wrong, but I see nowadays alot of women bashing, you know going anti-feminist. May be I being a girl makes me see such comments/posts. But it's not that. The main point is don't ever judge a book by its cover. Yes, may be, you came across 100 people, whom you judged by their looks, and you turned out to be exact, that doesn't mean everyone else is like that. For instance, I too came across 5-6 guys who were awesome at the start, and later became creepy. But it doesn't mean I stopped talking to other guys plus it doesn't mean I started judging them by my past experiences at all. Hence, for all girls, boys are good. Very good. I don't want to write down everything which they are not. I can just tell that they are good. Same goes for all the guys. Girls are good. Too.

Yep! But, heads up for the trigger alert! It was just four days before my seventeenth birthday. I’m a really suicidal person. The week was a really depressing one, everyday, as usual, I had a fight with my parents. I’m torn already. I felt tired of all the shouts and all the sad and bad feelings we exchanged. My parents and I didn’t have what you call an ideal relationship. They are not my friends, they had said. They are just my parents, the people who will straighten me out in life. I was very depressed after one particular fight and my sister had gone home late so I was blamed for being a careless sister, for not being beside my sister. How can a busy senior student (who is also a busy club president and has, for the first time in her secondary years, has achieved a failing grade in Pre- Calc) be able to handle a fifteen year old with mood swings? How? It was terrifying. I searched up how to tie a noose or a Hangman’s Rope and practiced on all the long cloth ties in my room. I had plenty of those, mostly for tying the curtain, now for my neck. I didn’t make a letter. I had my diary. I had everything I felt there. And, I liked the mystery. I wanted people to suffer, I honestly did. I wanted people to care. I wanted to spark something. I was tired. I was tired of everything. I was tired of holding in feelings for over five years now. I was tired. I just want to disappear from this world. I tied the noose in front of the bunk bed my sister and I shared (she slept in the top bunk so if I hung myself, yep, she would see my head hanging and I hated that thought) and stepped on my wooden chair, looking at the circle the noose made. I was afraid. I was gambling a lot for this. Can I do this? I hanged my head and let go of the chair, my feet separating from the wooden chair and meeting the air, the nothingness. I struggled for a while but remembered people. I remembered unfinished goals, homework and dates. I easily grabbed to the bunk bed and slightly struggled with removing the noose I had around my neck but once I got rid of it I wanted to lie down and breathe in and out. It was a superb experience. An experience only the bunk bed and the ancient chair of mine knows. I grabbed a can of beer from the fridge and gulped it down alone. I was intoxicated, depressed, alive, and now seventeen.

I want to write my story …. because by reading my story ,at least few people will not repeat my mistakes in making their own career..yes..I am b.tech graduate…I have 70% aggregate in my academics…now I am 27 years old I don't have any job.. no savings…am 2013 passed out from b.tech electronics background. I didn't go for software side because I was scare of software field than again searched for job because of my family financial status than started working as sales executive in private bank after working 6 months thay fired me because I didn't reach the target After that job one of my friend suggested me to learn DevOps l learned DevOps and practised all the tools and methodologies attanded interviews but not selected again started job searching and finally got job in one non it company as a research analyst but with in two I got fired with no reason. And hence I don't have any job …if I get any job I fired everywhere I felt very bad…. I don't know y only me from the past 6 years I am struggling …I am women…and I am physically challenged person my family status is poor my mother sells vegetables my father is daily labour …. I want to make my parents happy I want to see my parents in rich position and I want help my sister marriage…but ?…this is my story.

What would you do if you love a guy.....but he doesn't love u back ? Maybe having your self respect intact is your call.....but it was not mine ! I loved him......and confessed my feelings to him many times....all for the same repeated result !!! He used to tell me that he considered me as his sister ( common among Indians ) !!! Pathetic no ? But......I don't know why....at the start, I never found his actions and reactions towards me like towards one of his sisters.....then what was that ? Is he hiding something.....or is he telling me the truth.....that he never had any romantic feelings about me in his mind.....were I “just another girl" in his life ??!!! Oh god I hope I never was and am, just another girl in his life. I want to be with him till the end of my breath....as his soulmate....his woman.....the woman he finds solace with in his home.....the woman who's on his mind whenever he's happy, sad, excited, technically every feeling he has.....I wanna be a part of it. I believe that he's my destiny....to be with him.....to love him, have a family with him.....to spend this lifetime with.....but wait !!!! Does he ever feel the same about me ??? Or is this a terrible daydream that's gonna break my heart to the extent that I fear to love someone else...... actually I guess I just won't love anyone else but him..... because I find my other half in him. He's just the opposite of me.....yin and yang ❤️ I have read and heard that what you is seeking you.....I just really hope that this is true.....if so....then I believe he's mine and he will be mine forever. You know what is a terrible feeling? When you have someone thinking that you are following them. When you are just on your way to your destination. It seems to happen to me all the time. I don’t know why? Do I give off a creepy vibe when I am minding my own business? Also, there is not certain time of day that it happens. It could either be walking home from work around 6:45pm or walking to the grocery store at 1pm in the morning, or lastly walking to get tea bright and early on Sunday morning. Never once in my life have I followed someone or stalked someone. It is ridiculous that it keeps happening. The person who thinks that I am following them usually takes an alternate route. To avoid the non existent threat that is behind them, being me, headed home or where ever I am going. It just really pisses me off that it happens all the time, guilty before proven innocent, when all the time I am innocent. It really makes me feel like I am doing something wrong, when I am not doing anything at all. Well that is what I wanted to get off my chest.

It’s been a while I have written anything on Quora. I have an exam tomorrow but I need to put these feelings into words. Does it ever happen with you that you found someone who is really nice, cares about you the most, and treats you like the centre of their universe and you find yourself wondering what have I done to deserve this? Or why me? Or is it gonna last forever? If you have, then let me tell you, you’re not the only one. Sometimes we don’t find ourselves worthy enough. We feel insecure and the saying “too good to be true” scares us. We are the millennials for whom if a relationship lasts longer than 6 months, we start freaking out. But then, between pretending to “not care about feelings” and “fairy tales are for the kids”, we realise deep down we all are looking for somebody who trusts us, loves us for all the craziness they have to put up with for being with us, hold are hand through the roller coaster ride called “life”. But when we do find somebody who fits into our definition of a perfect partner, we get scared. What if we blow it like everything else? What if it doesn’t last forever? Let me tell you, forget forever. If you’re loving your present, forget the future. Every next day is future. And you know you’re gonna wake up next to them the next day, then what future you’re worried about? When you feel how did you get so lucky, and how did you find this masterpiece in this fake world, you should know - you have caused no harm to anyone, you’ve been true in your relationship and you love this person so much that you are constantly thinking about being a better person for them, and that’s why you deserve to be lucky. There’s a dialogue from King Fu Panda. It says “ There are no coincidences.” You got lucky because this person was looking for honesty and a fairy tale for their own self. Just try to be a better person every day and the world will be yours. We’re so scared these days if everything is falling into place. But if you’ve been through a lot, then probably you know how much you’ve waited for this feeling and don’t let this fear take over your bliss. Everyone finds their peace one day.

Just Want to share something about my Journey…still a drop-out. I was just 14 years old when I lost my dad and mom in a car accident; only my twin sister and I survived. We both were taken to our grandparents' home. It was so tragic that whenever I think about it, it my soul feels burdened with grief. We both live with our grandparents; they are Just like our mom and dad!!;) They spend their money for us to study. They teach us the real lessons in life, like “Don’t think much about the past, it's not your fault or His (God); Its just the Karma that works!!” It took me 4–5 Months to recover from all these mental situations. Life was like a dilemma, “ I have to live it or just go in rest” was really fed up. I started maintaining a diary and wrote each and every instance of my life and moods of mine, in simple lazy papers, but I know that paper can’t reply. However, I still do the same. And I don’t share with my twin sister. She is just 5 minutes older than me. We both like sketching, dancing in the rain, having fun with pets and much more. Just doing these hobbies could somehow divert my mind from past, but again, there came a time when I wanted peace and silence, and considered was suicide. Without telling anyone, I was totally depressed and just wanted to share my pain with someone. I wrote many things in my dairy but how could that simply diary could stop me from these thoughts? I was sad and anxious about myself the day when JEE mains result was going to be announced; my heart beat really fast and my hands were shaking to see the result. I was totally broken, and just closing my eyes right now and thinking about it, I was almost in a coma state. I hadn’t eat anything that day and my grandparents were worried about me but I told them that I’d eaten food already and was fine. It took courage to tell them a lie, and it wasn’t easy; I had used my grandparents' money for educating me from a famous coaching institute for 11th and 12th and they just wanted me to get clear the exam, but I hadn’t even cleared Mains. So, from that day, I took a promise, that I would somehow control my feelings, and would do my best, so I dropped a year.

Ours was a love marriage. At least there was love from my side. He was a short tempered person always and had said some really mean things to me during courtship which I don't know why I tolerated. But one fine day, he was okay with marriage. He spoke to his parents and I spoke to mine. Things were mutually agreed upon. Right before engagement, I found he was trying to get closer to another girl. I saw the FB message and I confronted. He apologized and said he would never repeat the same. The girl, btw, had said no to his advances. After marriage, we stayed separately due to job requirements for almost 2 years. He didn't really show much interest in seeing me often. But there were good days as well. I just ignored a lot of things which gradually had started taking a toll on me. After about 2 years, we got to stay together. There were some really good days. Due to his work, he has to stay in Tier-2 cities which I meant if I wanted to pursue my career, I had to travel. I made arrangements to strike a balance between his career and mine. All these arrangements are tough given I had less emotional support. He didn't bother me with anything but wasn't interested in anything either. Then one day, he met with an accident, I took care of him as much as I could. After he recuperated, his behavior got colder towards me and one fine day, I found he was having an affair with someone who worked in the same organization (the girl was married, had a kid, and was in a diff city). It was a shocker for me because I didn't expect him to cross the line ever. He had blatantly lied about how I didn't support him. The girl has no less. She was kind of exploiting him to get her work done as her husband was abroad. Now, after I discovered everything, he cried profusely, and agreed to go for marriage counselling. My counsellor feels an year later, he is a changed person; he hadn't so far realized that I could walk away from his life and this realization had helped him become a better person. He actually tries to spend time with me now and makes all efforts to be nice to me. But my trust is completely shaken. I am in this marriage because I don't see anything great I would do even if I come out of it. I am too tired to rethink about having a new life/relationship, etc. I have zero financial dependence on him so I'm technically fine. But yeah, I am shaken to the core. I have confronted the girl. She basically didn't want any trouble so she backed off. Due to the nature of my husband's job, I can't complain about this girl to her husband. Also, I am too tired of the mess already and if I believe my husband, he has nothing to do with girl anymore. Why I am saying all this, I want to know do people change? Can a person become faithful and loving with a realization that their partner would leave them?

Well fuck it. Here I go again, maybe I am hoping of achieving catharsis or redemption by writing this answer. My existence is meaningless. There is nothing that I know of that justifies the pain and suffering that I am experiencing and do not know if there ever will be anything that can justify it. Amusement and entertainment are good, but at the end of the day. I am still left feeling lonely and sad. The only reason why I have not killed myself is because doing so would be just as pointless, as continuing my absurd existence. That and the fact that people would not look upon it the right way. It would be pathetic. A guy who killed himself because he could not get his shit together. I do not have any close relationship with my father, mother or any family member. I was always caring towards my siblings but both of them are cold hearted. My father is condescending and arrogant thus I do not feel comfortable talking to him. My mother has hurt me because when I used to have anger issues she always told me not to feel what I was feeling. Non of my parents ever gave me any advice on how to make friends. The worst part is not a horrible thought, that comes later. People are only a means to an end for me. I have never had an interest in a person as for who they are. It is always about the topic at hand and if they could prove entertaining, amusing or interesting. I love someone who does not love me and I sometimes wonder if I really love her. I do not even know her that well. To me she is just a representation of what I want. Affection. As is my curse, I do care about people who I get attached to on an emotional level, and I have gotten hurt by everyone in my family. This is something that I think of as my punishment being an actor and pretending to be human. Because that is what I am left with, to present to respond in an appropriate manner and to make that response seem genuine. It does come with the paranoia of being discovered. I no longer have that paranoia, since I no longer wear a mask. There is no point. My theory of mind is impaired. This means that while I know that I do not have the same lived experiences, thoughts and feelings as other people. I often forget this and act as if other people have my lived experiences, thoughts and feelings. This naturally causes some problems in communication and I stop acting so once I become aware of it. Here is another thing for you. I made the mistake of reading transcript of Dylan Klebold and Eric Harris diaries. The people who committed the Columbine massacre. It shook me to the core. I know that the nazis committed horrible atrocities. Yet this is just an entirely different level of disturbing. It scary, the realization that someone can reach such a state of mind. https://schoolshooters.info/sites/default/files/harris_journal_1.3.pdf “Someone’s bound to say “what were they thinking?” when we go NBK or when we were planning it, so this is what I am thinking. “I have a goal to destroy as much as possible so I must not be sidetracked by my feelings of sympathy, mercy, or any of that, so I will forcemyself to believe that everyone is just another monster from Doom like FH [Former Human,mob in Doom] or FS [Former Sergeant] or demons, so it’s either me or them. I have to turn off my feelings.” Keep this in mind, I want to burn the world, I want to kill everyone except about 5 people, who I will name later, so if you are reading this you are lucky you escaped my rampage because I wanted to kill you.” The terrible thought is the realization that when people are an means to an end. That my treatment of other depends on what the end is. If my end is good, then I treat them well, or not all to bad. If my end is destruction and chaos then you know where that leads me. What is worse is the though that Nazis are human, the school shooters were human. I as a human have the same capacity, meaning that I am capable (not willing, but capable) due to my same philical streaght and similar or above cognitive ability of committing the same acts. It is not a pleasant thought. I do no longer know what is wrong and what is right, my morality is completely fucked as I do not even know if I am evil. Because I do not have a definition of evil. I know that I am no monster. Because a monster is someone who has no rules or principles that the person adheres to be that person believes in the rules or principles. I have rules, rules that are there to safeguard me from becoming a horrible person. I try my best and strive to only have mutual relationships with people, as that will make them being a means to an end less immoral. Edit: I hope that none of you reading this get the impression that I considering doing a school shooting. Doing so would be a violation of one my fundamental principles. The right to life and self-preservation.

It's Valentine's day. I may today laugh out loud on the couples for all the efforts they would have put to make their other half feel special but not very long back I too was one of them. The idea of romance has fascinated me since I can recall. I am the guy who would shed tears when he sees the actor finally get her love in the climax. Yes that cliched romance. It just sweeps me away with it. Everytime. And yet, when I look back to my days of relationship I realise I missed out on a lot of moments I could have brought all that romance to life. It was all in my head but I never did it. Whatever might have the reason been at that moment. Why?, I wonder now. Love is a massively time consuming thing. It took me a long while to fall in love. Don't ask me if it was true or not if it didn't last forever. Whatever it was it was what I believed love would feel like. It was something I had invested myself in completely. Atleast enough to make me believe it was a one time thing. And yet I let it all slip without actually having done a lot I had always wanted to. A stealthily hug from the back. A holding hands silent walk. A big wet forehead kiss. A long eyes into eyes stare. A whisper of 'I love you' in her ears. A song written just for her smile. A hand written beautiful letter. A count of her heartbeats. A quick peck on her cheeks. A won't let you go tight hold. A mid-night 'I can't live without you' confession. A 'I will be your pillow' night. A mad couple dance in the rains. A 'I miss you' text on a busy day. A kneel down proposal with a giant rose. I can't finish with my cliched list. And, they all remained just a list. Lifeless damn words which could have been lifetime memories. I would be lying if I say I didn't feel all the pressure during the days I had to make her feel special but all these years ahead when I am miles away from it I wish I rather had someone to do all that for. No; it's not all about a girl in my life. It’s not about a lonely Valentine's day. It's not about a broken relationship. It's about me. It's about something that made me feel alive. It's about how I had it all but never saw it. Imagine a kid who has dropped an ice-cream he just bought with all his saved pocket money. How miserable would that feel. All that you have always yearned for lies right there in your feet and you keep wondering how could you drop it. But then, maybe it was all for my good. More memories would have been more pain. More words would have been more broken promises. More kisses would have been more tears. More songs would have been more sobs. And more love would have been more distance from being in love sometime again.

He was the boy who would be constantly making jokes that you'd pretend weren't funny but secretly laughed at. He was the boy who you thought was unbelievably cool in first grade. He was the boy whod talk all the time and youd complain about to your mom when you got home from 2nd grade. He was the boy who's brother was in your reading class. He was the boy you admired for being so confident. He was the boy you were in love with in third grade. He was the boy who was friends with everyone. He was the boy who teachers were constantly mad at but couldn't help laughing. He was the boy who was always smiling. He was the boy who you only ever spoke to once. He was the boy who was popular and athletic. He was the boy who was almost always with his brother. He was the boy who was constantly in detention. He was just another boy you couldn't care less about. Apparently when you know someone for almost nine years you can't simply not care. All of the meaningless memories of this person seem to be all over your childhood. Did he even know your name? Probably not, but you knew his. Did you ever even interact? Not really. But if you think back you can't help think about some stupid time in elementary school when he'd make you laugh in class. Its stupid. Why am I crying over someone i basically didnt even know? Maybe because you've struggled with this too. You can imagine the thoughts going through his head as he did it. You can't believe he did. You have an image of the boy you had to be partnered with on the school bus to a field trip lying dead on the floor. You can't get the thought out of your head of his family when they found out. He can't be gone. It just doesn't make sense. But he is. There's another gaping hole in the community you've known since you were a kid. You want to say itll all be OK but you know it won't. His friends will never be able to get over it. His family will never fully admit that it wasn't their fault. You will never forget waking up to your phone blowing up, reading the dreaded email. The words "it is with regret that we inform you" will never not make your stomach churn. You will never get over the way your heart stopped beating when you read his name next to the words committed suicide. The numbness you felt as you went about your day with the words stuck in the back of your head. You read the email over and over hoping that you read it wrong. The confusion you felt as you held back tears. Why was this affecting you so much? To be honest. You don't know. But you do know that its okay to grieve someone you know, even if not personally. So you text his friend and tell him how sorry you are. You bite your lip and force a smile when your parents find out and ask if you knew him. You write a story about him. It turns into a reflection, in a way. A reflection of his life. And your life. The way you're all connected even though it may not feel like it. And as you write the last sentence, you realize. Hes gone. And nothing will change that fact. But we might just be ok

I was tempted to answer this ever since I joined (Not long ago) I ran away from home coz of the constant nagging of my mother and also the coz of the divorce between my parents. I still feel sorry not being able to take my Sister with me (She was in school and I had completed by Engineering by then 2004) I mover to Pune as I had a friend who was here, she was able to support me to an extend. Not easy to survive on 2000 bucks right. So here I am in Pune all by myself. I was put up in a hostel which was in the most happening place (FC Road), I paid 500 and rest I promised to pay by end of month (which I was not even sure of) I was scared at times watching people pass me and all happy faces (of course I was comparing them all with me!!) I was scared if I die, who will claim my body and who will take it to my native place or cremate it! Funny.. But I used to think about it. I used to have dinner or lunch alternate days (limited money) and have plenty of water (never lost weight though) had one pair of dress that I used to wash and go for interviews. Finally past 10 days I got a job in Magarpatta – Food Coupons! Kept me surviving through. Money and enough to keep me going and 0 contact with my family. Fast-forward – made friends and I fell in love. He was nice but I guess falling in love gave me a new feeling together, it was magical.. I felt I was complete. 2005 it was. We were serious (Bloody) we moved in and we had a live in for 3 years and in total 5 years of courtship. So we decided its time we get serious with our future. We both attempted for MBA and he failed :P Still I let him do the MBA and I supported and once he completes the plan was for me to do the MBA… (By the way! When I cracked it I asked my Parents for support.. and they Denied) So he did his MBA and it was time for Job hunt for him. One of his friends Say MsB had some issues and she was thrown out of her PG, he asked me if I would be okay and I was like great! Bring her in, I will be happy. We celebrated her birthday and I gifted her a nice dress.. (You guessed it right.. I am getting there) … So one day he comes home and we make out and we were great!! He gets up and gets dressed He – “I am not sure” Me- “About What?” He – “ Whether I love you or Her more” Me – Shocked!! Numb!! “HER???Who Her??” He –“ Ms. B” Me – “WHAT???!!!!!!” He – “I am sorry, but we have been together for sometime” (Remember all of us stay at the same place for almost 4-5 month and I go for work) Me- Gained my sense back “If you think that you feel for her after 5 years of our relationship, Please be with her. She probably seems to have loved you more those 5 years of care, concern and Love that I had for you got shaken” He – “I guess so” Me – “Call her please and you two have exactly 5 minutes, once she reaches to empty my apartment, I don’t want any trace of you guys at my place” She comes and takes everything and leaves. He too goes with her. I calculated every penny and every damn thing he had for me and made him pay. I am not sure if I was right or wrong. He used me mentally and Physically and Probably I wanted to hurt him Financially so yeah. I had no shame doing that then, neither thinking about it now. That was 2008 My Dad approaches me, Old and Sick. He moves in to Pune with me and I support him. He took a voluntary retirement and spend all the money on his relatives and the only best part he gets my Sister with him. A relief for me and she completed her collage here in Pune. So my Dad stays for almost 6 years and then He convinced me to Move back to my home-town. Which I accept, Left my job and my sister was put in a hostel. We moved, The moment we landed, My Dad changes completely!!!!! He tried getting abusive and what not!! I left him and moved back to Pune (he died lonely in an old age home, I still feel guilty) So back in Pune life was getting too good!! Good Job, Promotion, Bought a house and company of my Sister!!! August 2018… I got attached to a colleague of mine. Love was in the air and we frequently fought over things. I proposed (indirectly) and He accepted. He was sure that he will marry to a girl his mother decides but will try for us… His dad passed away and at that time he needed me like hell. 24/7 he used to message and stay in touch. Literally!!! Like 24/7. 4 month down the line, he says his mother has finalized a girl and we cant be together anymore. I cried, I begged and I killed my Self-respect. I wanted this to work so much!! I loved him. His eyes had the power to See my soul and make me feel wanted. 2 months and he kept pushing me away. I used to drag myself to the work place and The moment I see him I used to loose my senses, I kept crying every-now-and-then. Finally one day I collapsed. The stress took a toll on me hospitalized for a week. He never came to visit me excuse - Was thinking to comedown on Saturday. He wanted to save his job and he was trying to keep me calm all this while. But for me its painful to see him daily and I wanna move on. Asked him to quit, though I am guilty.. I have grown in this company and doesn’t wanna go (Or should I?) I know for sure that he will have a hard time.. But I ain’t sure of anything. I love him.. still cries, Talks to him occasionally and TODAY I realized he doesn’t love me anymore. It was about his convenience and probably some good time. He was so casual and so detached. Talking about his would-be. I asked him if he was happy and he said No.. and he asked me finally you getting what you wanted!! and I was like no!! I know something inside me broke again.. I just couldn’t stop but cry and I just couldnt stop!! (I know I need to get a Grip) For me now life has stopped exactly after 10 years!! I am back to square one picking up the pieces of my broken heart and building me back again! Kind of getting tired with this and trust me if not for my sister, I don’t know what I would have done to myself. I have decided not to fall in love again… IT Bloody Hurts!! It F***ing Does… But Yea I have read stories, Painful than mine.. I joined the group to keep myself distracted. Just that I have lived this and know the pain. God bless you all.
