Indian male, 30 yrs old and an emotional fool and trust people blindly. As usual story starts with as a friend and end with as ex 😯 2011 to 2015 - Friend 2015 to 2016- Good, bad and close friend 2016 March to 2018 July- Fiancee 2018 July to till date- Ex and someone's wife Let me call myself A and other two male friends as B and C. We were friends from school, departed in bachelor's and met agian by joining same organisation on same day in the mid of year 2011 We met our batch mates who are female and call them X and Y, became friends as days passed, we completed our training of 1 month and we three boys posted to Pune which is far from our hometown and girls posted to Bangalore. We three boys along with other batchmates and friends took home for rent and we were 6 guys in 1BHK, it was fun, enjoyed our life within our little salary. I got transfer to Bangalore in Jan 2013 and followed by friend B, we switched our jobs to different companies as it was difficult to survive in Bangalore with small amount of salary. By all these days we were in touch with X and Y who are batchmates/friends and we used to meet them occassionally in Bangalore. In the year end 2014 our one more friend C took transfer to Bangalore joined us and in Jan 2015 I gifted myself a bike on my birthday We three friends started our bike rides, exploring new places, doing adventure activities, parties etc etc …most of the time X and Y used to be with us and B used to plan for all these activities. Ours became a group with lot of fights and full of emotion. In the end of 2015 a person let me call Z who was friend and roommate of X and Y joined our group. 1st Jan 2016 we six visited my home town and came back to Bangalore, X started to talk to me more than earlier days and started to care about me, earlier she was not close to me, she used to get scare of me as I was short tempered and I was not close enough to her and used to deny her opinions Day by day she was becoming close to me, started to share her feelings of personal, official, the day how it went on etc...just I used to listen to her, as I was not talkative much, I never called her unless it is very important matter or an emergency, I had little attitude towards girls and even I m shy in nature. Always used to be hi, bye friend to girls. One day we both went for shopping and visited nearby temple and had a lot of talks that was never ending, just we are simply talking, day passed like a minute, we wanted to talk little more but it was already late, end of the day I dropped her room. After reaching my room, msg from her X: reached safely? Me: yes X: day was nice with you, thank you😊 Me: thanks to u too, earlier we both had been to shopping, lunch etc but we never talked this much. X: Today I found different person in u, not the one who was angry boy.. Me: ohhhh ok.. gn X: Gn Gradually we became very close to each other as she was calling me atleast thrice a day. At her home parents were searching for a guy to get married to her but she is not interested, don't want to get married to a stranger also she wants to be free for 2 more yrs She started liking me and was giving me hint that she is liking me and used to flirt a lot, I never been flirted with any girl in my life. Topic started with marriage…… One fine day in the beginning of March 2016 she conveyed her msg regarding her marriage with me if I like her. I told her liking is not a big deal and getting married is big deal and decision you have to rethink. I explained some consequences we will face like your parents may not agree as Our hometowns are far from each other, I m from middle class family and don't have property much anyway u have visited my home and seen the situations, financially not settled, I am an average guy by looks even our characters won't match to each other bcz we have lot of opposite interest and we had fights too u are aware of these. If we commit and end without marriage will ruine our friendship. If I get attached to someone I can't leave or forget that person, dreamt of a normal peaceful life in future, If you are looking for luxury life, it's better to take me out of your mind right now. Her answer was as we are same caste my parents will agree, looking for a guy who will be in Bangalore, same has been informed to my parents earlier by me too look for a guy who is working in Bangalore as want to settle in Bangalore. I m not born with golden spoon, I too grown in poor family, still I remember our family used to stay in small house we used to drink malt. Nobody is settled in the early stages of life, looks and all not required to lead good life, beauty will go away after few years, I know to whomever I get married I need to change myself a lot, I know I act like a kid, I will change for you… My question What made you to like me ? Her answer: u are very good from heart, understanding person, u will never cheat me as u won't run or follow girls as other boys do, u r a simple man, down to earth, even our age gap is perfect, I was 27 she was 25. We started to discuss on the above topics elaborately and adding to some more topics like past life of both, she had a boyfriend from her college but she broke up her relationship in the end 2014, I knew about it but was not aware of actual reason as I was not close to her earlier, even I was not interested to dig someone's personal matter, she explained the reason behind break up, her parents somehow came to know about her relationship they are not at all ok with this as he was not of same caste. My mom cried a lot took promise to leave the contact of him and told it was ok if he is from same caste, it is almost more than year, now we are just friends and rarely talk. She said Trust me I will be loyal to you if you accept me….if I cry, you used wipe my tears, I will be happy with you…give me chance in your life.. As in general everyone will in fall in love and do these type of mistakes and I was not bothered about her past life, I was thinking of my future life, explained the same consequences which we discussed earlier like financial, distance and future etc She convinced me by giving positive hopes all will be fine, don't think too much about future.. it will go on, explained lot of things about happiness in life ..etc etc Almost 15 days discussed these things through phone calls, chats, in between we met once but along with other friends so we didn't discuss anything, she used to awake till 1 in the night to discuss these eventhough she has office in the morning, I was working in the night shift. She said I revealed my decision to Mr B who is a good friend of her and even mine and he had appreciated as good choice… She started impressing me, convincing me, showing anger towards me as I was in confusion, in the mid of March I told her let's talk face to face… we thought of meeting outside, later called me to her room as insisted by her room mate Ms Y, I went to her room on Saturday morning, Ms Y even friend for me and used to call her as sister, getting ready to go outside. She went to out for shopping or to meet someone, she told will be back in the evening. We both started to discuss same matter, in between she served tea, biscuits etc by 12 in the noon we both agreed and committed to marriage. She was lying on her bed which was in the corner of her room, I was sitting opposite corner of her bed, she called me and taunted me someone was saying if I accept you I will kiss u, reminded of my my words which I discussed in the last night, I went near to her she touched me, actually I was shivering, she hugged me, I kissed her gently…. She closed her eyes with a blushing smile on her face. That was my first kiss to a girl.. we hugged each other and lying on bed just hugging…holding hands… my mind was distracting so I told her let's go outside.. she denied.. till 4 in the evening we just hugging and talking.. I was feeling hungry and informed her, she served food we had little as we were planning to go outside. She has to get ready to go outside, she locked me in her room went to get ready. She got ready and opened door I was smiling even she was blushing… she kissed me and we went outside to have snacks… till 7 in the evening we were outside. I dropped her and went to my room. I discussed about this to my friend Mr C who was roommate too. we had beer and was happy to hear but was little upset not informed about this earlier. We planned for a trip next day that is Sunday..we went for trip along with other friends we three boys ABC and three girls XYZ ..and returned. I started liking a girl to whom I didn't like in our group..with whom I used to argue, with whom I was not happy… I used to say this to her and used to laugh and she too used too laugh.. I switched my job to day shift just after 15 days of our commitment, as I was tired of night shift job, both were happy and talking and used to meet during weekends as same as earlier when we were friends but now with the full of feelings in our heart, earlier she used to stay in our room and sleeping with 1 foot distance but now sleeping without gap and in the same bed, same blanket with me. Her elder sister got married in April, after that I insisted to discuss with her parents, she has a plan of going through broker, where we have to create lot of lie stories and do drama, I was not okay with that bcz in future if we caught with that we will be in most embarassing moment. I clearly said no lies, one day she talked to her parents, they denied. I told her let's drop it, she got angry and said you are not interested in me that's why you are saying like this, initially no parents will accept their children decision, we have to convince them, she started crying, omg somehow managed to stop her crying and she was happy for which I took effort to make her happy and told you are my life partner. Said I love you .From the day I became strong and started to treat her like my fiancee, as days passed feelings started to grow like anything, started to trust each other a lot. Had fights, patchups, trips, movies, weekend stays etc continued…intentionally she used to get quarrel with me on Tuesday evening bcz I used to go to her room on Wednesday after office to calm down her and she was happy with that, she used to prepare dinner and I would be there with her till 10 in the night. We both were happy and for me distance of hometown and looked like silly reasons. I again insisted to discuss with her parents, one day she had been to her hometown and discussed with her father but he is not ok with and said that when she was full of sorrow and boarding the bus to Bangalore her father said if you want to get married to that guy. I will check if possible next week will come and meet, she informed me the same to me and I was happy hearing this, after on week they didn't come and i asked her and she said they are suffering from back pain. We continued meeting, trips staying together, sometimes only both of us used to be there in room, situations are out of our control. Both of our bonding grown like anything. She insisted me to talk to my parents. I discussed with my parents I knew it about my parents they will not deny as same caste but my elder brother was searching for a girl to get married. I informed about mine, mom said lets finish his marriage first then will discuss. I informed the same to her and she was cool with that. She was earning half of my salary and she got a new job with good package, soon after she received her compensation annexure she forwarded me to check, shocked to see the package it was 4 times increase with her current salary, double of my salary, I was happy with that and felt little insecure with our relationship, money may ruine our relationship. I discussed the same with her and she said don't worry I will not change for money, even after marrying you I will help my parents financially, I felt happy with her words. My brother got married in December 2016 and she attended along with our friends B C Y Z, we both closely took photos and people and relatives in the marriage observed that our behaviour was close to each other, when we all friends went on stage during reception posing for photos she was beside me, friends from home town started to blow whistle by seeing us as couple, she was blushing for that, finished marriage and returned to Bangalore, again continued our relationship voyage, went to resort and celebrated new year 2107, she used to be with me in my room during long weekends sometimes by taking work from home, celebrated my birthday in Jan and celebrated her birthday in feb, completed our 1 year of commitment in March and in April we had a big fight for a silly reason during watching a movie in theatre, I tried to calm down her but she didn't, both didn't talk each other for more than 1 week. It was April end, we had been to friend's home to attend a function. My friend was aware we are not talking, at night we slept in one room, she was lying on one corner, I slept beside her left keeping half feet distance with separate blanket and my friend was little away from us. After 5 minutes of sleeping there was no gap between both of us and were in single blanket, she hugged me and kissed on me lips for more than 2 minutes, we ended our fight, slept nicely. In the morning friend woke up and saw and taunted us by saying yesterday night both were in separate blanket now in single blanket….we laughed at each other, he went outside from the room, she asked me to lock the door from inside, I did and we had funny conversation and we were funny too. I asked her u used avoid lipkiss now u lip locked me for than 2 minutes, how ? her reply was I don't want to lose you….and hugged me. Finished the function and returned to Bangalore, few days passed, she asked me to discuss with my parents as already my elder brother got married. Simply got angry and said u will cheat on me after using me… i said no way, I will not cheat you and made her feel little cool by cool words. I went and discussed in my home they took her number and talked to her and took her father's number, she was so happy and exaggerated for that, msg with lot of kiss symbols, heart symbols came to my phone from her. My parents called her parents and discussed our matter but they denied as distance was matter to them. We all were upset by their reply. After few days again my parents called and discussed, they denied. I was upset and asked her next decision as her parents didn't agree, even she was upset and asked for time she will convince her parents and continued with my relationship, it continued…she used to be with me for during weekdays taking work from home..still remember during independence day week she was with me, I can't forget those memories… going for trips, bike ride, hiring self drive car and going on long drive continued, In between I used ask her about marriage, she used to ask for time continued with my relationship, every one was asking about our marriage who were aware about our commitment. Completed almost one and half year of commitment, one of our friend suggested to get registered marriage, she denied. Few days passed I told her I will not cheat you, I will take care of you, my parents are ready to do marriage if you are okay eith. You have only two options either me or your parents, as they didn't agree at all with us. She said there is a third option, convincing my parents and getting married with their blessings….for that we need time… I believed and respected her words, also reminded her words before commitment what she used to say for convincing me… words were if you want to marry me then I will leave everything and everyone for you. In between my mom called her and discussed about marriage, she asked for sometime… Again months passed, we are discussing about marriage and dreaming of living together for life long.. etc..even planned for which area we should live considering distance between our offices.. continued till November.. we have completed 1 year 8 months… One day after returning from home town she said my parents took promise that I will not talk to you or meet you, still I m talking to you, I got shocked from that, She joined gym and even insisted me to join gym, I joined, we had less time to call and talk, after returning from office need to go to gym, after gym fresh up, have dinner and sleep as we are tired…it continued… some of the days no phone call at all.. thought of meeting in weekend.. she is busy.. calls and chats used to be long.. started to become short… 3 weekends not met by giving silly excuses, no video calls, if I call her no reply. If call is picked answer will be busy call you later… it continued.. almost for a month. In between she has met a guy, profile sent by her parents, this came to know by her roommate. When I asked her about this answer was due to parents pressure met him not to accept him, I asked her what's going on your mind as already annoyed by your behaviour, not meeting, not talking properly etc and even u have met a guy without informing me… where is the loyalty? You used to update me about everything. Did not pick the call day before meeting him, called to your all three numbers. You are calling me a day after meeting him. In the name of marriage things are getting dragged. She cried and asked me to believe her and need some time for her to convince, I said I will talk to your father, She said situations in home are not going good. I will inform when you can talk, calm down for sometime. I said ok… It was end Dec 2017 I was planning for new year celebration with her along with other friends and asked, she has plan to go home town. I felt bad and went to my hometown. Jan 2018 …continued the same action, no meetings, no long phone calls, sometimes avoiding calls, no video calls, but wished on my birthday with lot of kiss emojis, however not met me on my birthday even it was in weekend giving some excuse…completely annoyed. Feb 2018 Felt like she is intentionally sinking our relationship in the ocean and explained all the things what I am feeling about her behaviour and told straight forward to her, if she is not interested to marry me, pls tell me, for that she said need time and to believe on her. Arranged a small trip on her birthday, now she was ready to meet on her birthday… celebrated her birthday alongwith friends. After few days valentine's day I sent msg I love you her reply was just a smily emoji. went to her place to give surprise, she had just a smile on her face, took her to dinner in nearby restaurant, her mood was not good, I asked and she said she has not slept properly. Finished our dinner within 1 hour and came back, I gave a dairy milk wishing her. She smiled and said me to leave the place. March 2018 she was selected for a business trip to London and she got busy in preparing for that, I was happy for her london trip and I felt she is ignoring me bcz few things about her travel came to know by third person not by her, bcz rarely she used to call me and if I call her answer used to be busy. I understood she is busy and felt little bad about the situation. In the mid of March we completed our marriage commitment of 2 yrs, I called and wished on that day, I could feel she was happy and also felt she is avoiding me. On one Sunday she called me to meet in a mall as she is going for shopping, next week she is flying and will not be able to meet for a month and said …things between us not going well, once we get married everything will be good, she will convince her parents once she comes back from London. I was happy to hear those words and went to meet her. Did shopping from morning to evening happily, we both were happy and had one lunch shared by us in one plate. I asked her shall I talk to her parents when they will come to airport to say bye to her. She said no .. they will be in a happy mood to send me, if you talk about about us they may get disappointed, once I return from London we will talk. I said ok, Shopping finished, it was evening I offered her for drop, she denied and went by metro. In between small talks about prearing and packing etc I didn't go to airport as instructed by her, parents were there to drop her. I got a message from her about 4 in the morning, I m in airport , waiting for boarding pass, see you soon. My reply: Happy journey enjoy to the fullest, whenever you get free, u can call me. After 2 days video call from her I was happy, we had good talk almost 10 minutes, she wanted go out, got a call from her colleagues. She said bye .. Again we had small and good communication after few days… April 2018 ending she returned from London and i called her to meet on next day as we both had holiday on May 1st, but she denied by giving reason of she has to unpack her luggage an etc.. I felt bad… I called her at night around 10 pm she was returning from dinner with friends to whom she met 2 or 3 months back. I yelled at her … I can't tolerate your behaviour towards me, you are asking for time almost 6 months and I feel u are avoiding me and still u r continuing with same. When I asked u in the morning to meet you gave silly excuses and now u had been to dinner with others, you don't have time to me…you are not giving any importance to me..Iost all my patience. Blocked her in WhatsApp… I was feeling like crying… she called me back I didn't pick….kept my mobile aside making it silent. What's the hell happening with me … thinking… thinking… Next day msgs popped up in FB messenger.. have u blocked me in WhatsApp? Whole night I have not slept.. pls understand…sorry I called her and said pls don't avoid me …I considered you as my life partner .. always u used to say I am yours.. but lot of things changed in you. You know, I will not leave you..i feel u will leave me.. if you want me to in your life.. pls talk to your parents before this month end.. She said ok Again after 3 days it was weekend, requested her to meet for lunch she said ok, later gave some reasons… continued this giving one or the other reason for next days too May 2018 end… she messaged me that she is going to hometown for a surgery.. I asked about journey details and wished her happy journey. After 2 days i asked about surgery and how she is now..she replied with the answers.. I was about to chat little more.. but she gave some reason and said bye. After discharged from hospital she informed by messaging i am ok now.. she returned to Bangalore in the early June .. We had little conversation in between.. I asked have you talked to your parents… Answer was No.. I was full of sorrow. ..June completed Early days of July. my friends B and C planned for bike ride. I called her but her answer was no as she has office on Saturday. We three boys went for a ride.. both friends were aware of my situation, so Mr B slowly started to talk about my relationship.. slowly he was trying to convince me to leave her..and revealed that she has already once met a guy in Bangalore profile was sent by her parents. Mr B was a good friend of her and she used to share with him. Mr C also said these behaviours indicate she is not interested in you any more. I got angry and eyes were full of tears. We returned to Bangalore.. i was riding bike, so many things are going in my mind, after reaching I called her and said I want to meet you.. guys are saying like this.. I don't believe their words,.. Between you and me… they are third person… I don't believe third person.. when I was accepting you I didn't ask anyone….pls meet me… her answer was no… she is tired from office, she can't meet…tomorrow she will meet….now she will go to room and call as she was traveling in cab. After reaching room she called me to calm down Next morning went to her area and i asked to meet, never came down from the building to meet me… and she called me and started to explain she cant marry me as she is Manglik…she should marry Manglik guy only. Just 10 days back came to know about this… there is no solution for this. I knew it she was lieing… Started to convince her by reminding our good days, her words, promises… took my friend to convince her she was not ready… I begged her… in between she travelled to her hometown.. I cried.. and begged her..she replied I will ask my parents..next day her answer was they are not agreeing. Now her heart is not the one I loved, person who asked a chance in my life is not giving chance to me in her life…. simply dragged for more than 8 months in the name of marriage and trust…. We did so many arguments, she said she is not interested to marry anyone… informed the same to parents to not look for a guy…pls even you don't beg me…. Now so many reasons took birth to break up, Distance, status, and she said she was not happy with me, I can't buy her costly clothes, no understanding between us.etc etc Tried convincing a lot.. never came back… she was talking well during Dec 2018 I was hoping she will come back..one day she went to home town taking leave for Christmas holiday..got married. Almost after 3 months I came to know about her marriage.. when I was in her hope..she called me said she got married.. asking for sorry as cheated me. Also said everyday she is feeling guilty about this and she started to cry… I was knowing..she is doing drama just using word guilty and just to calm down me..and get sympathy..she was knowing i m in depression and suggested me to consult a psychiatrist. Later came to know about her that she has not asked or convinced her parents… since the day my parents asked them.. Just dragged for 1 year, played with the friendship, feeling, emotions in the name of trust.. It's been 1 year of her marriage, she is celebrating her marriage anniversary, I am an emotional fool writing this in Quora.

Yes, I want to spill my heart out completely for the first time today for a recurring and often unaddressed issue to be brought to light. I briefly considered going anonymous for this (due to the sheer and absurd amount of negativity this will face) but, hell, I did nothing wrong to hide my identity. Here's my story. I'm a male and I was/am harassed on a daily basis by females. Yep. You read that correctly. Females.  Warning: Brace yourself for fairly vulgar/explicit content and a rollercoaster ride of emotions and drama of sorts. Now, before I begin to narrate the following, let it be known that I’m not a scrawny, mentally or physically weak, man-child, who is easily stepped upon and has no voice of his own. I'm a 6 ft tall, 185 lb male who lifts and is, by no definition, afraid to give you a piece of his mind (and if necessity calls for it or need arises, a piece of his fist). I am also, fortunately or more unfortunately, in the eyes of society, placed among somewhat attractive males (not being cocky or tooting my own horn, just stating facts for the story to be more relatable/comprehensible). Now that that’s out of the way, let’s plunge right into it.  When you first hear the word harassment, I could bet my life, the first thing that crosses your mind is an image of a woman being teased, cajoled or intimidated by the male gender. And while I am not, by any means, saying that women are not the majority of victims abusive cases (verbal and physical), male harassment should very realistically be considered and given attention too, as well. Just because men are considered the “stronger sex" doesn't mean we don't face this issue. We do. And it can be severely extreme. Thus, my sympathies lie with ALL victims of ANY sort of abuse, whether it be mental or physical, male or female, old or young, heterosexual or homosexual, fair skinned or dark skinned, etc. Why am I so passionate about this issue? I’ve been through it. I know how sickening it is. How destroying it can potentially be. Ever since I hit puberty, I've had more than my fair share of attention via girls and women. And I won't lie, in the beginning it felt amazing, being popular, the center of attention. But over time innocent glances and subtle flirting took a turn for something much more sinister. The thing is, I've never been one, to dote and drool over sexy looks and hot girls. It sounds cliche as hell but I always preferred a great personality, sound mind and chemistry/compatibility over mere physical features. And so quite unfortunately for me, I am rarely attracted to someone because I look for certain qualities which are perhaps on the more rare spectrum to possess. And that, my friends, is what irks a handful of girls out of their twisted minds. That is the bane of my very existence. The mere fact that I am NOT a superficial person. Specially to hide away from stalkers and obssessive psychos, I have refused to be active on ANY social media platform (apart from one private account to stay in touch with a few close friends) I'm only active on Quora because I enjoy writing. And now, much to my dislike and chagrin, even Quora has become a way for some particularly nasty females (and lol a few men) to annoy the fuc*kng hell out of me. I've been forcefully kissed against my will, multiple times. Groped. Felt up. Flirted with obsessively when I was clearly not interested. Let me show you a few examples. (This girl sent me seductive texts prior to this conversation so after warning her, I blocked her. She made another fake account and messaged me the following.)   Yes, I was rude, because I had priorly, very politely, very clearly refused her advances and she didn't get the clue. I must mention, I am sorely tempted to reveal her and the rest of the girl’s identities and expose them for who they really are but unfortunately the little bit of decency left inside of me and the way I was brought up refrains me from doing so. Yet. (Also, Quora’s fuc*ed up BNBR rule, to not expose even your harassers at the risk of being banned) She then goes on to message my girlfriend the following.    As if this weren't bad enough she goes on to sending my girlfriend texts from “ME”. Yes, it was all fake. And thank God my girl was clever enough to catch on from the style of writing. (For those asking how she got my girlfriend’s account. At some point of time, I hadn't realized my followers were public)  This nutjob also publicly has touched me inappropriately.  Lets move on to the next EXTREME case from our very own Quora. This girl was suicidal and I tried my hardest to keep her from “killing herself”. The only way she would agree to live was through manipulating me into “loving her” despite me telling her countless of times that I am committed and in a relationship. Turns out she was a fake.   She was also a stalker. She had gone so far as to find the address of my workplace and say that she will wait for me there.  And then finally when she realized that I was NEVER going to be interested in her she badmouthed me and posted false lies on her account.     Interestingly when I threatened to expose her lies and harassment, she blocked me.  These two are fairly recent cases. There are many, many more strange girls I have encountered sadly. So, please do understand that men also get harrassed and something should be done about it. In my household I was taught hitting a woman is cowardly and unjust. And I have never raised a hand against one but when they are all over me against my will, what can I do? Being the “weaker sex" gives them an upper hand. I was taught to protect and respect a woman's dignity and honor. But when a woman disrespects my dignity, what should I do? This issue has truly and completely frustrated me. I am afraid it will affect my relationship even though my girl is understanding, but how long can one girl handle this much? I can't really discuss this issue with my friends either. Guys will tell me on a daily basis how “lucky” I am, or to “suck it up" and I'm ungrateful etc. Lmao, well it's certainly not fun after awhile or when it has the power to potentially destroy your love life.  Edit: Here’s a few answers to concerns some may have, as I won’t be responding to every single comment on this post. To those asking why I responded in the first place; I don't respond until absolutely necessary. Please don't unnecessarily assume that I “enjoy" the attention. The first one as you may have read, was a classmate and what started out as her trying to initiate a normal decent conversation solely as a classmate, escalated into this shit. As for blocking. Note I said I did block her. Twice. She constantly continued to make fake, new accounts to text me. What you read was a part of the conversation of me warning her that action would be taken against her via university officials and the police if she contacted me yet again with another fake profile. Secondly, how did a random classmate get my number, some may ask? She didn't. If you'll notice, that is instagram she’s messaging on. You can search up anyone on instagram with just their name. Why do I have Instagram? Its the only platform I use to communicate with my close friends. It’s a private account, but you can still receive messages from non followers. Regarding the other girl on Quora. Well, she didn't start off with harassment with the very first text. She was decent and polite. And SUICIDAL. She reached, with what I thought, was an earnest plea for help and I engaged with her and tried my hardest to make her see life in a better light. Again this innocent conversation escalated into all the shit you read above. AND she admitted to not being suicidal in the first place. I can't report the Quoran to the police because she lives in INDIA and I live in the USA. I CAN report her to the cyber police if she strikes again. I was, in all honesty, unaware of that one detail. As for those raging on why I said hitting back. When a guy inappropriately touches a woman despite being told and warned not to multiple times and she can't get out of his grip with just a warning, what does she do? She defends herself. She strikes back to release herself. That's what i meant. Please understand the context. As for the “weaker sex” comment Note, that weaker sex is in quotations, indicating that I don’t wish to say that females are truly weak, rather I’m pointing out a concept engrained in the mind of society. That being said, to those saying I should strike back physically in such situations. I will refrain from striking unless it’s absolutely, completely necessary. And if it comes down to having NO OTHER CHOICE, then hell yes, I will strike to defend myself. And last but not least, my uttmost favorite negative comments were regarding me being an egoistical, attention seeker. *Grins viciously* I won’t deny the egoistic part. Aye, I am that and much more. But, on a serious note. This was written to bring attention to a prevailing issue. If it makes me look like an attention seeking, asshole, I’ll take that gladly. Cheers!  Edit 2: I am from here forward disabling the comments of this particular post due to recieving more than its fair share of absolute negativity, and sheer spite. I will further add, nothing has been deleted, be it the negative, hateful comments or the positive, supportive ones. For the understanding ones, I thank each and everyone of you. For the spiteful trolls, may you have a successful, eventful career in trolling elsewhere! Cheers ;)

Yes! I had a very exciting moment today that I wanted to share with someone. My freshly minted one month old woke up to feed early this morning. While she was feeding, Dawn was cracking right behind me. The look in her eyes, like this is a brand new phenomenon she was experiencing was just so amazing. She was so awestruck by the sudden appearance of daylight that she promptly spilt her milk all over herself, and went on to stare at the window for the next few minutes as the sun rose. Sometimes we forget the little things, and the wonder in my little one’s eyes made my day this morning even though I had slept only for 3 hours last night.

Hii !! I want to tell you a small story of a girl , let's say her name is Siri . Her family was tiny her mom, dad and her younger sister. Her dad treated both daughters like angels. Siri loved her dad more than her mom . But the only thing she didn't like about him is his smoking habit . Siri's mother also told her to urge her father to give up that habit . Siri wasn't brave enough to say that to her dad . Years passed by , one day they said that her dad is no more . She was left with no clue as she was too young to digest what has actually happened. Later when her relatives were discussing she over heard that her dad had a heart attack and that's because of his smoking habit . She cried her heart out thinking that if she had told her dad to stop that , he would have been with her atleast for some more days. But now that tears are of no use. The person had already gone . Even after many years she still feels guilty that she didn't asked her dad to quit smoking. She still misses her dad and loves him . I request all the humans , please quit such bad habits it may give pleasure to you . But when you die of them it leaves a zillion times sorrow to your loved ones and that can't be wiped.  Thanks for reading !!

To the woman who's been tolerating me since 18 years, I was, am and will always be an impatient kid. Even to imagine your level of patience to bear with a hyper active kid is difficult. Right from spraying shaving cream all over myself to doing miserably at academics, I've always been a mess. Had it been some one else, I'd be homeless by now. I remember going on late night drives with you on that old red scooter of ours. I remember you putting a creative angle to every project of mine (Still grateful for that best file thing!). I remember you waking me up (and ruining your sleep) at odd hours in the morning because it's best to study early than late. I also remember being an idiot at most times, most situations and you still bailing me out of some serious trouble. As much as I'd want to apologize for every wrong card that I picked up, I'd never be able to thank you enough for making sure that I win inspite.  (Umm, yes, Liberal Studies was your idea, okay?). I've seen supermoms, but to pack breakfast on time and to be there at home for lunch, is a next level thing. Unlike most, you not only taught Adi to be equally involved in the household work because it ain't a gender thing, you barely burdened me with any of those. (I agree!) And no, I don't have the coolest mom in the world because she is sarcastic. It's because she doesn't mind my sarcasm. Most people might blame you for raising a "blunt" daughter. But mum, you made me capable enough to shut anybody up who dare says rubbish to me. You taught your kids to speak up when the need be, whether people like it or not. You transformed me from that little dumb girl who used to cry over guys to that badass girl who'd never let anyone (ANYONE) talk nonsense to her and walk away with it. I sometimes used to feel left out when most girls around me used to rant about how old school, narrow-minded, uncaring, non-empathetic their moms were as I simply couldn't relate. I mean, my mom hates it when I wear that typical pair of jeans, for she wore nothing but skirts and shorts during her entire college life. (Yes!) Being there with a hug after I cried, listening to my detailed analysis of EVERY minute observation that I made, discussing about those psychological theories are the things which I have (and will) ALWAYS appreciate. The thing is, I do notice each and every effort that you put in for us. The way you talk to Adi about sports, playing peek-a-boo with Desire even after a long day, cooking my favourites just because I make faces even at the sound of "Khichdi" and what not. The problem is, the chilled relation that we share keeps me from being mushy for you at odd moments. I make sure that I value all my loved ones, but what made me guilty lately is the fact that I seldom tell you how much I love you, how much important are you to me. I thank you for EVERYTHING that you do for me, every sacrifice that you make for me.Yes, the confident being that I am now who can walk in a room filled with people, with a messy bun over track pants and still act like she owns the goddamn place is all because of you. It's you who inspires me to be brave, powerful, head-strong, ambitious and creative. Qualities of a lioness, maybe? People, come on, I'm a Gemini born out of two Leos, isn't that great enough?! Mamma, you are beautiful inside out. Even if I forget to remind you, always keep in mind that you're an amazing mom(The best they have!). -The girl that'll make you proud, soon.

In this big big world where folks are putting there 100 cents in, I would like to catch your attention by putting my 2 cents in. English has been my favourite subject since then to now. When I was 8, I was a type of student who used ‘is’ with ‘I’ despite being read in a convent school. When I grew up and entered my teen age, I was sent to Kota for further studies. I started my coaching classes there in 9th and was a mediocre. The story starts from where I enrolled myself in a Drama & Speech Competition conducted by Trinity college, London through my institute. We had this lady teacher, Let’s call her R and several other students who was better than me in every aspect. It was such a big deal for me to compete with them. Before entering the class on the first workshop day, I was so confident that things would go well as R was taking those workshops and we shared a good bond but unexpected is a word in the dictionary to prove all the assumptions wrong. For your information, that exam is divided into 3 different parts i.e Poem, Prose and Mime where you have to present these 3 things in front of the examiner. As two days of workshops went off, I realized my competitors are better than me and I couldn’t even converse properly. To my surprise, R also thought the same and shouted on me one day, “ Satakshi, You have an Indian accent that is not going to help you in front of the foreigner examiner.” She also changed my poetry and gave it to another student as she thought I did not have enough expressions on my face to recite the powerful rhyme. I learnt Kathak for good 2 years so my mime was a Classical one that too added to more dislikes. In all the preparation days, I was a child who was shattered, perplexed and under-confident. Moreover, I was not given much attention by any of the trainers. T Then came this exam day, I was the first to go inside the exam room. That’s when I knew this one thing- ‘ The courage of these 14 minutes can shatter all these people who are under estimating the infinite potential and limitless passions you hold with.’ I went in, presented everything and came out. They asked me how was it, I said that examiner did’nt ask me anything about my mime. That surprised them more. I, including them believed that I am going to fail that exam. But miracles do happen when we least expect them to, same happened with me. 15 days after, We recieved the results and R gave me a call and said ‘Proud of you, Satakshi.’ I still remember those words and the expression of her face that she gave me the next day. I knew I wasn’t up to the mark but who else is. I knew there are people better than me but never gave up. I knew I was under estimated but Estimation is for digits, not passions. I knew 12 days of workshops was never enough to learn that much but I did not stop trying. I knew the risk I was taking with my mime could lead to failure but I was ready to fail at an epic scale. That’s all what success asks for. Here is the proof -:

my dad was diagnosed with cancer in 2017, i was 14.At first doctors said he would inevitably die, then a glimmer of hope came when a second opinion from a doctor said he could survive. We clung onto that hope. He started chemo and the effects were so devastating, he lost so much weight (he had previously gone to the gym every night), he couldn’t do anything he wanted too (swimming, cycling etc), he couldn’t drive, he didn’t know what day or time it was so Me and my mam would constantly get calls because he thought we should be home from work or school but it was the middle of the day and his mood would always be changing. He started getting more and more ill and would be in hospital for a week or so then be out and be ok then be rushed back to hospital. Me and my mam would try and go to the hospital as much as we could. This went on for about a year, my amazing strong incredible dad ended up being a man I barely recognised who couldn’t, talk or eat and was in a coma like state on my mams bed. I remember the last words I said to him and how he tried to squeeze my hand to show me he could hear me and loved me. Grief didn’t hit me straight away, I didn’t cry at the funeral, it all didn’t ‘hit’ me until a month or so afterwards. My mental health started to get worse, I cried every night and self harmed for a while. I eventually got into CAHMS and was diagnosed with anxiety, I did all the therapy work but it hasn’t really helped. I’ve been in CAHMS now for nearly a year now and I have only just been diagnosed with depression also. I wake up ever night at 2 am or 4 am and only get back to sleep after a few hours or I’m awake for the rest of the night. I’m just so exhausted with life. The only thing keeping me here is my boyfriend. I’m now 15 in year 10 trying to do my GCSEs and pass and make my dad proud, i honestly don’t know if I can make it through the next year. My dad would be the person that would help me with revision and GCSEs and without him I’m lost. I’m sorry for the long answer I just needed to say this.

I’m depressed majorly but I can’t get the help I need. I can’t sleep, I forget stuff so easily, I have a short attention span, sometimes I just cry without knowing why. I feel worthless and broken. I ask myself “why do I even exist? I'm so worthless here.” My parents neglect my pain whenever I’m upset and just tell me “Your a teen it happens to everyone” I came from a happy kid, loved by everyone and funny and cool. Now Instead of socializing, I go onto the internet to watch videos on how to feel happy. Whenever I cry in class ( yes I still am in school.), I pass it off as me joking to not get attention drawn to me. My grades are rapidly dropping, I don’t have a phone now. Do you know what it's like when you're at a family reunion and everyone's on their phone except you? It's saddening. I also came out as gay to my parents. They told me it was a phase and that I don’t even know what it means. Oh yes, I think I do. They didn’t even give me the talk for crying out loud. They did with my sister though! Speaking of her, she gets all the attention, money and time for everything. She’ll go out to spend money ALL THE TIME. It's not even her money. It's my parents. The funny thing is, whenever I ask for something once in a blue moon, they say, “Oh I’m busy right now, I can't!” “I don’t have any money right now!” “Oh, we’ll do that later.” It's so frustrating when they say that. Like, “Hey I have an idea! SPEND TIME AND MONEY EQUALLY ON YOUR OWN D*MN CHILDREN.” They don’t even let me make points like that in conversations. They call it rude and disrespectful. I’m so tired of living. I just want a boyfriend or a girlfriend to love and be loved back.

I'm tired of my bleeding problem. You must be wondering what's so wrong about that. Normal girls bleed in mensuration for around 3–4days or maximum 9. I bleed for around 40-45days. Yeah I have 5 free days in between, so lucky na and then again this whole cycle starts. I'm 19 and I'm facing this problem from past 5 years. My first mensuration cycle started when I was in 8th standard. I didn't took the things seriously because my mother was least bothered about me. At beginning it was around 20 days and while enquiring from my friends or relatives I discovered that it was not a normal condition. My mother took it lightly and ignored the matter. Things grew worse and the number of days started increasing. Pain was as usual but somewhere I got used to it. My family financial condition is quite unstable and this was a case that should be handled by a gynecologist which of course requires a lot of money so we kept on postponing for the treatment. Last year we consulted few doctors and decided to finally start the treatment with one of them. She owns a private clinic and she was chosen because she was the family doctor of my sister-in-law. While the rest of my near ones advice me to for a government hospital keeping in mind the financial problem, but this idea was completely rejected as it was my real elder brother who was giving the expense of the treatment and of course he listened to his wife. For around 1 months she gave me some medicines and syrups to consume. There was a bit change as my dates were shortened to 30-32 days. And after treating me for around 2–3 months more she asked me to get an ultrasound done. And it was found that my endometriom lining is quiet thick. While a normal size is of 6–7mm, mine was 16mm. She told my mother that it's a case which is found among 1 in 1000 girls. But she assured us that she's going to treat me and I will be perfectly fine. The treatment went on, I continued consuming whichever medicines she gave, paid her quite well in return. I literally shed blood clots it's hard to manage. There was no improvement seen. But yes she kept consoling us that everything would be fine. Last month it was going be a complete year with the treatment. Everyone was expecting improvement and decrease in the size of my endometriom lining. Everyone hopes were on peak. She asked for us for again a ultrasound and we did so... Yeah I got my reward for being patient, for consuming those medicines, for that irritation and that cramp ,for all our money.. When the reports were out I was not expecting anything much but a little decrease in the size of lining. When I saw the reports I found out the size has changed,.... Now it was 17mm... Yeah congratulations to me, it didn't decrease rather it increased. And the doctor was least concerned and …I tried to ask her that what went wrong and she said the treatment shall must go on. I've left the treatment and currently I'm busy with my further studies, one really needs a spear time for any kind of treatment. That day when I saw my reports I wasn't angry, sad or anything like that. I took an auto to return my house. It was drizzling outside and I looked at my reports and again looked outside and I said to myself , This small sheet of paper has no right to snatch that smile from my face. And I enjoyed the weather and said to God I know you are watching me and everything has a reason behind it so does this. Trust me I won't be giving up so easily. I returned home broke out the news to everyone and there was a deep silence and regret on their faces. And I said to them it's OK and tried to console everyone. Now we're not consulting anyone, planned to continue with a government hospital. But I'm busy these days with college admissions and other works. My mom is working and so as my brother and my father is partially bedridden. We live in a room of two. It's my 5th day today yesterday I slept at 3 am and woke up at 6:30am and till now I'm sitting. The flow is so heavy that if I lie down everything is going to be a huge mess. I literally use old clothes because the sanitary napkins aren't able to soak my flow, not even for an hour and secondly it saves money as well. I had a fight with my mother, I really don't get rest even for a day or two. now I'm used to those cramps and those irritation to my moms quarrel, my father complaining about me. Now my periods are a little shorter around 15–20 days, no not because of that doctor treatment, I guess because now there's no enough blood to shed in my body. My family didn't heard me when I tried to persuade them that this doctor is really going to make a lot of money . They don't hear me now, from what all I'm going through, least bothered is all I can say or might be they have their own tensions. My close friends know about this but hardly anyone bothers. I try to keep myself happy as much as I can, seriously I don't need anyone to be a reason of my happiness. Sometimes these consoling lines work but I'm aware that I'm lying to my ownself. I've been writing on quora and have given over 100 answers I want to write more, hey I'm not famous though. But each single upvotes matter a lot. Honestly speaking I'm tired, I want to cry, cry like hell I wish I could have a room of my own or a place where I could shed my tears out. I can't stay sad for a long time or might be it's just an attempt to hide that pain inside. Hey the answer is going to end and thanks for keep reading. Thanks for spending your time with me. I'm okay don't be worry about me. I'm there to take care of myself and quora is also there to listen to me. I don't know what it's going to be but yes I believe everything is going to be fine. I'm all good here, and feeling relaxed after writing this down. Thanks for stopping by. I have read each one of your comments.thank you everyone for your support. I just can't express how grateful I'm feeling write now. Thanks to each one of you for reading this, upvoting this, moreover for your prayers and comments their. I never ever thought people here on quora could be so pure hearted , without even knowing the person you people are so generous enough to help me out. Thanks to each of you, I literally don't have words how to express my gratitude to each one of you. Trust me while writing this down I'm crying as I consider myself one of the luckiest person as today I've so many good souls who are praying for me. I don't know why I'm doing so ,not because you could help me financially but yes I want to reveal myself. Before writing this down I felt that this something for which I should be ashamed of. But after listening to all of you I guess this is not something for which I should be blamed for. I have got this courage from all of you. I'm not afraid anymore. Thanks for making me stronger than before. Thanks for that every little word you wrote for me in the comments section.thanks for making that smile on my face even wider. :-):-):-)I really don't know what future holds for me, but I do believe it's the best feeling acknowledging so many people to support me. And yes I've found out few doctors and I just need one request from all of you just do keep me in your prayers .I'm extremely grateful to God to have so many wellwishers for me here. Edits: I really didn't reveal myself so as to get any kind of attention, no it's not the case at all. Trust me after thinking about a long time this decision has been taken. It really required a lot of courage. I just wanted to thank each one of you in the comments section ,not to gain followers or to get financial help, it has been arranged all by myself. But still I want each one of you just to keep me in your prayers. And I'm thankful to each one of you again. I really don't have enough words to express myself. Thanks for being there with me. I'm grateful to each one of you. :-):-) Edit2: the treatment is still going on and I hope it succeed just keep me in your prayers. Financially I will be able to manage but thanks for being there emotionally.

I am a college graduate and an introverted person. When it comes to expressing love to crush, introverts face a whole lot of difficulty. So let me introduce my best friend X(for privacy purpose) who turned into my crush now, and who is just opposite to me. X is an extrovert and always remains cool and happy unlike me who is serious most of the time. We know each other from last 7 years. Actually, we used to study in same school, same class and same section till our class 10th because after 10th she opted for biology and I was a maths student so our sections got separated. We never talked to each other for almost 2 years in spite of being in the same section. But when we came to 9th class I went to a new tuition class of physics and guess what she was already going there for almost 2 months. So that day was my starting journey in getting closer with her. X looks similar to this actress.  X is a very chatty girl and always used to chat in between of our tuition class to me and her another friend. As an introverted person, I just always hear what she says and always shows interest in her talks. Months passed by and our friendship became stronger than before but one day I came to know that she left the tuition. I don't know for what reason till now but I was unhappy as she was the only reason I went to tuition daily. So now our conversation was just limited in school only. I was on Facebook at that time but X was an innocent girl and she had never heard of it at that time. In school, she used to be always busy in her own group which contained only girls and I belonged to some other group which had both mixtures. X was a girl who usually doesn’t talk to many boys, so many boys from our school never thought of making her a gf. But I was the one who was a bit closer to her than others so I tried to talk to her most of the time when we were free. My friends always used to tease me that I was loving her and had a serious crush on her but I always told them she was just a friend because I don’t want them to ruin our friendship too. But deep down my heart knows how much I loved her but for an introverted person like me, it’s not easy to open up our feelings to anyone. Our FA(Formative Assessments) were near and everyone was busy studying or teaching their friends in the class. So I found this as an opportunity to get more closer to her and I approached her if she had any problem in any subject so she said she was facing some issues in Physics so I didn’t think about once and I started teaching her. Though I and she both were an average student and Physics was not much liked subject to me but still I tried to teach her in order to get more closer to her. She was a girl with no feelings of love to any boys. However handsome guy proposes her she’ll definitely say no to him. She was such a pure-hearted, innocent and natural girl that made me fall more for her but I never revealed this to her. Soon in 11th class she dropped our school and went to another school which was just next to us. We were now totally separated physically and mentally and there was no mode of communication between us. I was just dejected and can’t even tell to anyone and felt sorry for myself for not telling my feelings to her. But somehow I managed to continue with my life and tried to forget her. After we completed school there was no talk between us for 2–3 years and also I quit Facebook after getting admission in my college. She wasn’t the reason for this but I wanted to focus on my studies more. After 1 year or so I finally activated my FB account because I was missing my school friends badly. So then I came to know that she too joined Facebook so at once I sent her the friend request and she accepted within the same day. Soon I initiated the chat between us and I convinced her to exchange our WhatsApp number and now we were back to our chatty conversation in Whatsapp. By then I was just a friend to her but for me she was everything but I wasn’t brave enough to confront the outcome of my proposal so I rather kept it as a secret to myself only. After getting into college she got more beautiful and taller. She’s actually a little taller than me but I don’t mind the differences in our heights. So as a girl it is not easy to live, this I came to know when she used to tell me how many boys have already proposed her and how some boys have gone out of their limit to propose her which made her feel insecure. I felt too bad for her and wished if I was with her then she would never have to face these problems. By talking almost daily to her I was able to make myself trustworthy to her. A girl will always share her odds or goods to only those people who she believes can be trusted upon and I was that man to her. She used to share every aspect of her life to me as if I was her soulmate which made me feel more jubilant. I imagined we both sitting at a roof at midnight and she’s lying in my arms telling all her talks and I am just quietly listening to her and continuously maintaining eye contact with her and her eyes were so beautiful like the water in the ocean. But my introverted nature always kept me away from this dream to become a reality. Most of the times I used to flirt with her that how much I liked and loved her just from the school and she just replied with a smiley. So I never bothered to force her to have interest on me as I can clearly say she doesn't have any interest on me (from her replies) and I respect her feelings and can never dare to pressurize her. In school, I was physically attracted to her as at that time I wasn’t matured enough but now when I talk to her I feel a sense of warmth in my soul and I can definitely say I am in deep love with her. I know I can tell her by now my feelings but I fear to lose our friendship which bothers me a lot and she could even think that I was flirting with her. I am open to marrying her but right now I’m studying and I have many more degrees to complete and find a suitable job for me. As we’re from a small city and as a pahadi most of our parents agree to give their daughters to armymen and as an engineer, I am out of this race. If all goes well and if I find a job and she remains unmarried till then, I’ll definitely ask her to marry me. I can never get a girl like her who is so joyous, cool, genial and I promise her she gets the best care and love from me. She’s so special to me that if I don’t talk to her I feel very alone. I don’t have many girls in my WhatsApp and I never talk to any other girl unnecessarily. I talk to others either for my work or theirs but to this girl, I can talk every little thing that I want to say and I hope she remains with me my whole life. I could have also gone anonymous but I want to let know of my identity and story of my crush on my best friend. Thanks for reading!

Being a writer, several times I have written my heart out. But this time I am writing for my heroes. A letter of Soldier to his mother.  Dear maa, I am coming back soon, very soon. This time not on my feet, but on the shoulders of my army brothers. Because the moment you would be reading this letter, will be the moment when I would have already sacrificed my breath for the loam of Motherland. You never wanted me to Join Indian army and why should one after loosing her husband in the battlefield. You always kept me out of everything which would attract me towards this indulgence. But what can I do, my DNA is of my father who ever wished to go for nation.  I still remember, when I was 6, he returned home as a martyr, wrapped in tricolor with stars of responsibility on his shoulder and the sign of satiety on his anterior. You screamed that moment, you cried that moment, the government, the society, the officials, saluted you for a while and forgot you the next moment but you remained Rock steady. Maa, You have to witness the tricolor one more time, you have to scream one more time, you have to cry one more time, they will salute you and forget you again,but you have to be rock one more time. As a son, I'm a deep failure. I never done a Verdict to single drop of tear that rolled down your eyes. The sleepless nights, the empty stomach, the refusal to buy new clothes and lot more , you have suffered a lot for me, and now when it is the time to return back a fraction of what you offered; I am leaving you again in seclusion where you have to agonize even worst. The society, the mass and even the media will not recognize you as I have chosen to shoot for nation in the battleground rather than shooting in playground of any Olympic. Being a martyr, I won't be able to find even a single corner in any newspaper filled with political scams and extra marital affairs of Bollywood celebs. Despite this irony, in the battle of priority between mother and motherland, between love, family and patriotism; for hundred times I have chosen the country; and for the next hundred times I will choose the same.Because it was your sayings that someone has to waive motherly enchant to let other taste the leisure. I never got a single chance to reveal how much I love you; but even if I got that, I won't be able to tell it because the volume of words are too tiny to express the puddle of love I bought for you. You were and will be my mother till eternity and even the supreme can't deny the fact. If the Almighty offered me take rebirth, I will choose to be your son again to recieve that hug from you again, to taste your food again, to encapsulate you in my arms and to cry again. But for now I'm leaving. Once more and probably the last time I am Offering you this bitter pill. GOODBYE Yours and Only Yours Parth

Dear Warren, The first words I remember saying to you were “Just kidding”, followed by “I love you.” At the time, they meant nothing. You were some weird classmate of mine who I happened to bump into and get into a brief conflict with, after which we hugged because neither of us meant it. Little did I know how much I’d come to actually mean those words. 9th grade continued. The days became shorter. Our meetings became longer. I’d find you at the library and sit down at the same table as you. You asked my number and we’d stay talking long into the night. After school we’d walk down to the shopping district and loiter around like the inconsiderate, pubescent virgins we are. Then one day, without even saying it, we became friends. Out of the blue, we crossed the invisible line that separates the acquaintance from the comrade. Then something else happened. I can’t quite place when I began having these feelings about you, they just sprung up one day in my heart, and as much as I tried to suppress them, they spread throughout my entire body, inhibiting my thoughts, controlling my actions…I couldn’t help it. I liked you. I was falling for you. I don’t know what it was about you that made me fall. Maybe it was your eyes. Maybe it was your voice. Maybe it was your way with kids. Maybe it was your recklessness. Perhaps it was your effortless charm. But whatever it was… It made me fall pretty damn hard. And now, a month into our sophomore year, just when I thought I was getting over these emotions, you manage to steal my heart yet again. I love you, Warren Vales. And this time, I mean it. I just wish you’d actually know that.

Few days ago one of my friend send me this letter and said this is a war letter dated to 19th century it indeed written like one i wanted to know if it is fake or real dates in the letter mostly matched. can someone give a help to me. here it is West Virginia 1863 Dear Victoria, Hey there how are you it’s been a long time. last I saw you when you are sitting on the beach with Elise drinking blue lagoon that was most beautiful view I’ve ever saw. How was our little Elise? I was here today in deadly trenches of Potomac army having a rough day with my fellow soldiers. You know Victoria life is always a hell of battle every day every second we fight a hell to survive and protect our loved ones physically, emotionally, mentally. this warzone is I’m in now ain't nothing more bigger than what you are facing in house alone in my absence don’t be angry on me if I don’t return home for this Christmas cause you know a soldier’s life. The days we fought in together in 66th regiment in Crimean wars and that’s pretty how I met you it was this war I brought us together. I wish our life would have been more simple and normal. I always wanted you by my side. But god had made a different plan for each. I wish I were never in the army but if it would not have been for me this could be for some other guy and his family from here world seems more wicked honey as I came to know fate drives people and we just refill some others place in world. At the end all that blood and sweat of our soldiers is taken for granted and we are thrown a bone to celebrate. Victoria believe me I have seen men here great patriots dying and lying their life for countries but their stories lie vain and remain as unsung songs. I have seen a man here he was called iron heart it was given for his contributions to army brave guy and a brilliant strategist last time I saw him he faced 200 men alone with his gun which was a new prototype hand cannon called Gatling gun invented just previous year. God! what a move the man got. it was like his other hand in combat he was unstoppable we won the day but un-fortunately he sustained lot of injuries In battle and died a hero. What moved me most is we found a photograph in his shoe it was his wife and two daughters photo was blurry and there were marks of tear drops on it and when I flipped it on the back there was written “I will reach you today Joanna” and it was dated the same day he died the man knew that day he was gonna die that day he prepared for it he wanted reach his deceased family by killing the army responsible for it. What a victorious end he had. We mourned for him and more happy as he avenged his family gloriously. Such are our stories in war. I’ll tell our stories to our little Elise when I return from war and if I didn’t please don’t be angry Honey just take good care of my little miss tell her to see me in stars. Tell her I’ll be with her and looking at her always. She is really lucky that she had a bravest mother on earth. we just have two options now be a hero and lose everything for countries sake or be veteran and return home to our families both are noble ways but painful is one. I hope I’ll see you in next letter Honey. Pray for us I love you till my last breath YOUR R.M.S

A little Long answer but please do read For my jee preparation I went to kota because I really wanted to be on my own, and my two friends also joined me(assume X and Y),we lived in same hostel went to same coaching.We all were well known to each other as we lived in the same colony for 2 years . So coming back to kota,we made a lot friends in hostel,everything was going very smoothly I was performing good in monthly exams so was X but Y didn't perfomed so well and gradually his rank deteriorated .Me and X's room were adjacent and we also shared the balcony (he also was my closest friend) while Y's room was on other floor.Suddenly in class 12th Y started getting pretty amazing and so did his batch improved even better than our whole group.We all thought that he cheated . On the other hand X started getting poor marks.Near the end ( October)I broke my ankle badly so my parents took me back home.And when I returned to kota in January it was all chaos- practicals,pre boards, mock jee mains paper in coaching everything on my head and I just couldn't handle.But this wasn't the end of my trouble .While our practical examination I came to know that both my friends(X and Y) were sc and st respectively, as mentioned on the roll no. list and I just couldn't believe.Forward to jee mains result day I scored 137 (expected 200+) and X scored 84, ten more marks than general cutoff Y didnt clear his cutoff only.I just couldn't concentrate on my advanced preparation due to my bad performance in mains and that my closest friend was sc who always falsified that he was general candidate. I knew that I won't be able to get a good rank in jee advanced and that only happened.I got 87 marks three less to be in the second merit list.I was really upset because everyone in my family thought I'll crack jee with flying colours. And in all this I came to know that X has got iitr metallurgy, I was shocked.He didn't deserved to be an iitian.All time during the last months of jee prep I could only see him playing mini miltia or reading novel.On the other hand I was getting vit ece some not so good nits and bits Hyderabad mechanical.But I decided to take a drop against everyone saying me not to,because I know i didn't do my best and also due to my untalented friend X who became an iitian.Now he keeps showing off on fb and I curse myself for not studying at the right time.I don't have anything against reserved category people but the creamy layer shouldn't get as both of our dads are government class 1 officers , paid the same rent of our hostel.And the sad part is he still thinks that I think he is a general candidate. How to feel better as I am always frustated about this.( sorry for mistakes if present)

I want to because i’ll never get another chance. but i’m completely empty, everything sounds stupid and i just want to try and let something out. i’m only in my second semester of high school, but I been going through the same existential crisis sense 5th grade. I have great friends that make me laugh but it just temporary because the second I stop laughing I just remember when I nearly killed myself and how I wish it worked. I love art but I just wont pick up my sketch book or pencil. I love writing but I can’t get words right. I love guitar but I can’t get the right cords. I don’t want to do anything moving is something I have to fight myself to do. I don’t get why i have to do something just to get a grade that means nothing. I don’t see why I have to live when people have told me the world is bullshit and pointless. WHY WOULD I WANT TO LIVE HERE! I DON’T BUT YOU WON’T LET ME FUCKING LEAVE. I KNOW I’M GOING TO DIE ALONG WITH EVERYONE I LOVE. SO WHY DO I HAVE TO WAIT. I wont kill myself today or tomorrow or this week or this month or even this year but I will leave early and on my own terms. I love the people that i know and I wont leave them here. but I don’t matter they’ll leave and keep going and I no one will see me or know what I looked like. I don’t fear death or pain. I believe in rebirth and spirits. I’m an anarchist and vegetarian. I love my chemical romance, fall out boy, panic! at the disco, green day, nirvana, red hot chili peppers, AFI, and death cab for cuties. this is the most i have ever said and probably will ever say. Bye…

1: 22 years old 2: Final year BE student 3: Single 4: UPSC aspirant 5: I stay at PG 6: I love to stay alone 7: I enjoy my own company 8:Am so lonely I never hangout.. not even on weekends. 9:It's been years since I attended family functions 10:I go mad when parents and relatives talk about marriage proposals 11:I don't know if am in depression 12:I lost many friends because of my avoidance 13:Sometimes late nights..I cry myself thinking about my future. 14:I reject love proposals , because I never want to get distracted by anything 15:At one moment, I feel I need someone to express all my emotions.. 16:Am so lonely inside, I carry that virtual smile on my face 17:Yes, Most of the time UPSC preparation itself makes me feel depressed,alone. Finally , i remember that UPSC is not just a test of knowledge, but a test of hardwork, patience ,persistence ,etc .. Thus, it keeps me moving forward in life ..

Aj ankhon me ansun liye, Ye ehsas hua ki zuban se bolne ke liye tmhare liye shabd Kam nahi. Shabd ki bahar hai. Par tum ab sunne ke liye ho nahi. Par Mene Apne ap ko sambhal Kar rakha hai, Badi mehnat se rokk Kar rakha hai, Bade mehnat se bas tham kar rakha hai, Samay ke Sath me galat sabit hua, Me har sa gaya. Tumhara aur Mera rishta alag hai, mere liye. Tumse dur rehna behtar hai, tumhare liye. Tumhare baare me nahi sochna, na mumkin sa hai, mere liye. Tumse pyar Karna ab mushkil sa aur dard bhara ho Gaya, mere liye. Itna pyar Mene khud se nahi Kiya. Hamesha tumhe hi chaha tumhe hi puja Chahta tha tumhare pairon ko chumte jau, Chahta tha unhe hatho me pakad Kar. Unko jhuk Kar rote huye tumse Apne pyar Ka izhar Karu. Tumhare liye kya Kuch na Karna Chahta tha. Par sab kuch ab mushkil sa ho gaya hai. Tumse pyar Karna ab mushkil sa ho gaya. Tumhare Sath rehna ab galat sa ho gaya hai.

In all this my spouse blamed me for all the mess and stop communications totally, only calls or speaks if there is issue with money or childrens issue. No emotional support cannot discuss this with any one. I go to gym and get in good shape physically.
