Ya.i want to.i don't know how to start.i am a medical aspirant.i gave my neet this year.its my 3rd attempt(and I hate it.i still feel regretted that I should have got a medical seat in my 1st attempt.anyways who can understand the problem of a girl who had anxiety,inferiority complex,depression,reduction in concentration power who was just 16 then:) I feel like I might get last seat in last college.the counselling is going on. Family wants to join me in payment seat.but I don't want a payment seat.i hate to join in payment seat and be a burden on them. My family has been very supportive (every family indeed:)and has done so much to me till date since I was a child. Dad has also been very sweet and supportive and concerned and he still is. (Of course every parent is:))but these days..I don't know.i mean I am not ok.dad became angry when I didn't get seat in 1st counselling.ofcourse the anger was only out of concern I can understand.buttt when I saw the official key and then the result,the result showed 10 Marks less than my marks.i couldn't understand why.if I ever got my original marks,i would have got seat by now.i don't know why it happened like that.i feel so unlucky right now.there we're numerous times when I cried just in last few days. No proper food wen I cried,no proper sleep,getting tired of crying,my eyes used to swell and pain.kept on thinking about my past 3 precious yrs and wat shouldn't have happened but happened.wat happened? I'll tell u.. Anxiety.depression.inferiority complex.confusion.reduction in iq.zero self confidence. Everything was fine till 10th.friends,studies,school,sports,home.perfect everything was.becoming a doctor was my dream sincee... I was a kid. Infact it's my passion too.i love biology a lot soo.yeah and so got into a gud junior clg.took bipc.i thought everything's gonna be 5ne now. Infact I was happy because it felt like getting closer to my dream.but thts were it all started.1st 2 wks of clg,I was sad bcz of end of school days.frns kept on coming to mind but eventually I got better.nxt came inferiority complex.i have to tell u my clg girls most of them were pretty.i have spots and pimples.they were spotless nd radiant.[i was 16 den. So feeling lyk dis mi8 be common and I guess:p but it was of high intensity fr me.]nxt came dpression anxiety,everything 1 by 1.i didn't knw what was happening wid me.i was such an extrovert in skool.but here,I couldn't talk wid any1 even if I wanted to.i dint knw hw days passed. No change in me.ultimately it affected my studies a lot in the initial days of my clg itself.i couldn't remember what I read the previous day,I couldn't understand even simple topics.wen I started reading,my mind used to be… just..blank.i became such dumb.i was a sharp student in skool.infact I couldn't figure out what was the problem wid me.i used to hide frm evry1.relatives,frns,even my best ones for no reason.i didn't know y.had evry thing to chill.but couldn't.evryday i used to fear to go to clg.evry mrng i used to wake up with a heavy heart.every hour,i was anxious nd tensed abt wats gonna happen nxt. It was lyk..a blanket covering my face totally to fight for breathing.i used to cry even wen mam jst talked to me normally.skool frns wer enjoying evry day at tht tym,and me..i was sitting in my room,alone,trying to figure out wat happened with me.Evry class used to make me only tensed.after all these 3yrs nw I knw it.had I known it before,..the story would have been different. Anyways,+2 also came.same scenes evryday. No change. My regular routine of crying most of the times started here.i would even fear to talk or sit beside those girls who were intelligent nd sharp in studies.i would say this was my peak stage of all the above bold letters.evrymrng,underline evry.i used to wake up wid heavy,paining,burning,eyes.indicating lack of sound sleep.and I dint knw this also before.but still I didn't lose trust in me.still I somehow tried to study by wrote,by mind mapping,and other stuff.i scored Gud in boards but couldn't score to my potential. It still bothers me. Gave neet.got panick attacks in the exam hall.couldnt crack it.dropped a yr.same scenes of bold letters but this tym intensity reduced.but still those sleep prblms.couldnt crack neet again.felt low. shattered.broken.dint knw what to do in future.dropped again.not those bold letters any more.(i don't hw they went off.y dey cameee y did dey gooo..I still don't knw.)satisfied wid my performance dis tym:)but due 2 high cutoffs dis yr..seat result kept waiting.evryday tension.couldnt show my face to my dad. At 1 Point I lost confidence in me and felt I can't study mbbs bcz I dnt hav that potential. But deep inside there is still a ray of hope in me.hope is what that keeps us alive:) My mind has been very unstable these days.within seconds just lyk that it's changing thoughts.sumtyms I feel high.sumtyms low…I dnt knw.mayb things will come to place wen i join my dream course:) All that I want to say is,1]never lose hope.2]never doubt ur worth.3]trust urself.4]never ever underestimate others.who knows if an ant can climb a wall.never judge any1 by their looks.they r much beyond the way they luk.5]never be overconfident.have confidence in u.not less.not more.its very important. It can make u do things. It takes u forward.6]always trust the above 1.he ll help u through thick and thin.and most importantly, very very important,7]get urself CHECKED in case of ANYkind of mental illness.dnt be ignorant and unaware like I was. If at all u r not being the one you are,get urself checked.even if it's a small change in u.they can happen anytime unknowingly to any1 of any age. (my bold letter frns have ruined my 3 precious and important yrs of my lyf.c hw NYC frns I've got;)family has been very supportive so those dint bcme sooo chronic.though I dint share anything wid dem abt my condition)8]always do hard+smart work and trust it. It always pays off.9]u R beautiful the way u r.ofcourse thr r ppl much prettier than u. U dnt hav 2 feel fr tht.u dnt hav 2 fake urself.u WILL B beautiful fr the ppl who love u.fam, frns, any1.accept and luv urself.even those spots and pimples will look like cute polka dots:):)10]sound sleep is very very important.11]be a WARRIOR. always…Sumtyms things dnt go pretty much the way they have 2.situations turn upside down.unexpexcted twists mi8 happen.dnt worry.its just 2 test u how strong nd smart problem solver u r.thts it.pass dat test wid distinction:)Thts it.from a 19 yr old. The lessons I have learnt in my 3 yrs.I ve always been a silent reader here.but today wanted to open up soooo:).my first answer:)

Yes I wanna share a story of my life which I can't share even with my best friend because I don't have any. It all started when I was in 12th standard till then I have met so many people some of them were my best friends too but not for very long time…. So when I got promoted to 12th standard I didn't have any best friend that time of course I did have some close friend but I can't say them my bestie.... So coming to the point, It was the date of 8 may and the timing was about 7:30 pm I had stopped using facebook and I usually opened it sometime but that day I thought of seeing friends request ( I'm a die hard fan of astronomy and physics since my childhood) I saw a girl's request before accepting her request I started checking her profile I had come to know that she is also interested in astronomy.. Of course that was one of the best feeling I had... After I accepted her friend request she sent me “ hi ” first and then asked “ are u interested in astronomy too ” I said yes... There come the turning point.... We started talking to each other for 3–4 hours on that day she asked for my contact number I was surprised because I used to talk less to girls and seeing a girl asking for my contact number was a strange feeling for me I gave her my number… Next day she called me and I had a really awkward conversation with her because I'm a shy type of guy with girls… after sometime she made fun of me and started calling me “Mr. Shy” I didn't understand what should I say I said that's a nice name.... As the time passed we became close friends (we were only LDR friends and we met only once) and later we became best friends I often thought it's really very lucky to have a bestie with same craziness as urs we used to talk a lot I mean we used to talk sometime 16 hours I didn't know what type of person I became from shy to a totally Frank guy with her.... She told me about her life and career and we planned to study together and do so many things in future but time changed everything, I started feeling love for her... I mean not only friends but lover one... I decided to tell her about my feelings and it was a new year's night and the timing was 12:05 am I told her everything from my heart she already knew that I have feelings for her but to my surprise I was not the first person even she told me first that she loved me but later we decided to be only friends until we won't complete our studies As the time passed there came a turning point in our friendship..... A strange guy came in her life I didn't think that because of him I would lose something in my life I started feeling jealous because of him whenever I text her ( That guy was in her college) he also came online and started talking to her later he called me and told me everything about him because I asked him everything indirectly.... I was damn sure that because of that guy distance between me and my bestie would increase…. Later he started sending me screen shot of his conversation with her to make me jealous and I knew that my bestie was friendly with most of the people but still I started feeling jealous because of the things I saw in those conversations I decided to ask her about this but she took my question emotionally and started saying me that I don't trust her I broken her trust later I showed her proof that he was actually a very bad guy for her so she would have to break their friendship. She agreed with me… Later as her summer vacation began she started doing internship in her university I had no problem with her decision but later I realised that she started avoiding me before she text me first later until I won't text her she didn't say even hi I asked her “what happened to you yaar ” ? She said, “nothing I'm busy due to my work I will talk to you later ” that's fine I accept That after some days I found that she is online talking to other friends but not to me I asked her reason so she said me “just go away from my life I don't wanna talk to you now ” I knew that there might be have any problem that's why she was saying like this I asked her reason but she didn't say anything.... I was very hurt due to this... After 1 week she texted me and called me because I was so much hurt by her behavior (also I was frustrated because I had to find college for my bachelor's) but I didn't reply her and after sometime I sent her hi but instead of understanding my situation she got angry on me and said me “ you are arrogant and egoistic type, you are angry that's why you are not replying and now I don't wanna talk to you ever forget me and our friendship ” I didn't understand what to say now I told her everything about my situation but still after some hours she blocked me :-( :'( I lost one of the most beautiful person in my life without actually knowing why she was behaving so rudely with me …. I have decided to move on but still I can't forget that she was my bestie once :'( :-(

Could I have been different from who I am in now? No, today I ll face me. If I could go back in past, Would I be a different person than What I have been all this while. Had I worked harder and done anything to score better marks in 12th. I see it now, but not that clear but I can see. Would I had done anything for better grades? I knew, how important college is going to be. Next 5 years I ll be spending in there and that will eventually impact what i become as a person. I remember myself making plans to study hard and later cursing myself for not completing my almost unrealistic targets and ultimately falling into depression, willing to suicide multiple times a day. Then another escape I found from the fear of death and to lower sense of self-worth that I was feeling disgusting and suffocating in. To plan to run away. I was fully prepared to run with an another almost unrealistic plan but with time interval of long term and so I can have my optimistic fictual plan in some dark corner of my mind in the deception of uncertainies of future. and here I sit now, completely different from what i could have imagined two years ago. I never would have guessed or imagined myself, in this condition, writing this, If I were asked two years ago. You never know, how conditions that surround time will change you. Still, you need to plan, If someone ask me right now. Where do You see yourself after next 5 years? I feel pain of fear in the bottom of my chest. We, I think are too fragile for not be broken. Coming from college, all the way thinking about drinking the potion to dive into last sleep. The proper alignment of sentences for suicide note which I eventually abondoned to write. Right place to suicide and the news it ll create if it be a public place. Getting irritated by the stupid question those dick heads asked while I was trying to understand pinacole- pinacolone rearrangement, makes me question myself Could I have been at a better place and that is where it all starts. Was it same in school too? Yes, I have memories of yogi trying to play that role while I was trying to maintain my calm. Bringing more persons to your life which you've been lately trying won't improve you on your carrer path. It is a separate endeavour, only you can pull yourself forward on though youll definitely need help. At moments, I say to myself, "Just cut yourself to last sleep, *Suicide* or put your ass on fire to study hard. You had begin a few times. You start feeling good about yourself and again slowly slide into depression of unworking still body.

I fell in love with someone who has DID… I fell in love with his fingers the first time we met and from there we got to know each other more. After 5 years of being friends and us knowing we liked each other but afraid to get into a relationship, we took this chance to be together. Only thing is, this relationship was destroyed because he no longer has control of his body and the person that is out may recognize me but doesn't feel anything for me. The hardest part? I don't know. It's either because I have BPD it's hard or because I'm helpless that we currently reside in two different countries. It took us so far to get here yet we have to be apart again and this time, he doesn't even care about me. So what do I do? I alter all my memories to devalue him and to numb all my emotions. Until I lose it. But unlike before, I can never devalue him but only blamed everything on me and the reason why he ended up this way was all because of me. I want him back yet I have to live without him. I dream about him every night yet my memories are slowly fading. My emotions change every second that, I could feel like years have passed but in reality, not even a day has passed. But you know what? I have to fight. I have to keep fighting and survive because I can't kill myself. At least not now. So what should I do? He asked for the rest of my life and abandoned me because another personality came out. When will he ever come back? No idea. Maybe after I end my life will he come back. Maybe… maybe I should just end my misery as soon as I can because at the end of the day, everyone just abandons you. I have myself. So maybe if I rip this memory of mine apart and forget all of this, will I finally be free from this toxic BPD cycle? Then again, I'd prob feel motivated in the next moment so who knows… In the end, he lied.

I'm contradictory. I am undeniably a very shy and anxious person. I love to stay at home, and watch rain, or sit back in a chair and just think. I absolutely love doing these things, but I don't. I don't because my entire character also craves the social presences of others constantly. This contradiction forces me, and socially anxious and shy introvert, to become some sort of confidence-beaming machine. If I am not talking to someone, then it hurts. I have a feeling of utter loneliness and desolation. I feel helpless and sad, and suddenly, vey scared to talk to anyone. Because of this, I get stuck in a loop of craving somebody's company, but being to anxious to seek them out, which then causes me to feel even worse. This cycle continues until the next school day, where I have a long ponder on the way to school, and then inevitably start a conversation with someone when I get there. Most people than know me would describe me as confident. Those same people will also be surprised upon reading the previous paragraph. It is true. I am a massive introvert. And I don't think many people do actually appreciate the things I've seen, and think I'm just some hyper guy who comes to school with a smile on his face everyday, and therefore is always happy, and therefore does not need attention, as he is content. But, he is not happy. He is living a façade and your are stopping him from breaking the illusion.  I have wrote this all down because I'm feeling lonely, and it's Friday. I have to wait until Monday until I'll be content. This whole thing is just a reach out for somebody to message me. But it won't work. Even if someone does message me, I'll know deep down that these are just people who want to improve their own self image by 'helping' others. Deep down, I know this person does not care for me. So please, don't reach out, don't come to me on Monday and go 'Caleb, are you okay?' or, infact, say anything in relation to this paragraph. I don't want your help. I don't want you to look at me any differently because you realise who I am. I Don't Want People To See Me Differently. And truly, the fear that people will see me differently, Treat me differently- it scares me. It really does. I do not dare open up to anybody in fear of this. So what I'm gonna do is I'm probably not gonna show anyone this. This confession will never see the light of another students iris. - Caleb I wrote this a few hours ago. I've decided posting it here is probably better then keeping it in my phone. Please don't worry about me. I'm just fine.

it was a beautiful day for me. I got a personal message from Soumya, met her last week. She was one of the prettiest girl i ever met. This was this massage form her. Well, it was the best thing that ever happened to me in years. Giving myself a chance to explore and connect to myself as a woman and being. You are a thorough gentleman. Your eyes had warmth and your touch fleetingly gentle, leaving me to respond at my own pace. I didn’t expect I would feel so comfortable. I guess it was the way you are, not pushy, only focused on me and my flow, without making me feel stripped or as an object of lust. You had a warm voice and spoke of many things under the sky, sharing and asking, easily bonding for me to open up.I liked the fact you were willing to meet even if there was no sex involved. That you were concerned with my wants than your needs. You didn’t unnecessarily flatter me, but offered genuine compliments. You were also playful and yet mindful as the conversation flowed and soon my consent followed. Yes, we did it. And again you are the best lover I ever had. I wish more men out there knew how to lead a woman, how to treat a woman, how to be gentle in moves…. Knowing a woman’s mind is the only way. And I encourage every woman in my situation to take a chance… Thank you James. 😘 There were little more but I am not sharing that here,But this made my day.

Even if there was, I think that someone would share just bits and pieces. After all we are all sensitive and we will avoid suffering again while writing our heart out. We are fragile. We don’t invite blame, shame, ridicule. We fear to be fragile openly, we don’t want to be hurt by insensitive people. Fear of all kinds can be won over but most of the people often have no idea they have fears. Brain retraining deals very successfully with fears: fear of speaking, fear of not being liked, fear of failure, fear of losing your friends, fear of hurting someone etc etc etc. The list is very long. [1] A story could be felt nicely with a nice song. Few words, big feeling.  Footnotes[1] Top Mind Top Body

response.answer_text: Yes, here, there , everywhere and all the time. I have just spent the last year caring for my mother in my home. She died 2 weeks ago and I can’t seam to find myself. My mother was a hospice patient but up until the last week of her life she was so much herself and I really thought I had more time. I miss her so much and the drudgery of trying to fake it is almost more than I can stand. I wonder if everyone feels the huge hole in the universe. I want the world to know what an amazing person she was, so strong, funny, brilliant and good. My husband died 4 years and 1 day before my mother and I felt lonely and confused, died suddenly with no notice at all. I thought because my mom was on hospice and 89 I would be able to understand when she passed away, but no I feel my greatest childhood fear has come true.

5 Year old GIRL Dancing for a penny.!! With a large honking sound, Train arrived at platform number 5 of Chennai Chetpet station. As usual the crowd was full in the platform and everyone was trying to board the train so they can occupy the seats inside. I was watching them sitting nearby in a stone bench. I usaully board at the last,so i can stand near the door and enjoy the scene with the headphones On. Train started to move parallely when i boarded at the last. Made myself comfortable and was enjoying the view, the trees were green and i can sense the humidity of the air in my face due to last night rain. The travelling time was 40 mins from Chetpet to Velacherry station(chennai). Everything was going fine.Until then 15 mins from the departure, i heard a strange matured voice singing at the corner of the berth.I ignored it at first but it kept on increasing. Removed my headphones and saw a matured women singing and asking money from the passengers. It was a common thing to spot in any indian railway station, but the next thing which i saw almost filled tears in my eyes. A little girl around 5 years was holding her mother's pallu and following wherever her mom went. My eyes were tottaly on that little feet of her. It was following the same steps of her mother's. As soon as they both came to the berth where i was standing. The crowd made a circle automatically With the mom and little girl standing at the center. The little girl was wearing a filthy top which matched with her almost torned frock.The mom took a ring from her dirty one-sided bag and handed over to her daughter. The ring was not more then a span of 30cm in dia. And to my shock the little girl performed tricks by inserting her whole body inside it and Parallely her mom was singing song. I was like “what the hell!! Why is she doing it with a 5 year old girl?? Did she not have anynother option then doing this kinda things?? Please stop doing this". My mind was constantly murmuring this words. After the drama, the girl with a plate in hand asked money from from all the viewers standing nearby. She came near me,shaking her plate with coins. She was so little that her height was equal to my knees. (Similar to this) Google image:  I kneeled down to match her height., Me: Nee Romba azhaga iruka..Un peru sollu apo dan kasu kudupen!! (U look like an angel,tell me your name first then only i will give you what you want.) She: Bohut bhook lagi h! Paisey dedo kuch. I figured out that she is from northern state, so i switched my language so i don't feel like dumb in front of all the passengers looking. Me: Paisey toh dunga, pehle naam bath do aapka.(Please tell your name first, i will give you whatever you want after that). She: Kajal (in a husky voice). Me: Achacha Kajal, mere pass paisey nahi hain par khaney k leye bohut chocolate or biscuits h!! Chaiye aapko?. ( oh!! Kajal, great. I don't have money right now all i have is lots and lots of chocolate and biscuits.Want? She: (With a large smile) chocolate sachi mein?? ( wow!! Chocolates!? Really??) Me: Haan,bohut h, Lelo.( Yes!! Take this all) Handed over a bunch of chocolates and good day biscuits from my backpack. She was happy, and accepted my offer without declining it.Her mother from behind saw it a gave a brisk smile. They moved to other berth continuing their work. And i was recalling all the incidents happened. The eyes of the little girl was constantly crossing my mind. My mind was like, “ Please god, why are you doing this to a small girl like her. Why did she need to beg?? What did she do, Please provide her a good education.” I don't have any friends in real, so quora is only platform where i can share this that why Iam writing this down here I Hope everything to that little fella happens good. Hereafter. -Asveen Paulzon

I just wanted to say that I am still here. I am almost 34 years old and I am living with severe depression and anxiety, fighting since I was 12. Actually that’s wrong, I need to go back further to the beginning. I was three weeks late, and both my mother and I almost died to bring me into the world. She said I always did things in my own time, and that has not changed much. Mom said she prayed for me to be “unique and different”. Some days I wish she’d asked for a “financially successful” child instead. I loved my family but with my anxiety and depression, I became a recluse. Fear prompted me to hide the things I loved to do the most. I couldn’t take the questions about my artwork, my interests, my anything. Combined with a parenting style that included berating me for things I could not change, it was a recipe for disaster. I went from loving to learn to skipping school. My high school teachers asked me if I was “miserable” or if I “had any friends”. I did, thankfully, but thinking back now, I can see where these questions came from. I was a very quiet young lady, quite different from most of my peers. If not for alternative school and Adderall (which later I found out that I was misdiagnosed), I would have not graduated on time. College was even worse. I WAS miserable, avoiding classes and feeding my agoraphobia. I was lying to my parents about my grades until I eventually flunked out. I tried a couple of other colleges, repeating this cycle. I had become quite good at masking my pain. I also developed a healthy fear of higher education. So I sought employment, and was even able to support myself for a time. It didn’t last. The longest I held down a job was one year. Unfortunately that is my current record, and that was back in 2006. I was smart and people savvy, so finding a new job wasn’t very hard. I’m sure if I included every single job I have worked no one would trust me to watch a pet rock. I made job hopping a profession in itself, a Jill of All Trades. However, I was a master of none and I was unhappy. Not too long after, I was 27 and reunited with an old crush from high school and we decided to get married. Or maybe I should say I wanted marriage and he just went along with it. That should have been the first red flag, but I chose to ignore it. After that things seemed to be perfect, funny enough. I had a good paying job, enough to buy a car and handle most of the bills. Things seemed to be looking up. Suddenly after seven months of working at this job, I got very sick. I could hardly eat and my stomach hurt almost constantly. I kept going to the doctors, getting told the test results were “normal”. I tried to different diets, cutting out certain food. I even quit smoking marijuana, thinking it might be the culprit. Nothing worked, and I eventually resigned, doubled over in pain. This made my husband resent me greatly. I did my best to hide the pain, to smile for him. I think he was depressed too. I feel very alone and unloved, and I resented him for that. I would have to beg him to spend time with me, demanding attention at time. It got old fast. well, maybe not fast, three years went by during this time. Fast forward to 2013, I was done. I had a strong wish for death. It was no longer a “cry for attention”. It was a plan. I set the date as the end of the year. I simply refused to live another day in pain like I was. I wasn’t scared or sad. If not for an old friend reaching out to save me, I most certainly would be dead right now. Some people say suicide is the “coward’s way out”. I vehemently disagree. I had fought so hard so for long before I reached that conclusion. I had this hole inside me that nothing could fill. I felt like I was stumbling in darkness, lost and without purpose. But I didn’t want to die. I wanted to live, really LIVE, something I had not done in a very long time. So I lived with my parent’s for a while. I drank my father’s hard liquor every night before bed, a whiskey flavored band-aid. I still couldn’t eat solid foods and my mother discovered it was due to anxiety and stress. Insomnia was a common occurrence. I didn’t feel like a human being in any respect. That and I was so darn ANGRY. I was angry at everyone and everything. I had no trust for anyone. I thought everyone was out to get me. A lot of counselling finally convinced me otherwise. In 2017 I finally found the right doctor and started taking Prozac. It took awhile to take effect, but when it did I felt so much better. I was still scared things would fall apart, terrified of a bad day, a bad moment. My only consistency was chaos and I was tired of happiness slipping through my fingers. Now in 2018, about a month ago I was hit with a strong depressive episode, apparently because my body has gotten used to the dosage of Prozac. I no longer have a death-wish, but I also lack ambition and goals. I am just floating through life, still unable to hold down a job. Bills are piling up, and sometimes I’m not able to afford food or medication. My hobbies include lying in bed, facing the wall. The funny thing is, it’s not as painful as it used to be. I’m learning to forgive myself. I know now that sometimes I get sick like this. I am trying to work on my tendency to avoid things. I am broken, I am scarred. But I am still here.

response.answer_text: This is partially an open letter to someone who has died almost ten years ago, an accident and mental illnesses I have suffered through, and how I’m still trying to get through life every day pretending I am a normal person. This is the question I despise the most: “How are you today?” If I am in a good mood, I respond with a simple “Fine.” If someone asks me “What’s up?” and I’m going through one of my moods, I reply sarcastically and I tell them “The sky. The sky is always up.” They think I’m being funny and walk away. I roll my eyes. If you aren’t prepared for a genuine answer, please don’t ask someone how they are feeling, because they might just snap one day. I was 18 years old in 2010, the year of my high school graduation. Going back a few years on the first day of ninth grade, I met a friend named Joseph. Joseph was the purest boy anyone could ever meet. He was shy, often the kid in the background that no one paid attention to, but you would never meet anyone nicer than him. He was too good for this world, and, right before graduation, God (or whatever force is out there); took him out of this world. I was supposed to go to prom with Joseph. We were all going to go as a group of friends, rent a limo, and do all those normal prom things that teenagers entering adulthood normally do on prom night. After Joseph’s death I no longer felt like going to prom, and I returned my stupid frilly pink ball gown and traded it for a slim black number instead that I wore to his funeral. To this day I refuse to go to another funeral. When you are a teenager and you see someone your own age in an open faced coffin, I can guarantee that you will not see the world with the same innocence again, and the view of a white faced child who was barely a man will traumatize you somewhat. A few months after graduation I got myself into a very serious car accident. My truck flipped over 5 times (I counted as I was flipping) and the car crashed on top of me. I was knocked out for 20 minutes and trapped underneath the car the entire time. No one stopped to pull me out until I woke up and started screaming. There was a very strong chance that the truck could have exploded after the crash at any time. The authorities were right on the scene and did nothing until I woke up. They most likely proclaimed me dead on the scene so that they wouldn’t have to investigate for themselves, because it was too hard of a job to pull me out and since it was almost 5:00 they wanted to go home for dinner. When I was finally pulled out after screaming for an extra minute or 2 I was treated as a nuisance. As the accident was occurring I felt an odd feeling as though I was floating. When I finally landed on the ground and crashed, I came out without any broken bones. Strangely, I was also not in any pain at all. It felt as though the accident never happened. For years after that I constantly told myself that things would have been easier if I died. I felt that Joseph would have done so much more with his life if he was the one who was able to live instead of me. For nearly ten years I hated myself just for being alive, bt now as I become a little older I start to feel guilty for thinking that way. Years afterward I suffered through a period of alcoholism, and ever since I was a kid I’ve had difficulties with self - harm and those problems only intensified after Joseph’s death and my car accident. In another Quora post I’ve wrote about my one year anniversary of overcoming my self - harm issues, and now I’ve been over 2 years clean! Things are slowly getting better for me, and I’ve also haven’t had a drop of alcohol for about a year and a half. Believe it or not what’s actually helped me feel bursts of happiness some days is my job. I am a Massage Therapist and I truly like to believe what I do helps people, even if it’s very minorly. Massage Therapy has many benefits. It can temporarily (sometimes permanently) reduce other people’s symptoms of pain or even help them psychologically with depression, anxiety, or other mental illnesses. This is why I truly love my job and I think the longer I stick with it the happier I could become overtime. I thank everyone for reading this and I hope if you are going through tough times that you will find peace reading stories of other people who have been there. If anything, there is comfort in knowing that you are not alone - and you never truly will be.

I’ve written my last answer on 29th January 2018, a day before I left home to join the first job of my life. 2 weeks from that day, having settled at a different city at a different state, far away from my home and people, I’ve grown into a much different person within this short span of time. I’m no longer that carefree guy who would prefer to sleep snoozing the morning alarm. Rather I jump out of bed with the first alarm at 5.55 am, perform 20-30 push-ups, and then rush into the bathroom. Brushing teeth, completing nature’s call, washing daily clothes and bathing, I come out by 6.30 am in order to make the bathroom free for three of my roomies cum friends cum colleagues. Getting dressed in formals, I take breakfast and then pack my lunch box. Booking a cab as soon as my roomies get ready, we reach office before even the stipulated time. Spending nine and half hours at an IT sector is damn hectic. With one lunch break and two tea breaks in between, we’re literally flooded with assessments, milestones, step-plus, mini-projects and 96 other fancy names as generated by the company. It gets past 7 pm when I reach PG from office. Completing some office work and doing other stuffs such as laundry and washing daily utensils, I’ve to rush for dinner by 9.30 pm, else I won’t get food for the night. Then I talk to mom over phone, write some stuff, do online counselling as per requirements, and finally go to bed setting up the morning alarm. This life is far different from the life that I’ve lived so far! On one hand I’ve to perform household stuff, while on the other, I’ve to maintain an active corporate life. I’m taking care of my expenses as well as health all alone. My life is quite hectic today, but I’m got used to it. I’ve turned entirely self-dependent, and a more responsible guy who never forgets to make time for family even in the midst of this busy schedule. I’ve a long way to go still, and I’m thankful to each and every day that has shaped me in order to smoothly lead this life I’ve been living today. Life is not about lying on your bed and dreaming your achievements, It’s about working your ass off in order to make those dreams your ultimate reality.  Love and regards. || The Personified Alien ||

I am 19 year old indian girl, doing Bsc in pune university. Both my parents are uneducated. My father sells fruits whilst my mom manage mess agency for college going students and this is how our home runs. Actually, I am from one of the backward categories (SC) and it’s very common in our family culture to send off girls, marrying just after, she crosses her 18. Before a few days ago, my father stated a marriage proposal in front of me and was willing me to accept the groom, he has chosen for me; who is 27 year old and does farming, studied up to 10th grade only. I refused for marriage straight, reason being an early age and made want-to-study-further a prime reason to refuse my marriage. However, they didn’t listen to a single word of mine, blackmailed me, forced me, even cried in front of me to accept him as they had given their words to the groom’s family so, refusing could defame their respect. (How selfish they are, they only care about there reputation. And what about my freedom, choice and life?) They finally made me accept him forcibly, and let the groom’s family know about approval from bride’s family. 2 Jan, 2019 (just yesterday) my marriage was about to happen, but I ran off leaving my home before the groom’s family reached our place. Today’s date: 3 Jan, 2019 My current status: Homeless, Right now, I am just roaming around the street of pune, in such a cold weather. I have my ATM debt card with me, one water bottle, last night I didn’t even sleep, having only 4k in my bank account. I don’t know how much will those 4k go up to! I can’t even go to my relatives as there is a high possiblity that they will inform my parents about my whereabouts. My friends are selfish; they just don’t care about me, so asking them for help would be nothing but waste of time. Now I am trying to save as much money as I can, and eating just vada pav to save maximum of money. I am writing this answer from street itself, having tea on footpath. Now I don’t have any place to stay in, so I think I will have to sleep tonight on street only. I can book a hotel or find a room but that will charge me a lot. I have to save this 4k till I find any Job. Now I have got only two options, committing suicide or just going back home to my family and getting married to that guy. Edit: Update - Current Time : 6:50 AM Date: 4 Jan, 2019. Current status : Friends, I went to a temple last night, slept right over there, the night went well but coldness and mosquitoes troubled a bit. Now I am planning to go to eat something, as i am really hungry. Edit 2nd : Thanks Vandana Mishra (वंदना मिश्रा) and Devangana Mandal Ma’am for such a kind response, I will message anyone of you by the evening. And also, thanks to other people who suggested me the various ways to sort out this dilemma. Time: 11:30 AM; Date : 4 Jan, 2019. Status: Right now, I am way good but caught Cold and Tonsil with a bit of fever because of sleeping out. 3rd Edit :- Time- 10:15 PM date - 4 jan, 2019. Went to hospital as my health got worsened than before, doctor prescribed me a few medicines; which wasted good amount of money. Status: Booked a cheap hotel, drained with money, might be I shall go back home, but my parents just consider me a burden on family and want to get rid of me as soon as they can, so just don’t feel like goin’ back. Exhausted and sick, I slept the whole day here itself in this hotel so I couldn’t contact anyone. Edit 4th:- Time- 1:40 PM; Date- 5 Jan, 2019. Today morning, I dropped a text to The Incredible sir after going through some of his answers, helping nature and past contribution of helping a widow and finally met him in one of the public parks. He being friend of Vandana Mishra (वंदना मिश्रा) ma’am discussed with her about my issue. A very very much Thanks to this two generous people who helped me. Current status: Right now, I am in the flat of sumit kumar sir, pune and he promised to help find me a Job. Edit 5: Most comments are seeking the answer to where I charged up my mobile phone. When my mobile’s battery went down, I’d go and get my mobile Charged by local mobile repairing shops. The mobile would usually take about 2 hours to get charged when on airplane mode. Meanwhile, I would just sit at the park, thinking a way out. ___

Read this conversation. Date: 14 Feb Time: 9:30 p.m. She: So, how many proposals…? Me: Do you really think, can I get even a single one...! She: (laughing like a hyna) Me: -_- Ok, ok.. How many you got? She: Zero…!! Me: What..!! Are you kidding me..!! She: -_- I am serious..! M not beautiful and my presence doesn't matters to anyone, I am just a simple girl who just want to fulfill her parent's dream. Me: (murmuring) that's why I love you. She: You said something. …?? Me: No no no… Nothing. And who the hell told you that you are not beautiful and your presence doesn't matters to anyone..!! You know what..! There is someone who thinks that you are the most beautiful girl, and your presence, that only matters to him AND……… She: And..? Me: The main thing that matters to him is your smile….!! And he is in love with you since you were in your high school .. She: I think I know about this guy.. and that guy is in front of me right now. Am I right..!! Me: ( Blank ) She: Are you serious ..? Me: No no…!! I was just telling you. And it’s your headache to guess about the right one. And don't worry am not going to propose you..!! She: Smart boy..!! XD Me: (Smiling, to hide that pain) She: I just want to be away from these mess ups. And I want you to be too. Me: Obviously dumbo..!! And I promise that you will never face any problem because of me, regarding these mess ups..!! She: That’s why I trust you and I am this much close to you since I met you…!! High school right.! Me: Yeah..!! That day I could have told her about my feelings that I was hiding since the day I met her. (High school) But, sometimes you have to be silent because at that time, the person is more important than your feelings. I know if I would have been told her about my feelings that day, then today I will not be able to even see her. Yes, I still meet her, always hiding my feelings and waiting for the right moment. (Her smile, her craziness and her childish behaviour are enough to make me fall in love everytime when I see her.) (Most of the time I cry that I can't even tell her what I feel for her..) → worst moment ever. “It's better to hide your feelings for someone, rather than loosing that person forever ..”

Yes I want to do . I want to spill out my emotions on what do I miss the most in my life THE ALTERNATE UNIVERSE The world is a vibrating string comprising a plethora of universes , each vibrating with a different frequency. Each universe bifurcated at different moments in the past , thus being so similar to each other yet so contrasting . Sitting in the corner of my room in my universe I was oblivious to the alternate reality which was an alternative in my universe but a truth somewhere else ."" The year brought me glee , moments of pride , honour and respect . It made me taste the savour of achievement and success and made my fly right to the zenith of the resplendent , cheerful and hopeful sky with absolute autonomy . Then all of a sudden the sky changed its hue , the dark clouds paved their way through and I was seized of my flight , and was exposed to a different place with a challenging evironment , with different challenges and with a new way of life to conform to . The new life was adventurous , precarious and full of zeal . It demanded a totally different art of living and brought out to me the ugly truth of people , it potrayed a new level of struggle infront of me , revealed the harsh world behind me and made me realise the beauty and lucidity of my past . My mind craved for the past and its contents and dragged me to go back but ultimately failed . Fed up from the present and begging for past , one day it finally found PEACE . It finally was content . All of a sudden the tranquility and the glee was back again . It was when it had unwittingly found out that ALTERNATE UNIVERSE where the present was the same past i had lived one year back . Hence from then , every night it traversed through the vacuum , through the void to his ALTERNATE UNIVERSE to relive his dear past once again . I questioned it what tranquility it found in that distant universe everyday. It replied with serenity , " In my ALTERNATE UNIVERSE I relive my resurrected past . “There I study in my dearest class X C again . I see my dear clime again , the same bunch of 8-9 people who were different from others , who were just like me , who were my true companions . I sit on the same chair again ,I have my special friends behind my desk again , I lean out on the same wall , peep through the same window , watch the same football match , watch the same dusty ground , watch the same students loitering there. I see the scribbled wall near me again , filled with zayn and taylor's initials and with abusive words and see my friends pen on it more again . I attend the history classes again and feel sleepy with the rest of the class again , We decorate the freedom fighters in the history period and play tic tac toe once again . “ To that ALTERNATE UNIVERSE my mind travels everyday , to find happiness and contentment . Living here but longing to that universe every single moment , It narrates its stupendeous journey everyday with pride as it says , " I see the same canteen , have the same savoury stuffs everyday , I peep into the weird one's tiffin and ask for my share from the tasty tiffin wala everyday . We boycott the school functions and listen to the class teacher's lectures again. We wish the teacher in the same lazy tone and wait for the teacher's weird reactions . We wittness the same argument between the strict teacher and his target student and giggle slowly once again. We flatter each other so as to reveal our secrets and oblige each other never to it tell anyone ever . We have our tiffin before recess and pounce on the same strangers in the canteen again.” To this heavenly UNIVERSE my mind wanders night and day , though miles away but worth going everyday . It continues saying , " I go to the same X C where I and my special friends suffered mental pressure together , where we begged for games periods together and put the topper ahead in front of the strict teacher together . We talk about popular songs and murmur them the entire day . We have the same free periods and we play dumsharas as we used to play we shout together at the top of our voice until the teacher beside the class shows her strict eyes as she used to show then . We attend those long , never ending assemblies once again and die to run away from there again , we talk in the same sign language and have that same stock phrases as we did then. We hoot on the entry of the special girl and witness our buddy blushing as he used to do then. We spend 15 minutes extra after every games period again and listen to the lecture of the strict teacher again We prepare together for those tests again and pray to pass somehow again . İ hate beeing a teenager. Oh, look! You're growing up. Your body is changing. Your mentality too. You're changing. Everything is changing. You start looking for yourself and try to understand what you're feeling, or thinking. Too many questions are coming to your mind about everything. Who am İ? What do İ like? What is this feeling? Why am İ not like this? Or like that? You also start to compare yourself to the others. She's blond and has pretty blue eyes. You're the exact opposite. You wear Vans. They wears Converse. They're doing make-up. You're not allowed to. Your nose is too big and you have pimples everywhere on your face. They look gorgeous. You don't. You feel lonely while looking your friends with their boyfriends, girlfriends, and the guy you like but who likes somebody else. You're not even allowed to hug a boy. Your parents and siblings are not helpful. Sometimes, you feel like they don't care about you even thought you love them and trying to get the same affection that you give them is completely unebelievable. They think that you don't need any motherly hugs or kisses beceause you're not a kid anymore. You do. Your mom never thanks you when you're helping her to clean the entire house so your unmotived and do it in a messy way. Your mother argues with you everytime because of that. İt happens with your dad when he yells at your brother you love, for no reason and you protect him. You don't want him to feel what you're feeling. He'll have to deal with it too, but not now. Too early. You try to be a good big sister and exemple to your youngers siblings. But your self esteem lowers everytime you fail and get yelled on. Anxiety takes a whole new level in school because of tests. Your future is on your hands, yet you don't know what to do with it. High school is approching but before, last year of middle school. A lot of stressful exams are coming this year. And you didn't even decide what will you become. You. But not only. At the same time, you realize that the world isn't a happy and innocent place as you were thinking when you were younger. People are dying for some reason in some country. Others are suffering for some other reason. And you, the kind and empathic girl, the smiling and sweet one, is losing hope on humanity. You feel helpless. You want to help these poor kids who are getting killed in Syria. The ones dying of hunger in Africa. Women's rights are not even respected in some countries. Global warming is getting worse every day. Some people are getting asasinated because they love. You want to fight againts all of this. But no one is taking you serious beceause your age. You're a teen, remember? You talk a lot, think a lot and scream reality to the world to actually say nothing interesting. İt'll pass. But you know what the worst is? You're selfish. You dramatize everything you see. You're pessimist. Like İ'm doing right now.

I guess I’d like to start saying I am not really a person to share my feelings. I have a dark secret about my father. The fact that he is an extreme racist, a mad sexist, manipulative, and an abusive father. Growing up I was always was intimidated by him and I still am. You know I get it. I get that he grew up in a different environment, and that he is very traditional; not to mention but also very old school. But it breaks my heart that he can’t see a human being for who they are without judging them but the color of their skin and not acknowledge that at the end of the day, we are human beings. I also want to share the fact that he doesn’t want to believe in interacial relationships. That he thinks it is wrong and won’t allow me or my siblings to date or marry outside out race. My sister married outside our race and he refused to walk her down the aisle on her wedding day. He refused to meet his parents until my sister truly begged to. But it was terrible. I saw her journey falling in love with her husband, and when my dad finally found out, everyday when she came to visit and stop by to say hello, my father instead of asking “how are you?” or “did you eat” or anything nice to say, the first thing he would say is “did you break up with him yet?”. All of my siblings grew to like my sisters husband and we didn’t have an issue with him at all. He was a wonderful and kind person. My siblings and I are not like our father. But still seeing how my father can’t acknowledge my sisters choice, scared me. I didn’t want to date anyone. I didn’t want to even date in my own race because I was so intimidated. Yet recently, I got into a relationship with a man outside my race. Mixed. And unfortunately I am hiding it from my relationship with my father. Just two days ago, I was going to work, and my dad stopped me to lecture me. He said i’d better not be dating anyone outside my race or he’d kick me out the house. I grew extremely afraid and upset. To the point where I became so emotionally exhausted and I feel like I lost feelings for the man I love. But I didn’t. Just the other day my boyfriend told me he wanted to meet my siblings. I grew excited because I’d love for him to meet my family. But I thought of my dad. I had to tell my boyfriend that my dad doesn’t approve of interacial relationships, that he is racist and will refuse to understand. I know it sounds terrible for me to say that. But I am being honest. And I believe that it is right. Even my father knows he is racist and a sexist, he jokes about it with his friends and even tried to brainwash my siblings and I with his sick ways and beliefs growing up. So yeah, I told my boyfriend. He didn’t seem upset and he told me he understood. But I could tell he seemed a bit upset. I told him that it had nothing to do with him and that he is perfect. But I am sad, just knowing that my father won’t accept the man I love. It makes me want to cry. I love and value my family, but my happiness and my feelings matter too. And even though our relationship is still ‘new’ and though I am a young adult. I still take things seriously and I know what I want. I don’t judge people first by their skin color like my father and believe who they are by stereotypes. I’m gonna be honest. I am afraid what’s going to happen and if my dad finds out. I am afraid of the outcome and if it is even worth it in the end. And believe me, I have chatted with my father about his beliefs, but even if you were to give him countless amounts of money, or whatever. He wouldn’t believe it because of he doesn’t care.

so there's this girl that i've been friends with for a while. i first met her last year when my best friend genesis pointed her out and said she had a crush on her. i didn't really like her at first, because she was going through her cat ear phase. she grew out of it though, and we became good friends. her name is mercedes. towards the end of the last school year, my friend group started "shipping" me and mercedes, calling it aerycedes (aeryn+mercedes). one day, me and mercedes decided we would try and trick everyone into thinking me and her were actually dating, and we made a big deal out of it (hand holding, love poems, kisses on the cheek). welllllll i kinda sorta developed feelings for her, but alas, she is straight. she broke off the fake relationship shortly after summer break started. i didnt talk to her for basically the whole summer. the new school year comes around, and for unrelated reasons, my mental health is a lot better, and i realized cutting her off was wrong. i had lost feelings for her over the summer, but as soon as we went back to school and i repaired my friendship with her, they were back again. pretty uneventful, and later on me and her talk about the fake relationship to try and resolve any problems we still had. meanwhile, i was making music with lyrics about her. my friend genesis told mercedes i used to like her, and mercedes was chill about it, so thats good, i guess. me and mercedes, having had worked through our issues, decided to get back together for two days: valentines day and the next day, the friday of the social. i made a really cute sign asking her out to the social to make us getting back together really dramatic. but then we got unexpected snow and the whole week was canceled, including the two days we had planned. so thats where we are now, and i keep thinking shes giving hints that she likes me, but im sure its all in my head. we're still friends and its chill.

I don’t really know if I do, but why not. Basically I’ve been feeling like kinda numb lately. It’s like, okay, imagine, you're in a sea; isolated. And it's not like the most obvious thing, water, is affecting you... water is fine. You can float, and you can swim. But you just can't seem to breathe. It's the simplest things that you can't seem to do, like your laundry, or eating. You know how to, but you don't have the mental motivation to. Your stomach is growling, but you cannot get up from bed. You didn't shower all day, but moving your body off the bed is like moving a mountain right then. SO you just breathe, and cut yourself some slack... you're a match, a lighted match that's burning out exponentially, dying inside by the second. You cannot find your fire anymore. Where is the need anyway? Where are the 'yay's and laughs? No joy; you cannot remember tasting it. It's been a while since you last smiled and meant it.. since you were embraced and felt it... since you made your goddamn bed. Or ironed your clothes. The irony is, it all started in your head, but it's reached your thighs, as you've lost and gained weight over the past months. Just like food last week, you can't seem to hold down your interests, jumping from writing to drawing to knitting... you cannot find peace. It’s 2a.m., and you were fine, but suddenly the darkness reaches out, to once again engulf you. It wants to take over, overtake your lane and shift you into mundane. You gear up, prepare now and wait, because it's reached a point where you feel to just let it, let it end you... because being alive is like you're dead anyway. I mean, at least when you go, you'll ease their burden. But.. then you remember, that funerals are expensive. So you tell yourself, 'I'll hold on, just gotta make it through one more day…' …which is what you've told yourself every day before.

I feel confused about my sexuality. I’m more attracted to women but i’m also attracted to men. Almost like 6/4 on a scale. And i wouldn’t say that i feel like i’m in the wrong body, but sometimes i feel like i’m more of a girl. Like a different part of my brain lights up and i’m more girly. It’s hard to explain. I always remember feeling this way, since i can remember. And a lot of the things i do make sense and some of my behavior. Like its this feminine part of me manifesting itself. Normally i just date girls and i behave like your normal straight guy. But I went oversees to Australia for a semester last year for University, since i was away from home i felt more free, and this other part of me just organically came out. I just dated guys for this semester, and this other feminine part of me came out. I was more feminine in the way i dressed, acted, spoke and in what i did. I mostly just hung out with women and other gay men, its just with who i fit in better. This really helped me understand myself. And my conclusion was, that i’m certainly also attracted to men, and that this wasn’t just a phase. And i don’t think i’m transgender, i don’t feel in the wrong body. I do feel like a man, but i also feel like a girl sometimes, or at least very feminine. I don’t know if theirs something wrong with me, i don’t think there is. I think as a species we don’t understand our brains enough, but this is just how i feel. And i have always felt this way. Since i came home after that University semester in Australia, i’m back to just being straight again. Ive decided that its just easier this way.

I took my dog to the vet yesterday for a regular checkup and because she had an ear infection. She gets ear infections a lot. That’s a “thing” with floppy-eared dogs. The only appointment they had was right after school, so my children and I had to rush home to get our dog, and rush to the vet. If you’ve ever tried to rush anywhere with children right after school, you know it can be stressful. The exam went well and, after an 8-hour workday and 45 minutes in the vet’s office, I was eager to get home and relax. By “relax,” I mean “spend an hour alone, while my kids watch TV and my dog plays by herself in the backyard.” There was a 10-minute delay between the end of the exam and them having the bill ready for me to pay. While I sat there, in the waiting room, with my two younger children and my dog, an elderly man came in with his German shepherd. His very old German shepherd. It was clearly in pain as it walked. Through the front window, I saw it walking slowly on the concrete sidewalk and, once it came through the door, it couldn’t get much traction on the hardwood floor of the waiting room. The dog’s back legs slid out from under it. It struggled to lift its back side and walk a little more, but it was yelping in pain. Finally, tearfully, the man picked it up. The dog was pretty big, and the man was pretty old, and it looked like he was struggling to carry his dog. He sat down in the first seat he could find, still holding his dog. I was tempted to offer to help or strike up a conversation with the man. There are normal things dog owners talk about when they encounter each other: what kind of dog is that, how old is it, etc… But something stopped me from talking to the man. He didn’t have to sit there long. The vet came out immediately (usually they don’t come out at all… a tech calls you back to the exam room), said something quietly to the man, and then led the man and his dog, still cradled in his arms, back to the very same exam room where my dog had been just minutes before. Along the way, both receptionists told the man that they were sorry. That’s when my suspicions were confirmed. This elderly man was bringing in his elderly dog to be euthanized. There I was, with my overly-energetic two-year-old dog, my equally-energetic young children, full of stress and eager to get home, where my dog and children would leave me alone while I relaxed for a while. As I watched this man carry his friend for the last time, I thought to myself: “One day, I’m going to miss all of this… the young, energetic dog, the school-aged kids who never seem to stop talking, the running errands after a hard day at work… all of it. Perhaps I should stop stressing over it, and instead enjoy it while it lasts. I was also glad I did not talk to the guy. I’m glad I didn’t interrupt his last moments with his friend. When I finally got home yesterday, instead of parking my kids in front of the TV and letting my dog out in the yard, I asked my kids if they’d like to play with our dog with me in the yard. They did, and we had a lot of fun.

I am 19 year old girl , persuing chartered accountancy course.. I used to be a happy and cheerful person irrespective of how my life is,but last year was challenging, depressing, life changing in short worst year of my life. I lost my father, almost 3 months ago, after a week from my birthday. He was diagnosed with tuberculosis. He was struggling between the life and death for almost 9 months. During 9 months, his health had become worse and took a setback. Before that happens, he was in a good physical and mental condition. But during that time, there was a drastic change in his health.He had coughs with blood, weight loss(almost 25 kgs),loss of appetite, high fever(everyday, during 9 months), tumors developed inside brain and chest and memory loss. He had been admitted in ICU for 3 times. It's very painful and heartbreaking for all of us to see a healthy man in such a horrifying condition. We all tried our level best, to save him. My mother and chacha took him to many hospitals for the treatment, but unfortunately there is no improvement in his health. Before 2 months before his death, his treatment was started in one of the best hospitals of Ahemdabad. In initial days of treatment, there was a improvement in his health within a week and so,our hope had restored that may be he would be well again. After seeing his improvement, doctor discharged him. For a month, everything was ok, but before 10 days before his death,again his health had taken a setback. So immediately, we took him to Ahemdabad and he was admitted in ICU. I wanted to go to Ahemdabad, but unfortunately I had exams. I don't want to gave my examination and wanted to be with my father,but everyone insisted me to focus on exams. Honestly speaking, I was not ready to gave exams and as a result I was not able to focus on my studies. And I had a worst examination in my life. So, after my exams get over, there was again a improvement in his health. Four days after my examination there was my birthday. Every year, I eagerly used to wait for my birthday, but this time I was not excited for a bit. Then, my birthday came,but I don't want to celebrate it. I was missing him very badly. Somehow, my other family members and friends make my birthday a special one(a big thank you! to them). On that day, I make a video call to my mum and papa. Surprisingly, he remembered my birthday and wished me. Then after 3 days from my birthday, his health had improved, and doctor even told my mum that if next day, he was ok, then he could be discharged. But, next day he did not woke up. My mom, chacha doctors and nurses everyone tried, but he was not responding. Although, he was breathing, but his heartbeat had become rapid and bp was extremely low. Doctors told to my mum and chacha that next few hours would be very critical for him. My mom panicked and started crying. But we all, don't want to give up. We all were ready to fight with God for his health. We all prayed for him. But, before a day before his death, his condition was unbearable for him, he was shifted from ICU to ventilator. But alas, next day during 11:30 p.m he couldn't fight anymore. He left………. And I get to know about my father demise after 12 hours. I had gone for some work that day till 12 p.m. But as soon as I reached home, my Chachi immediately took me inside to my room and told “ your father is no more.” As the moment I heard it, I started crying badly. I was feeling shocked, devastated and could'nt believe that he wasn't there anymore. He became a mere memory. Somehow, I stopped crying for my Mother and waiting for her to come. I was worried about my Mother. After 6–7 hours, she came with my father's dead body. I was not able to see my Mother's condition. As soon as she came, she was looking very tired, her eyes were swollen because of tears. Me and my brother hug her hard, she started sobbing badly, and told us “beta! wo ab Kabhi vapis nahi aaenge”. Somehow I control my tears in front of my mother. But after 1–2 hours when his body was going for cremation, and when I saw him for the last time, I was not able to control my sobbing. I sob very badly and thought “now! I will never be able to meet or see him”. After his body had gone for cremation, somehow, I gather the courage and gone to see my mother in her room. I sat near her and consoled her. She was crying alot. Bunch of relatives, present in the room were taking care of her. Then, we gave her some food and some sleeping pills, so she could get some sleep. So, next few days were the most difficult days of my life. Some days I was not able to sleep, sometimes I sleep but, woke up at odd hours.Gulping down food had become a difficult task for me. Sometimes I cried for him(even now also)badly, and thinking, “Why God, why? Why he died? Please I want him back?” So presently (it's 3 months after his death) somehow we all are moved on, but still we are shocked ,sad and somehow struggling to live without him. As we all know how daughter's are an apple of an eye of their father. Such bond is very unique and special. Same thing is in my case, I love my father alot. He was not only my father but my king, hero, supporter and a teacher. He unconditionally loved me. He used to care and pampers me alot. He was not only a great father, but a great human being also. I don't know how I will live without him. My life will always be incomplete without him. P.s:- thanks for having patience and for reading such a long story. Kindly, ignore my grammatical mistakes!!

Yes. For I just want to write something on Quora and I just need the right question to attempt at. I didn’t find one thus far but this question can be answered the way l like and express the way I am fond of. Please forgive me if I use too many ‘I’s without which the narration may get bored. I am a middle aged male got married blessed with supporting wife and an offspring who is into teens. I am born to my parents but brought up by my grandmother who was into teaching. She had 6 young daughters when she lost her husband at the age of 28. She was forced to pursue her education and with the help of relatives and her determination, completed her teacher’s training post the death of her husband and got a teacher job. Thus with sheer hard work coupled with obedience of daughters managed things wonderfully well. Not only her daughters but the grandchildren and so on settled very well into their respective lives by way of studies, jobs, wealth and what not. She is no more now. All our families owe everything to her and we just remind her whenever we are into some kind of trouble. She has been the role model for us even bigger than Mother Teresa or an Anne Besant. My mother who was terrific at studies was compelled to discontinue them as she got married very early. Once a jamindar’s family her in-laws went land less soon due to drought and lack of irrigation facilities and were forced to move out of their village and reached the town in search of some employment. My father could not bow down to bosses as he was always in jamindar mode and gone back to the village and was doing small time works for himself. Hence, she started pursuing her education again and completed her Hindi pundit training to get some job. At the same time she used to sell milk in the morning for 2 hours 5 to 7 AM. I used to co-operate her occasionally in this job. Respects to above two women of my life who with their sweat, determination, guts and hard work, laid the foundation for several generations; more than a dozen to be precise. Well I am not describing the achievements of my family members but the stories of all those women who stand up in times of crisis when their male counterparts gave up easily. I have not yet poured my heart out. It is just an attempt! Salutes…

I just read an answer here on quora. In that answer a mother was describing how her son was living miserably in India because of his job, where he was having a bad work-life balance. Now, her son is well settled in AUSTRALIA and living a happier life. That madam was having issues with college students, with education system of India, with juniors working in her son's office, with government and with many more things. => I would like to share my views with everybody who feel India is a shit country, which has tons of problems and USA/UK/AUS is the dream place to settle down. => I believe, The expectation that lady shared about how India should have to be in terms of education, work-culture, lifestyle, this and that, Those are the responsibilities of people like her son, You and I. Its our responsibility to make all those things possible here in india. => People like that lady, are complaining a lot and sharing it with everybody on social media, that India is not a good country. India has this issue. India needs improvement in that area. USA is better at this and UK is way ahead than us at that. My question is, What contribution we as Indians are making to make this country a better place? Because, To make those countries better than us, I feel someone from those lands must had made some efforts too. => People like that lady’s son are getting nourished from this country, and than abandoning it with lots of complaints, Settling down in other countries and than bragging about how frustrated they were in India, and now how much their life has improved after going abroad. => Its like praising your wife for her beauty, and disliking your own mother because she is not good looking anymore, mother who has lost her charm and beauty, because she gave BIRTH to you and cared for you for years. => Its like, In morning You are selling tobacco, and than at evening the same You, is showing pity towards cancer patients. Dont be such hypocrites. => Its not the Prime Minister of India or a political party’s job to make 125 crore lives better OR change something in every corner of this country. Its well educated and enthusiastic youngsters’ and their well-formed minds, that's what this country needs. Either stop complaining, or start contributing. Crying does not help, trying does.

I read this question everyday but never had enough strength to write my heart out. I am the eldest one among my siblings. I had to act like ‘elder sister’ from when i was 2 years old. I had to hold myself back and let my siblings have what they want. I started my school from Prep Class which is actually KG2 or nursery 2 in most countries. I used to get 1pkr daily for personal use. It was quite a big amount at that time for 3 years old kid. At home time, on my way home i used to buy helium balloon for my siblings from that pocket money. From the age of 3 years i started living for others. When i grew up, i was shy, modest, cute and a nice girl. I was bullied at my school. A boy of 10th grade at that time used to eat my lunch and he scared me to death that if i tell my parents he'll hit me. I told my parents about it just 3 years ago. All my life i kept my problems away from my family because i love them and i don't wanna see them worried. So i trusted my friends with my problems. Made new friends. I got close to them. All of my best friends at different stages of life were really best. But the friendship never lasted for life. My parents have suffered alot and still they are suffering alot in order to give us higher education. My heart is crying writing it. Maybe I'm not good at writing every little detail. I didn't became a doctor. Instead I did ny Bachelors in IT. My sister is doing well but i don't see chances of her becoming doctor either. She is striving hard. My brothers just do not bother taking our parent’s struggles seriously. They do care but they don't study as much as they should. My parents are getting older and weaker and the hope is the only thing we are sticking to. I make extra time, extra effort to help my siblings with studies because i can't i just can't see my parents in pain. I just don't want to see my siblings suffering. I am worried about my parents. If i had to change one thing in this world, just one thing. I would make education free for everyone for ever. Education must be free, it must not cost so that a family can live together, so that they can live happily, so that everybody can have equal chances of becoming something.

Tomorrow is Holi and probably I am the most unhappiest person you will find. Holi, the festival of colors, the festival where people spread happiness and joys in other person's life but I so badly want the calendar to skip this day. I have a million memories of my mother attached to this festival. On this festival, we used to witness a different side of my mother, the mischievous side, the side that was not visible on normal days. She used to be more excited than us, more crazier than us on this day. Our shopping used to start a day before, as she used to say, "holi mai karna hi kya hota hai?" I remember her oiling my hair a night before. I remember making ‘gujjiaas’ with her and how she used to make my favorite dishes. Making ‘Chole Bhature’ used to be like a ritual on this day. I remember her calling everyone to our house on this festival, and the moment they used to come, she used to stuff their mouth with sweets and Gujjiaas. I remember her pranks, she used to mix surf-excel in the water and then used to ask us to fill balloons with them. She never missed her targets when it came to hitting my cousins with balloons. She used to become a kid again. I loved that kid in her. I miss that kid. I miss this festival. This day used to bring a hell lot of happiness in our lives and now this same day brings a hell lot of pain in our lives. I don’t celebrate this festival now. My heartaches remembering this day. I crave for Gujjiaas and chole bhature, made by her on this day. I crave for her touch.  Holi is not same without her. Life is not same without her.  Happy Holi Maa! Love!-Unnati

After 4 months or something he started taking me for granted. He never cared about me. I use to spend my whole salary on him. But i never realized it at that time. Thengot a job offer in another city and he had to go. Before that I saw in his mail that he gets a mail from a girl and when I asked him he told that it's his cousin. I believed it because surname was same. When he loved to different city I use to go there every alternate weekend. Things were going smooth when one day again I saw the mail from that girl sent to him on his bday. It was a romantic mail. I had a huge fight with him. I asked him then he told me that she is a family friend and she likes me but I don't like her. So I asked him to tell her that u have a gf for which he denied and excused like she LL tell this at his home. After some days things became normal. In the meanwhile he told me that he spoke to his mom about us and she denied. Then suddenly his sister came to stay with him for some course. So he use to travel to Bangalore to meet me. But always use to give preference to his friends and always use to treat me like his atm only. Then he switched back to Bangalore. After coming to Bangalore he gave me a reason that his sister's engagement broken because of which his mom had a stroke and now doctor has asked not to give any tension to her and now he can't talk with his mom( which I doubt). And he blocked me every where. I cried like hell. Then after 2 months again he came back saying he is unable to focus on anything. We started talking again but he told me that he cannot marry me. Then again he blocked me. This happened like 2 times. Then I blocked him every where. Now again he contacted me saying that he is getting married and he is not happy with this marriage. He is doing it for the sake of his mom. He has no feeling for that girl and he wants me at least as his friend as he cant live without me. But this time also he took me for granted. Bdw she is the same girl we had a fight over.
