I’ve been crying for almost 20 minutes over a plastic ruby I got from the dollar store. The ruby isn’t even broken— It just fell off. Let me explain. Last Halloween, I wore a dress for my costume. It was a beautiful, short purple dress with a little plastic ruby on the front that my friend and I made from scratch. That was my first time publicly presenting myself as a woman, ever. I went to college in that dress. I felt comfortable in that dress. After Halloween, it went into storage. I only recently dug it back out, and decided it could use a wash. I put it in the laundry for my dad to clean (and before people go calling me lazy… I do chores around the house, plenty. Laundry is just not one of them). 20 minutes ago, I went into the laundry room and saw the little plastic ruby sitting on top of the dryer, and my heart sank. I knew the stitching must have come undone somehow. I opened up the dryer and sure enough, my dress was in there. It’s clean now, and mostly in good shape… but a lot of the stitching needs to be redone, including the little ruby. It’s not unfixable, or even difficult to fix… but seeing that dress, the one I have so much sentimental attachment to, “broken”… it hurt. And so, I’m crying over a stupid plastic gem.

A heart break or some other stuff. Not in this. I'm happy and I want to write my heart out. Finally it was my B-Day (23/09). I had hidden my birthday notification from fb as well as snapchat. I am so happy and I don’t know why. I am so sad and I don’t know why. These emotions conflict with one another all day, every day. I’m just tired from this battle. I don’t want to feel anything.

Its mid noon and I am absolutely clueless as to what I want to do. I wasted half of my day thinking about how life has changed me and how it will change me in the days to come. I am already worried about my life which is yet to be lived and then I see my Amma. She is 52 with a lot going on inside her head. Yet, she is managing it all so well. I wonder how! Women are so mutli-talented and independent by nature. They are sensitive, yet strong. Some women ,on the contrary , prove to be wrong but I would say the circumstances have made them so. Nowadays women are equally good to men in whatever field it be. The work timings and salary is the same. But is this giving men and women a license to be whatever and however they want to be? We live in a decaying age. There is no mutual respect for each other. When we look at our parents we see a lot of understanding and love which binds them together. There is respect, love, sacrifice, and a lot more which keeps them going. Being a law student, I am more exposed to the real world starting from the very basic unit such as a family. I was at the office with my Advocate when there came a client, a man and a woman in their 30s. She started talking about her issues and so did he and they wanted a divorce on mutual consent. They had a 7 year old child out of their wedlock. The reasons for their want of divorce were baseless. All they lacked in their relationship was understanding. Understanding about each other's work, understanding about each other's value of time and their not-ready-to-sacrifice attitude. Both of them are working in a Multi National Company(MNC) and are earning more than enough for their living and they are not ready to sacrifice their happiness out of the money they make. And soon after they left I asked the Advocate about it, and he said " This is just one case and nowadays its quite common". He showed me rack of case files on mutual consent of which most could be sorted if they are ready to calm down and settle their egos. Sadly, none of the them care an inch about what their child would be going through. The mental agony of losing a father or a mother, their care, their affection, their pampering. What would life be like to him/her as he/she grows up? What is happening to society? What is happening to women who should be down-to-earth, patient and responsible and men who are supposed to be the care taker of a family ? Young generation is becoming a scapegoat for others. I don't hope for the best but if we all know for a fact that a good family life can be the best achievement one can ever make, maybe it can definitely bring a positive change.

A heart rendering incident of my fellow batchmate…..She lost her father……My heartfelt condolences to the family....This shouldn't have happened but it did…Please spare a moment to read this…An open letter of a daughter to the concern authorities. Lockdown: The End of the Pandemic or The End Respected Sir, First, I would like to appreciate the dynamic and never-ending efforts that are being made by your government during this unforeseen pandemic. Your vigilant and corrective actions on time saved the lives of many. I wish my father could have been one of them too. I am Vaishnavi Shringi, a B.Tech final year student from VNIT Nagpur, Maharashtra. My mother Mrs.Seema Sharma is a government servant at Rajasthan Technical University, Kota, Rajasthan. My father Late Sh. Chetan Shringi was an executive engineer at CSCTPPS, Rajasthan Rajya Vidyut Utpadan Nigam Ltd., Chhabra, Rajasthan. I have a younger sister studying in class 10. We were a happy family of four before an extremely heart-wrenching incident struck us. My father was fulfilling his emergency services at CSCTPPS, Chhabra when he experienced severe pain in the chest and the forearm,succumbing to which he went back to his room(7.04.2020). Later in the evening, he visited the nearby dispensary that is a part of the plant premises. The doctor assumed it to be a mere case of gastritis/acidity and did not diagnose thoroughly. My father took the medication as prescribed by him but couldn't experience any relief. He was experiencing excessive pain in the chest and was unable to eat or drink anything. He was continuously vomiting and was unable to even walk for his dinner or lunch at the hostel. Owing to this kind of condition, his colleagues could not wait anymore and went to the Chief Engineer to ask for permission to refer him to Kota where he might get appropriate treatment which was absent in their plant premises. The Chief Engineer very conveniently used lockdown as an excuse and totally ignored the seriousness of the situation. My father had given 28 years of dedicated service to this organisation and this is what he earns in return? But the struggle doesn't end here sir. My father visited the dispensary doctor again, emphasizing his diabetes and BP issues and also urged him to refer him to Kota to get treated. But the doctor denied his request repeatedly. Even the Chief Engineer started suggesting to get some injections and also opt for saline treatment which was totally unwarranted. Finally, when my father started experiencing shortness of breath, his colleagues went to the Chief Engineer to pressurize him to not overlook the situation and send him back home. But the inhumanity didn't end here sir. The permission was approved at 8:30pm in the night and my father was sent alone with a compounder to Kota in an ambulance with no emergency equipment. We felt that the situation might improve finally, but the lockdown had a lot more to show us.(11.04.2020) I still remember clearly; it was 12:40 in the middle of the night, my mother and I reached Kota Heart Hospital to get my father treated by the safest hands of the highly qualified doctors there. But what I saw was my father, whom I have never seen sitting on a chair even after a heavy day at work, sitting in the wheelchair. His expression was similar to that of a warrior, one who had fought the war with all his might but now stands hopeless and frail. The guards at the hospital denied his admission inside the hospital for even an ECG. Sitting in that wheelchair my father still did not lose heart and asked the guards to show at least some humanity at this hour of emergency and let him in. But the guard refused and made us wait till 1:30 am outside the hospital, with my dad in the wheelchair right in the middle of the road. After our family doctor requested one of his colleagues personally, my father was taken in for an ECG after which he was diagnosed to have suffered a heart attack 2-3 days before. He was immediately admitted to the ICU ward and various tests were done by the staff. The so-called Corona Warriors did not show up, Sir, and the excuse they used is that they were in quarantine. How convenient, right? The next morning (12.04.2020)my mother and I reached the hospital for the follow-ups. We were told to arrange one unit of blood to compensate for the low haemoglobin. To do so, we went to the nearest blood bank where we waited for two hours for the blood bank staff to prepare the sample. The staff was called in one-by-one to prepare the sample as they were on leave, which led to the delay. Owing to the lockdown and insufficient staff, even after 12-14 hours of admission, we failed to get the reports that were urgently required to decide the next phase of treatment for my father No specialist doctors were available in the hospital. We were literally begging and approaching many doctors personally to attend to my father. After many requests, a kidney specialist showed up, who, after seeing the late submitted reports, was in a fix regarding how to proceed. It was a highly critical situation and within seconds my father's blood pressure started dropping. The situation was critical and the attendant present there told us to insert a balloon in his heart. He was not a specialist but he was the only help we had at that moment. Even then, the blood pressure did not shoot up. He followed with a pacemaker insertion as well, but it was already too late by then. Our heart attack warrior, my dear father, after fighting with extreme pain and discomfort for 4-5 days, left us, Sir. We want to know; did he add to your Corona count, Sir? Did he at least make it till there? Or did his demise go unnoticed? He was not a Corona patient, Sir, and still, we lost him. With medical staff staying absent despite being able to help out, Are we really killing the Pandemic? Or is it's repercussions killing us? I do not write this letter to ask for any compensation or receive applause for my late father's strength and will power, Sir. I write to ask you a simple question... What was our mistake? Our non-Covid patients need care and treatment. Are we letting them down? There are many patients in the need of regular dialysis, emergency and life-saving surgeries, cancer treatments, heart and lung ailments requiring constant follow-ups. Somewhere in the chaos, we seem to have overlooked these patients. These patients will add to our non-Covid mortality. Patients are dying of non-coronavirus related ailments because of delay in treatment, owing to the lockdown. India's health infrastructure is overburdened and overwhelmed thanks to the pandemic of Coronavirus. However, we must not forget that there are patients getting ill because of other diseases and suffering various ailments. Hence, the government must ensure that there are sufficient doctors to treat other cases too and non-Covid-19 patients aren't ignored. This is not only case, Over the last 3–4 weeks, I have heard several instances of patients and relatives seeking medical attention very late for even emergencies. Since all the clinics and many smaller hospitals are closed. A high number of patients with cardiac, neuro, stroke, gastro, diabetic and orthopedic emergencies presenting late with all complications leading to delayed intervention and recovery. The current times will teach us a lot. However, we need to learn fast from our mistakes, and also from others' mistakes so that we don’t repeat them. I'll pray this should not repeat what happened with Vaishnavi's father. This is systems failure which needs to be heard.  She tweeted the same with proper hastags, tagged authorities. Please take a moment and retweet so that this issue get noticed. [1] Vaishnavi Shringi Twitter I hope justice is served. Footnotes[1] Twitter

The 2 years.... Starting from parents, teachers, relatives, the illiterate people till friends everyone said that these 2 years will make your life. Oh dear world....are you serious?? I lost my games, I lost my passion, I lost my social media platform, I lost my good old friends in search of success, I lost the happiness, I lost my smile....oh dear world....really do you think that 2 years can make your life?? It didnt...rather everything came to a standstill. 2 years taught science less and competition,success stories, colleges, packages and ranks more. 2 years spoiled life. Oh dear world, everyone cant turn their dream into reality, very few can. 10 lacks competed, 10 thousand won. 10 thousand definitely made their lives in the 2 years by sacrificing and winning but that doesnt mean the 9 lacks 90 thousand were useless. Oh dear world...2 years cant make your life....really...it cant....it will not!! Happiness is a relative word...."will make your life" is a relative statement....2 years will bring happiness to very few and sorrow to many more. Oh dear world...u really gave "us" 2 options - to live and lose or to give up and win....to all those who said 2 years can make the difference...please help me to choose the option. I m waiting....oh dear world...my 2 years are on the verge of completion...i will wait 20 more years....help me to choose...my dear world.

Well, I've been in quora for a long time but never been active much because of my studies and other reasons. Today i am going to share something about my life which changed me and my life both significantly. I've always been a shy kind of guy and kind of silent but smiling always. Like most of the others i didn't habe a pleasant school life. I got bullied and yeah for like 11 years it continued somewhat. Physical abuse is something i could stand for but about verbal use(well yeah i used to be a shy guy and never got much words on my tongue when i was angry). So you guys can somewhat imgine how my school life changed me more of an introvert person. After 12th i got into a college in my hometown. This was a life turning point and stage for me. Oh yeah i forgot to mention i used to be chubby so before getting into college i determined myself in getting fitter. The result was unbelievable. After some months the once introvert guy became extrovert and got a bit popular among boys and girl both(not for bad reasons XP) because of my plain and simple attitude ad friendly and helping nature. I got into 2 relationships also (not from college- one i got from facebook other was in real life). But unfortunately both of those relationships didn't stand for long. From one i got betrayed and for other one well i will admit my mistake. Because of some reasons which was nothing actually (but that time i got scared of them specifically studies). Our relationship got devastated that way and till this day i accept that my suffering is the result of that sin of mine. Long story isn't it! Well the main part is coming!! In the years 2017 i met a girl online again. We both were friendw at first but got closer day by day. After some months i proposed her and after sometime she accepted it too. Well everything was fine at first. At least from my side i was very happy and was being aware of the fact if she is happy with me. But after some months i got to know she is getting depressed day by day and changing. She started shouting at me sometimes even cussing me and saying cursing stuffs. I accepted all of them i was so much desperate to show her that i love her. I was ready to do anything for her. But then got to know that she was first in relationship and she got annoyed because of my caring attitude and talking in a sweet way. That's the reason she started changing herself in an opposite person than me. Slowly she stopped talking to me. I tried everything from my side to make her talk to me. Nothing worked actually. XD, she was the reason for whom once i wrote so many songs, sang them on guitar and drew her pic and gifted her. But yeah, she never valued nothing of mine. Not me not my words. Well what i treasured once turned into one of my nightmares. One year passed by still this way but things were getting worse. She almost stopped talking to me. Meanwhile she never stoppee being friends with others or spending time with them but when i used to ask her how she was or what she eas doing. Always the answer would come in such a manner that i would get almost depressed that may be i had asked something dreadful. She used to blackmail me about breaking up with me XD. Well she used to do that also. Like, one night she said she was breaking up with me and after one day she would return. Hmm, well one thing i would say she never betrayed me nor her love for me was a lie. Later after our final break up in October 2018 i got to know that she never knew how to be in a relationship and because of other friends leaving her or sometimes because if her parents she used to misbehave with me all time. Well i was a guy full with smile and happiness who craved some love got just hatred, betrayal, curses what not. Well yeah last year i became so much depressed that i became suicidal and umm i attempted too. Anyways now i am somehow living my life. Trying to order everything i can do. From other's perspectives it may seem nothing when for me it was more than a nightmare. I couldn't write many things properly and i have lost my own self through that period. Now i am trying to regain it but i need help still but yeah i am afraid to trust again. Thanks for reading this.

I am lost and angry. I have been stuck with Asperger’s for some time, and I have grown to utterly despise it. If I could rid myself of this damned curse, I would. But of course, that’s not the hard part. I’m always angry, and I always keep it hidden. My anger always feels like another person. In the time it takes to snap my fingers, he can appear and run riot. And the funny part? More and more often I want to cut him loose. I want to let him out. Let him destroy everything he sees, break every bone of every person he can, smash everything in site. I want to let him destroy everything. Why? Because maybe, just maybe, if I let him out, he’ll stay away for once. But instead I feel like a caged animal.  In the end though, I guess my big thing, after all the hate and anger I always feel, I feel nothing but regret and sorrow. I lost 15 relatives in the last ten years. Every single one, all I wish for is more time. More time to rejoice with them, to celebrate with them, to learn from them. I know I will see them again on the other side, but I also don’t want to face that day. I truly am terrified of that day. I am scared to move forward, and im being forced to. I don’t want to advance forward, and I need to. Every time I see my friends talking with their extended family, I get irritated, because there is not much that I wouldn’t give to be able to do that again. Damn do I ever miss my grandparents. My home away from home. I miss that old piano. I miss the old paintings on the walls. I miss playing cards with them. Heck, I even miss my grand parents cooking, even if it usually was either burnt or hardly cooked. I miss it all so damn much. Sorry, had to take a moment there. To anyone reading this, all I can say is thank you for this. I know I likely won’t be able to respond to any kind words, but right now, i’m just glad to be heard.

I am recently married and found out that my husband is having an affair. To be more accurate, continuing an 8 year affair he had been having with his married co-worker. I am recently married and found out that my husband is having an affair. To be more accurate, continuing an 8 year affair he had been having with his married co-worker. I found out about the relationship initially via his instant messages before we got married. Whenever I would come in a room, he would scramble to close windows on the computer. I suspected he was cheating but i didn’t have any evidence to prove it. So last month, i Remotely activated the automatic call recording i got from the PI on his phone and here i am, all my doubt were confirmed. I decided not to ask him as I followed the instructions of the PI. I took his phone and scan his whatapp QR code and i deactivated the notification so he won’t know. So with this, i was able to veiw all his chat directly from my phone. I confronted him about the message because they were very sexually explicit; things he didn’t even express to me. He indicated to me that it was “fantasy” and said it was in-appropriate conversations and it would not happen again. He then got on me about the whole trust and snooping issue but the thing is, when I asked him straight out if something was going on with this girl, he lied and told me nothing and that he wasn’t even attracted to this girl, and then I spied and found out otherwise. Well a few months later we get married and my now husband got transferred to another cit for work few weeks after the marriage. The first week he was gone I was getting phone calls every night, e-mails etc. The second week, I couldn’t get in touch with him at all as well as his family members. Guess what, I am pregnant. And he still doesn’t know yet. Should I tell him? Or what to see how this unfolds. When he came home I asked him what happened with just the basic check in to let me know you were ok? I can understand if you were busy working but that is basic common courtesy. He gave me some excuse that I didn’t understand how stressful it was and he was busy. Then I happened to ask if his co-worker was down there, and he didn’t answer the question and became real evasive. Then about a day or two later, he accidentally let it slip that she was there and then he saw the expression on my face and tried to turn it around on me saying the reason he didn’t tell me she was there was because he didn’t want to get interrogated and that I was insecure. So a few days after that, I got his IM hacked again by this PI and sure enough there were conversations in there about her coming down the second week and them sleeping together on a few nights. So my suspicion was confirmed. There was also another conversation about her coaching him on how to be comfortable with continuing the affair and deceiving me and about how they were having sex at the office late at night when others went home. Now as silly as this may seem, I still love this man and would like to work this out but I don’t think this would/could ever happen because first he won’t admit to the affair. “Your eyes are dilated and slowly reactive to light,” my GP commented just the other day. I shrugged - is it meaning that I have yet another failure coming my way? I have my first vacation in two years planned in the next 2 weeks. I feel fine. But am I fine? Is the ticking time bomb in my head going off? I have a scheduled EEG on Thursday and yet I have all kudos at work. My life is a mixture of odds. I am attending therapy, I am somewhat healthy and I want to push but I don’t know when I look in the mirror if being dizzy after 3 hours is just me or if it is just a mirage of the fact I have spent most of the last year in and out of hospitals. I haven’t been to the ER in 6 months. I haven’t had to have a packed bag ready to head to the U of MN. I haven’t seen the current new PYG-1 residents working for my neurosurgeon and I don’t want to. Yet I have lost track of time. But despite all of that, I walk, I read. I push. Because I want to be fit. I am done living my life according to brain surgery. If I need another brain surgery, I will watch and wait. But I am done waiting for it to come to me. I am going to start living for the moment. For this moment. Instead of staring in the mirror, unsure of underneath all that skin, my hazel eyes, and my brown hair, my brain is going awry. Maybe right now, right this moment, a protein is clogging its way and my brain is trying to tell me. Maybe my cat being more snuggly lately is trying to heal me because she knows something is wrong. Or maybe she is just being a cat. Maybe it is just confirmation bias. So I grab my backpack, I head to work and I live. Because I don’t know. I record and my body is a scientific experiment but I choose to stop being afraid. Hydrocephalus no longer has a claim on me, I have a claim on it. I am coming for you.

Crying uncontrollably on your bureau; over the situation you have no control. Negative thoughts crossing your mind and suddenly you feel like the loneliest person on the planet. You are screaming for help you but no one is there for you. No one is there to understand what you are hiding from the world deep inside. All you see is darkness around and the slightest inkling of hope has vanished. But, Was it used to be like that? Was your world always flinching? You used to notice small things, the warmth of sunlight on your face as you woke up , the birds creeping ,the world engaged in its usual cycle. to a bright flare which forces you to shut the blinds and isolate yourself from the world. You used to be a jubilant folk who wanted to ride the crest of a wave but your fervent zest has faded away. Depression is like that! Like drowning in a quicksand. Like facing against a tsunami. Like walking with a pile of rocks on your back on a hasty pathway. But you have to pretend like everything is okay.

Yes i do. I've got myself into a long distance relationship. We've known each other for 10 years prior to that until finally when we decided to take it to the next level. We were in love with each other, we were happy. Then few months later he said to me that he'll not be very attentive the next month and i should bare with him and wait for him. He worked for a startup company, and there was an important event which requires a lot of hard work. I was ok with it and i said i will wait. First couple of days were fine, i missed him so much and we barely talked to each other. Then a week later a lot of chaos happened in my life. I quit my both jobs, i was between the jobs for 3 weeks after that. I was devastated, when i reached out to him he wouldn't reply on time, or would reply hours later with just one syllable word. Or would dash off quick replies. I didn't like it. I wanted to share lots of things, consult with him but he wasn't available. Then after some times i just got used to not telling him whatever had happened even if he asked because i knew he is not really listening. All he had in mind was the event. We have become even more distant, barely talked and i felt i was better before getting into a relationship with him. I didn't have expectations, i wouldn't be disappointed by mistakes he made. So i decided i don't want that kind of relationship. So one fine day i told him that i no more want to do this, we were better as friends. He tried so hard to make me change my mind but i was adamant. Fast forward few days, after i asked him if he'd accept me again as a friend or should i leave him alone, ( deep inside i was giving us a second chance by starting over frim scratch, so we can do things differently) but he was so hesitant by his response and i felt it. He agreed but he wasn't really convinced. I knew he wanted either as a girlfriend or nothing. At the end we had a very ugly and messy breakup. He was so aggressive and rude in the way he spoke to me. I have no idea how to deal with this.

Yes! Hi I am a 20 yo living in Sydney Australia with my parents and two sisters. I struggle with everyday life. I left school when I was 15 then completed grade 10 at Tafe. I worked until I was 17 and was sexually assaulted at work when I was 16. I have tried to complete a business diploma for about 3 years. I haven’t been able to, due to my mental state, that no one really knows about. I have been bullied since I was 14 all the way up to when I left my last job at age 17. I have struggled with self esteem issues due to being bullied in high school and my first job. I have severe depression and contemplate taking my own life eveyday. My parents don’t understand as they have no time for me. My father thinks I am pathetic and stupid because I want to kill myself. I dont share my issues with any of my current friends as they are all Christian an lack understanding. I want to have a boyfriend, I really do. I want to understand what having one is like. I don’t understand why these really unattractive mean girls have hot guys and I am still left out. I hate going out to socialise, I have really bad skin. Dispute being a vegetarian and living a really healthy lifestyle. I don’t eat sweets or processed foods. No bread or anything. Yet I still have terrible skin. I don’t understand how people can eat all the chocolate in the world and not even have a pimple or blackhead. I had a crush on this guy and realised that he was legitimately autistic, so it explained why he was really bad with emotions and social cues. I still have some feeling for him. He is apart of this Church I go to. Talking about Church I joined a church at the end of 2018 and am still going. They have social groups and everything. It’s really good. Except for the social bit. When I socialise I seem really bubbly and outgoing but the truth is I have have social phobia. I didn’t go outside for about 3 months straight this year due to social phobia and going to the hospital because I almost killed myself. I hate myself so much. I just don’t see any point in being alive. My mother tells me I am beautiful, but I think that mothers have to say that to their children so they don’t have low self esteem. However I already have low self esteem. I just don’t believe her. When I tell her she is lying she tells me I am stupid. My father calls me pudgy. Recently I have been thinking about wether guys care about cellulite on the back of girls legs and butts. I don’t really know how men or guys think at all. My mother tells me all they want is sex. I have the place that I go to when I really low and suicidal it’s called “suicide ledge” I just go there to think and get away from my current environment. In fact I went there today. Why? Well my younger sister has gotten her L plates and I am still on my L plates, it’s been 4 years and my father said he will teach her how to drive, whenever I have asked him to teach me to drive he says no. I don’t understand why my father hates me so much. In fact I think my younger sister is my parents favourite child. My father has been unemployed for 2 months and isn’t really doing anything about it. Life in Sydney is really expensive, so my mother has to work really late and I never get to see her. I have decided that I want to kill myself before Christmas. I know no one cares at all. I am just there. No one special or anything. Well this is a bit of my heart right now. I hope you are doing ok. （╹◡╹）♡

I am obsessed with the new viral sensation, Priya Prakash. If you don’t know her, or haven’t heard about her yet, I wouldn’t recommend checking her out, because there is literally no way out. Yes, there are millions of people who are obsessing over her and that makes the problem even worse. I don’t know what I am feeling. I know I have a crush on her but why is this so depressing for me? I think the answer is, I feel like a tiny meaningless speck in the 3 million followers that she garnered over the course of a few days. I feel there is no way that she would ever notice someone like me in the crowd and that makes me feel really bad. Every few minutes I turn to her instagram and her rising popularity hits me hard. Don’t get me wrong, I am not hating on her. I am happy for her success. She is extremely talented and deserves the world, but clinging on to her somehow burns me. The feeling of being insignificant really really bugs me. I wish I was famous. I wish I was a celebrity so that there would be a chance she would take notice of me. I want to do things, write a novel, launch a youtube show, or something to get famous but it just doesn’t work out. This is burning me and will probably consume me.

"Hey there, Mr./Ms. Unknown, Let's talk. I am there. Always." These words have been said a lot to you by a lot of people, right? Let's be bluntly honest. Most of them don't even mean it. Because they just don't care. Or maybe, they do. But it is because they pity you and not sympathize you. And trust me, pity doesn't last long. It can just go away overnight. You are all by yourself. Parents will love you always but you don't share everything with them. And they aren't mindreaders, either. Hence, you are all by yourself. Forever is a myth? No! Forever is true but only and only with yourself. Yes, you are forever going to be with yourself. Don't ever depend on anyone. People lend you shoulders to cry on. They will wipe away your tears. But that's not forever. You have hands. Flex them up and wipe off your tears. Remember, God helps them who help themselves. Don't wait for anyone to come and understand you. Don't look around for shoulders to cry upon. Don't find ways to blame the situation. Just look up, Heads up, Nose pointing striaght, And say "I am around.. for myself."

It was 11th of June 2020, Thursday. The worst day of my life. I lost my papa on this day. Almost a week now that my Papa left us. It's been a whirlwind of every emotion. Experiencing a loss like this is hard to describe accurately, and every person who has gone through this has a different experience and situation. I want to cry out loud but I am not crying. Holding on those tears to display I am strong which I am not. My papa was my strength and I was truly a Papa ki Pari. 2017 was a hectic year. My papa started having tobacco because he had instant relief in stress. Me and my brother constantly nag to stop it and my papa as always did what we wanted. In early 2019, he had an oral ulcer. Initially he ignored and then it was diagnosed *Last stage of Cancer*. It had spread to many organs. We opted for Ayurvedic treatment and things were getting better. But all of sudden,the track changed and we lost him within 12 hours of suffering. My Papa's hemoglobin level was little low and we admitted him just for a unit of blood. He was completely good after it. We were preparing to bring him back to home. At 8 in the morning, I went to see him and saw how fast he is breathing. I called my mother and brother to come to hospital immediately. He was conscious and even talking to us. But the condition got worse and we had to put him in ventilator. By evening the doctor gave up and said if you want you can take him home. We came home along with papa around 7 PM. He asked for water and said he is hungry. He then had milk shake - Papa's all time favourite. At 8 in the evening, we saw him taking his last breath. Papa took his last breath so peacefully and we lost him. The thought that I can never see,hear or feel you again makes me cry every second,Papa. I miss you Papa. Someday, You'll be proud of us. I promise. You were a pure soul. I hope you are Resting in Peace. I love you Papa #saynototobacco #oralcancerawareness

14th feb 2019 was one of the worst days in Indian history, some millitants attacked on the CRPF battalion movement, around 50+ are dead and many are injured. This was such a heart wrenching moment. Nearly 50 Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) personnel were killed and many others injured when terrorists targeted a convoy with a car bomb at Awantipora in Jammu and Kashmir's Pulwama district today, in what is the worst attack ever on security personnel in the state. The injured have been moved to the army base hospital in Srinagar, 20 km from the attack site. Pakistan-based terrorist group Jaish-e-Mohammed has claimed responsibility for the attack. Condemning the attack, the government in a strongly-worded statement, demanded that "Pakistan stopped supporting terrorists and terror groups operating from their territory." The centre also appealed to the "international community to support the proposal to list terrorists, including Jaish-e-Mohammed Chief Masood Azhar, as a designated terrorist under the 1267 Sanctions Committee of the UN Security Council." I am writing my heart out here.

Have you ever wondered that what after you die? You know there's our planet earth and you got a life to live here, But what after that. There's nothing. You are nothing. You won't be given another chance of experiencing this life. You will go away. There won't be anything, any of these things. You are nothing actually. You are just lucky you got a life to live and experience different aspects of it richness, poverty, love, cheating, success, failure, bad times, good times etc. After this life, there's absolutely no way you could get a chance to feel all these things. You aren't coming back on earth. This is just one chance you got. I mean i just wonder sometimes when i am sitting on terrace at night looking at the sky, that what exactly are we, what exactly is this universe or for that matter entire structure out there. Who designed it? Is there really some force up there who designed it or just things happened on their own? What if these things weren't there the moons, the stars, the planets, the universe, what would have been there? I get creeped out just by thinking all these stuff!

I'm 25 yr old girl.. I'm a working woman where it started from 8 and ends at 5 PM…I'm unmarried… This is all about me..when Im born I was underweight(only at that time) afterwards my mother and my aunty treats me with food…so I've grown up as a chubby kid.. Till my bsc I never worried abt my weight… About my weight.. I'm a short girl.. When I was in 8th std I weighed about 58 kgs…when I reached 9 std I stopped going to sports since I want to study(I'm a hockey player).. Then I reached 72 kgs… after that in my bsc 3rd I reached 86 kgs.. There I started feeling miserable…I studied in girls school and college…I never bothered about my appearance… I used to say that I love the way I look…because I'm just like my mother.. I'm very proud about it.. In my 3rd yr I started dieting so 3 KGS down In a month… then I joined one yr course…I got depressed in that yr due to some family issues… I started being a emotional eater… whatever the mood I may be I started eating…then I reached maximum of 90kgs weight… after I knew this I started dieting again…this time I was serious about my goal…so I lost 10kgs in 7 months… Then I started working… there I gained 6 KGS back…. As I reached 86 KGS again I started dieting…so I lost 11 KGS and I reached 75 kgs.. All started appreciating me… from many I received compliments….i was very happy in that time. 2018 my weight gain started…now I reached again 86.5 kgs…I'm depressed and felt alone…I am not able to diet.. Even if I'm trying it ends with weight again…I didn't like me…I m feeling bad…I'm not able to say this to my parents…Already they are feeling miserable due to me…the mood swings of mine…everyday I'm crying…seeing all those weight loss diets…I'm not happy…I want my happiness back…I don't have any pcos or thyroid problem…don't judge me please…

I want to write this because I want to express my frustration and get back to business. Let's begin. Flashback Oct 2015: I was a 13 year old boy, an aspiring Cricketer in Ahmednagar, Maharashtra. I was a little overweight, I went to one of the best cricket academies of Ahmednagar, probably even Maharashtra because Anupam Sanklecha, the pacer from Maharashtra Ranji Trophy team, was from our academy. There was U14 district level selection, I performed very poorly, yes because of my overweight, I wasn't even smart enough to do something about my weight. I was scolded by my coach many times. Even my mother was suffering from diabetes and father was overweight, so we consulted a dietician in Pune. She gave us a nice diet, and I sincerely followed it for 1 month, and I was progressing well. I lost many kgs, I could even run 8km. And even I was appreciated by my coach in front of whole academy for my progress. Then came 25th Jan, the worst turning point of my life. My father was introduced to a IIT JEE foundation coaching class by his trusted friend, whose daughter went to the class. She is a clever girl. I resisted, because I already had a bad experience with coaching classes. I told him, we wait for a year, then we'll decide what to do. He forced me to give the entrance test, which I gave, and as you all know, how badly I may score, I will get selected, after all who will pay their fees. I grew overweight again, and the most haunting part, I developed ‘man-boobs’. And I was teased in my school as “doodh wala"due to this. Now one of my friends let's call him HP, not Hardik Pandya, but that's his nickname, as he too is flashy like him and also he's a pace bowling all rounder, who was in my school, was also in my Cricket Academy. He was my childhood friends, we went to the same nursery, same school. But he betrayed me. He told all my academy mates to tease me “doodh wala”. I was constantly teased, and I was finished from inside. Now I understood, how a woman felt if she has been raped, here I am a male and have just been teased. I was finished from inside, my love for cricket too was over. 9th and 10th were the worst phase of my life. I lost both my grandfathers. And my friend, well, he became one of the office leaders of the school and scored 90.2% in 10th. I scored 84.2%. Nonetheless, somehow, I managed to get myself to play Cricket back. Now I'm in Bakliwal Tutorials, Pune and every morning I go to Cricket practice in Nehru Stadium Pune. My father has also become smart enough to understand me, he doesn't force anything, but doesn't mean he is lenient on me. But he has become more understanding person. And about my friend, well, Karma hits you back definitely. You sow good, you reap good. You sow bad, you reap bad. In September 2018, he posted something maligning about my another friend, who also happens to be an aspiring Cricketer, on the 'Ask me something’ filter on Instagram, where he himself asked that derogatory question and when he was questioned about he refused to answer who asked that question. And then he was ostracized by our whole friend circle. Now if he hadn't done that thing 2 years ago, I would have definitely made it big in Cricket. Anyways I have expressed my frustration, and now I'm ready to make it big, bigger and better. Jai Shree Ram Jai Giridhar.

I am honestly tired. Really damn tired. I just moved to Switzerland 3 weeks ago to start my job as an au pair in a guest family. Things are great here. The location isn't ideal for me, since I prefer big cities over small towns and villages but it is better than nothing. But this isn't what makes me tired. What makes me tired is that my head cannot cope with living around people who treat me like a human being. I am suddenly allowed to have feelings? I am allowed to be sick? To make my own decisions? To buy a little more expensive food because it is healthier? To say yes or no to an activity? To spend time in my room alone when I don't feel like talking to people? I deserve respect? I am 24 years old. This is the first time in my life where I do not get screamed at, insulted and guilt-tripped 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. My psychologist recognised that the non-stop abuse and neglect that I suffered through my family made me a sociopath. All the traits for ASPD are there. They did never treat me like a human being and blamed my ‘autism’ (which I don't have, I was wrongfully diagnosed by an unexperienced psychologist when I was 2 years old) for developing other mental health stuff. I have massive anger issues. I cannot trust people at all, everyone is untrustworthy by default until proven otherwise. I don't experience fear, sadness, anxiety, guilt and other feelings anymore. I grew so numb to the point of being willfully ignorant about everything around me. Nothing can crush me anymore because my parents absolutely destroyed every emotional and vulnerable part of me in the past 24 years. I don't get stressed over the fact that for my age I have a big debt to pay off, with no income until I got lucky with this job. I don't have a plan for the future because every time I tried it, my parents absolutely ruined it for me. Forced me to pay for my education on my own, again, with no income. I legit cannot afford university despite having the right high school degree for it because they refuse to support me. Germany doesn't give a flying fuck about disabled and mentally ill people so I am fucked there anyway. I spent the past 7 years running from office to office, trying to figure out what to do after I graduate. Nothing happened. I don't get a job in my home country because nobody wants to hire people like me. So I am in Switzerland now. My guest family asked me what I want to do after this. I said I don't know. All my life it had been proven to me that everything I plan will be fucked over by either the government or my absolute shitty excuse of parents to the point that I physically cannot care anymore about my plans that go beyond tomorrow. I just wing it, every day is just another fight to stay afloat. I have another 200 € bill to pay off. Oh, and another one. I honestly lost track because I have more bills that I cannot opt out of with no income that I just stopped caring about them, stacking up more debt. My Christmas money (my parents try to buy my love and affection with money) into paying off debt. I have nothing left of it. I am tired because now that I am allowed to feel, I don't know how to anymore. My feelings died along the way of trying to survive. My empathy has been long gone. Being treated with empathy now is so surreal to me that I get irritated. I don't know what to do now. Because suddenly I am offered to have a life. But I lost the ability to care. I don't know what to do. The past nights I had severe insomnia because this is overwhelming. Being treated like a human being must feel great. Especially when you're treated like that from the start. I'm so numb to the point of only subtly experiencing exhaustion. I wondered why I am so damn tired. Well, I don't know how to adapt to people like this. I have only known darkness for my whole life. I don't know how to adjust to light. I wish I could cry and be sad about it but I am unable to. Being surrounded by emotional people who have empathy and actually care and are supportive just makes me realise how far away I am from that. I have to form a new mask. I wonder how it should look like.

8Iam a 20 year girl now but when i was in my teens i had this disease called alopecia areata (in which hair starts to fall in patches). And because of this disease I suffered a lot in my school and even in my family. Even if i dont want to remember those days yet i remember how children made fun of me. Intially when the patches were less there was no problem but as i became almost bald i had to wear a wig and that was the worst phase of my life. I was kind of depressed at that time. But i was in 10th standard at that time and i scored only 64 percent marks (which i regret now because we should not let other things effect another). One thing that did good to me during this was that i became habitual of being alone and i found a new side of me. I dont know when this lonliness turned into solitude and it had a positive effect on me. I became more creative and started reading and i ended up writing a poem about life.(based on those experiences) Today i feel happy that all this happened to me because it made me a better and mature person. So i think we should not be regretful for what happened with us feel happy that life gave you such an experience after all these experiences make us a better and strong person.SMILE

I just got out of my first relationship. (well it’s been a month now) I’m 18, I know i’m young and life is still ahead of me but this breakup has literally broke me. He did it over text, after ghosting me for a day, after looking me in the eye the day before saying that we’re okay and that we will be fine. He kissed me, put this hand on my heart then broke it 24 hours later. I failed my first class of uni cause I can’t stop myself from being sad. It’s been a month since the breakup. It hurts, I’m scared Ill feel like this forever. I don’t wanna be sad anymore. I tried blocking him on social media today but then i added him back, texted him that i miss him, and got no reply. we dated for six months, he was my first kiss, my first everything. I want to move on but i also don’t? i always had hope he’d come back and apologize, but he hasn’t even texted me once since the breakup. I miss him, he doesn’t miss me. I feel like a broken record crying about him to all my friends. As a kid, I was very intelligent, I was a fast learner. Me and my brother were in the same school, we use to go together. Everything seemed fine to our eyes, our mother used to prepare breakfast, lunch, dinner. She was fine or we thought she was. Late night, we use to hear their loud noise, their arguments, screams and sometimes things use to break. We never dared to come out from our blankets and see what is going on. Morning, she use to cook for us, pack our stuff and go to her job. That was our ritual. One fine day, we were coming back from school, our school bus use to drop us a little far, we saw crowd has gathered around our house, we ran to have a closer look; it was them, fighting outside in front of colony people, our friends were there too with whom we use to play. It became a habit to watch them fight, argue on small things and I didn’t know how to stop them. I have seen blood, I have seen her crying and him too. I started writing slowly in class, my attention got diverted. I started scoring low marks and they called my parents for meetings which they never attended. I felt like no one cared about me, I use to sit around the corner and cry. My brother was very young to understand anything. I started getting bad dreams about them fighting. I wanted to run away from them, from all those noises. I tried to attempt suicide as well but was not coward enough to leave my mother and brother alone. It was hàrd, I didn't know I will survive. It was a never-ending fight, we got separated from him but he use to follow us, he use to come and meet us at school premises. There was a time when we had nothing to eat for days and our mother asked people to help. She was earning but all her money went to pay the house loan, school and tuition fees. My father never supported us, now he is initiating but I want him to know that it is too late. I scored less, very less in my 12th board, it was near 50%, I passed but people taunted me to be a below average student. They said I will never succeed. They were right, I will never reach where they want me to but I will where I belong. I love my parents and I will be with them forever, no matter how much struggle we all have faced. My father is an alcohol addict, he is not a bad person but he never did a good thing as well. My childhood is long gone, I am alone when it comes to school friends and college friends. I never befriended anyone except one or two because I was afraid to tell them the truth, I was afraid that people will judge my parents, and me. But now I have accepted that life gives us lemon and we have to make lemonade, ourself. My story is very long, this is just a glimpse of it. I never compare my struggles with others because I know what they have survived or are surviving is very different from my situation.  Edit: Many people are getting confused that I am still there, listening to others. No, I am not and I never did. I didn't listen to them even after getting low marks, I moved forward, took admission and completed my engineering. I was always so keen to learn, to express my thoughts, and here I am working as a Technical Writer with a decent package which a Fresher should get. One Important thing, which matters a lot to me is My mother's happiness and she is very happy.  “I have come this far not just to come this far”  ~Aayushi

Hi, I 14 years old. My parents split up when I was 6 and thought it was my fault until I was about 10. My dad remarried and I don’t get along with anyone at his house. I have felt like I don’t belong there because I act differently than everyone else and I have brown eyes and they all have blue. Meanwhile, I have always gotten along greatly with my mother. I have to miss school to go to court every month. I have depression and have been putting a smile on my face since I was in 7th grade m, so for about 2 and a half years. But right now, I’m tired of it. I don’t want to live. I want to die but I don’t want it to be my fault. In the beginning of freshmen year of high school, I got into a car crash and got a concussion from it. I didn’t care. Ever since I recovered, I have been numb to any and all emotions. During the car crash, I was hoping I would die. I was thinking that that moment would be the last one I’d ever have. Unfortunately, I didn’t die (obviously) and am still thinking of many ways I could use or do to kill myself without anyone suspecting it could be me. Thank you for taking your time to read this.

Not-so-dear mortals, I’m sure you won’t be happy hearing from me. And trust me, I am not happy writing to you, or anyone else for that matter, either. After all, what can be happy about ruling the land of dead souls? And as if my unhappy job wasn’t enough, you hate me too. For what? For doing a job that chose me, and not the other way around. There I was, a simple mortal, just like you living a simple life until I didn’t. It was just my luck to be the first ever soul that left a body and by precedence, the duty of ruling the dead fell upon my shoulders, not knowing that one day you all would be hating me!  If I had Twitter, I am sure one of you might have started a hashtag to ‘cancel’ me by now. And why wouldn’t you? For your ignorant minds, anything or anyone associated with My Home is a bad omen, and sadly, that is where I live. And just FYI, I am merely the ruler of the dead; and not the one deciding who lives and who dies. So please, stop trying to bribe me into not picking you. I am NOT the one doing the selection! Which brings me to my other pet peeve – why don’t you hate the ones who selected you to die in the first place? Be reminded that you make your own places in heaven or hell; I merely provide the ride like an Uber driver. I am simply doing my job, controlling spirits and demons, and frankly, I believe I deserve some gratitude because it is you who are afraid of them. I don’t understand how other Gods and Goddesses, who have negative roles too, are so loved. Why am I the only one discriminated against, pray tell!  I can go on and on but I only wish to jog your memory into remembering that all Gods are equally responsible for all the problems faced by mankind and all of them are equally responsible for solving them. And if “silly you” still blames me, I can understand; you are a human, after all. Yours lovingly *scoffs* Yamaraja  🌻

I'm not going anonymous because how I see it it's not going to get better unless I tell how I'm feeling. My husband died 12/14/17 from end stage liver failure due to alcoholism. I'm afaid of how much he helped me deal with my depression. Now I'm a single mom I don't have anyone to talk to, because I've shut myself in so it wouldn't hurt so much. I'm on antidepressants and think they might actually be helping me. I let my house become an unorganized disaster. My entire bedroom floor was covered with laundry that needed done. My kitchen was a mess and I knew it was but I just couldn't get up to clean anything because I was convinced my husbands family would've offered to help me out with the whole situation. I finally have gotten all the laundry put together and washing it. My living room isn't filled with empty fast food containers anymore. The kitchen is my next step I feel like a failure to my children mommy just got lost for a little bit but she's making her way back. I know that just keeping it all in so you don't show you're weak, just makes it even worse. I've talked to my girls and have let them know I love them very much so much I didn't want them to see me hurting. I would sit in shower and just cry for like 20 minutes convincing myself it was best to just not show it. My girls are hurting too they lost their freaking dad to something so simple. I've taken them to a therapist, and I see one myself. The girls know that I'm not going to be super mom for a while but that's okay.
