Professionally I'm right where i want to be, but personally my life is fucked up. My parents fight like crazy after 26 years of marriage. They've never fought like this before, if you have shitty relatives you cannot have peace of mind. And the other thing that bothers me the most is this guy. To start from the start, this was 2years ago we met on tinder (please dont judge), and we hit it off we started seeing each other, from the first date i told him that I'll be looking for something meaningful out of this encounter and not what usually tinder is used for. He had similar thoughts and i was Happy about that, but after a few months of dating he said I don't think we have a future together as our castes are different, my parents will never agree, I spoke to them and they are not ready for this kind of relationship. I was heartbroken but like a strong woman i let the man go not begging him to do this to me… Things were getting back on track life was good. But when god has decided to fuck up ur life this happens- While we were dating i had referred him to my company for job, i didnt think he would join the company, he gave the interview and cleared it in my company, we had spoken during that process a few times formally as frnds and i was like do what suits you and all he ended up joining my company.. initially I behaved like an ass for obvious reasons, mostly my behavior included avoiding him and talking a lot less than i should with a normal collegue. But eventually i gave in and thought lets forget the past, we can be friends. But then i come to know he joined the company because he regretted letting me go, and not giving our relationship enough time and taking things for granted and also he had convinced his parents by then for me.. I didnt believe him, he kept convincing me for 6–7months until he gave in, the reason i was not ready to say yes was i was afraid that he will leave again and i couldn't trust him again after the first time… so i never took him Seriously and in the mean time i started seeing this another guy lets call him Mr.B. But at this point both the guys were aware about this whole situation. I didnt wana lie to anyone about what was going on… but after 6–7months of his convincing, i think i was softening up for him and i was regretting dating mr.B. It had just been a lil over a month i decided that i wana break up with Mr.B and give another chance to the first guy.{I started pulling back but hadn't broken up yet as i was still confused} By this time he had resigned from our company and had started searching for another job which he got and now his last day was approching. I burried my feelings and said nothing, he left the company.I went on a trip to take my mind of this whole shitty situation i had put myself in. During the trip I don't know what changed but i got the clarity, I decided that i am going to breakup with Mr.B and give this first guy another chance as somewhere deep inside i had burried my feelings for him.. and i still felt for him.. I come back from my trip i breakup with Mr.B and i tell this first guy everything and ask, was he still willing to date me and that i would understand that after 7months of pursuing if he had given up on me, I would be ok with that too. But he hadn't given up and he was happy that i realised and came back to him. After that things were so perfect, we both gave each other more than 100 percent there was so much love as we both knew the value of losing each other. We hardly fought and when we did we resolved it like adults..and there wud be more love after a bad episode… after a few months i tell him that my parents are searching for guys to get me married, my mom already knew we are dating. he said he would talk to his parents about it. And bam thats when things come crashing down… Same old situation, but this time i had confidence that he would support our relationship and fight for me, and convince his parents, i couldn't understand he had said, that his parents were convinced why were they saying no again, same caste issue same reasons.. but i still had faith bcz he said he would fight for us, he had met my mom.too and told her he'll talk to his parents this went on for couple of months. To come to the end, he tells me we can't get married, because he thinks he'll manage to convince his parents even if the caste is not same and our patrika doesn't match… but the real thing is he was never ready to get married, he wants to get a PR and move to australia and all his friends had convinced him that if you get married that will not happen. I tried to make him understand, that i am a career oriented woman too and you know ill always support you in anything and we both can do that together, but no he just ghosted on me and left.  Ive tried everything, but these 2months after him leaving me have been so bad along with the family drama, ive felt so alone and cheated on, i didn't deserve this. He had left me the first time why did he have to come the second time fuck me up all over again, by emotionally manipulating me and then eventually leaving me.It has only left me questioning every feeling he had for me.Everything seems like a lie to me. But im a strong woman and ive picked up the pieces and walked out of this, but ill never be able to get over the fact that he left me like i meant nothing to him, and here i kept thinking that he was the one for me.  Edit 1 : To ans the question if i spoke to his family during this period - i only spoke to his mom on the phone when, he was trying to convince them the second time she said that his father is saying no because of the caste and that she didn't have any problem. Now to this date i keep feeling someone was lying here, and in the end the guy also told me that his parents said yes, but his relatives didnt, and his parents were like you should talk to the relatives first and not tell them that we've said yes. And if they say yes ask the relatives to come talk to us and then we will say yes, that way our family wont look like we are all going against ppl because of caste difference. This whole thing sounded so fishy to me, but i was stupidly in love then, and i let this drama go on for too long… im going to stick to never let a person into your life the second time again…!!

I saw her first time during domain allocation in IBM, Bangalore. National level table tennis player and a really good singer as well. I was totally impressed by her simplicity and engaging looks. But when I saw something like sindoor on her forehead, I was like shit man.. missed it. We started to have casual talks. Once I asked her, when did you get married? She responded that she isn't married. This is the tradition in their family to apply the sindoor. Got huge relief and inner me was so happy. She caught that happiness through my eyes, but didn't say anything. One night, I was getting bored. Called her. Came to know that she was returned from somewhere and was tired. Asked her if we could meet. She agreed. I never felt so nervous while talking to any girl. I still remember stammering in my words while talking to her because of nervousness. Our first meet outside office (Near her PG) and I messed up with it. Man I couldn't even look at her properly while talking because I was blushing and I didn't want to let her notice this. But she was too sharp and calm. Got to know her nature closely on that night. Things were casual. We used to text each other. Shared office life (as we were working on different technologies). I was so happy to have her in my life. Thought life has given me a really big gift. One fine day, during free time she was playing table tennis with her friend. I thought to join and impress her through the game. But she was far better than me. I lost. But there was not even a single emotion/expression on her face that how great she is and she won against me. Came to know about her best friend (entry of obstacle). They were close since first year of their engineering. Actually there was a trio. Two girls and one guy. Best friends. Another girl got in relationship with this guy. But somewhere I felt that my girl was in love with her best friend. But she never expressed because she might cared for friendship. She had a clue that I was crazy for her. But I never expressed directly. Fast forward to her birthday.. Nov 2017… I'm not so good in remembering names and b'days of people. We used to work in night shifts in same office. I was on sick leave for two days. casually texted her around 11:50 pm. Me : Hi.. She :Hi.. where are you? Me : PG She : What are you doing at PG? Me : Nothing. Just TP (so dumb of me) Then I saw status of one of our mutual friend on WhatsApp for her birthday. I considered myself so stupid on that moment. Called her. Wished her. She was with her college friends for bday celebration outside office. Btw she was so famous in her college and has huge friend circle. May be because of her sweet nature. I decided to make her birthday bit special. Bought cake. Reached office late due to this. Called her office friends. Celebrated her bday. I was pleased to see smile on her face. And proud too because I could make it. Her earrings and outfits was stunning on that day. I wanted to hug her and tell her that she meant a lot to me. Jan 2018.. I confessed my love to her through WhatsApp. I had no plans of doing it but suddenly I couldn't resist myself. She denied. (As she is from a Bramhin Kannadiga family and I'm Maratha.) According to her, her family would never accept this. But I personally think this was not true reason. I think she never considered me liable for her. In terms of looks, lifestyle, thinking, nature. Even I accept that I'm not liable for her because she is so beautiful and I'm no where around it. After my confession, she started to maintain distance with me. Formal replys for my texts. One night in office we had fight. Don't know who was wrong, but there I lost her. I said to her, “ I'm going to throw you out of my life.” I said it out of anger. But she did it. Threw me out of her life. Since then, for 9–10 months I apologized her so much. Called her. She didn't respond. Blocked me everywhere. Once in office i approached her and tried to apologise. She denied in insulting way. I was totally shattered and broken without her. 2nd Nov 2018.. I called her to wish on her b'day. Texted. After 10 months she talked to me. Just said “Thank You”. I asked if we can give a new start for our friendship. Didn't get response for that. 9th Nov 2018.. Received a mail notification. I was copied (Bcc) in her signing off mail. Her last day in office. I got a big shock. It was feeling that someone has snatched my everything from me. I called her, this time she received the call. Informed that she is returning to her hometown. She was busy on that moment so asked me to call at night. I did. But she didn't respond. I called/texted, but got no response. My happiness lies in her, I couldn't make this realize to her. Because of my attitude I lost her. She still thinks I'm a random guy who is stalking her and doing tp. Few wise words.. Be so much capable in terms of looks, physique and career that there shouldn't be any reason for rejection.Respect girls. I'm changed person from that incident but of no use. I lost her.If you feel that there is some body made for you, then never let her/him go.No matter we would meet in life or not, but she would remain as most special girl for me. Thanks for reading.. !!

Hi everyone ! I hope all of you are doing good:) I want to pour out me heart and all my emotions here today because I am tired and sick of everything going around me. Basically, my life is legit fucked up! I’m a 17 year old South Indian girl. The pressure of 12th Boards in March and JEE Mains in January is getting on my nerves. You might call it pretty normal to have such feelings at this point of time but this is not I am bothered about.What I am afraid of is how I’m going to pay back my parents for everything they have done for me. This year is a very crucial phase in my life. My mom stopped me from going to school in 8th since i got 89.7% and not 90% but my dad convinced her. I had disappointed my parents and all my teachers in 10th boards by getting just 93.33% Then I got into a well reputed college and my parents have spent 4 lakhs in these 2 years. My scores were PATHETIC in 11th (just touched 80%) and my scores in JEE mock tests at college hardly crossed 130/360. During the first PTI in 11th, the principal told my mom that I wasn’t even meant for a local engineering college in front of the entire class and in the list of people who he has decided he would kick out if the performance is bad. She was in tears and she told me that she would never ever come with me to college hereafter. I felt so ashamed of myself. (In my school days, I was a true procrastinator, very chilled and laid back girl, never thought about future and career but stilled efficient enough to get my name in the toppers list.) This college atmosphere was completely new for me where one should be a total bookworm and Einstein and Newton and ‘regular in studies’ ! After that incident with my mom, I worked really hard but always hovered around 100 marks. With all these scores, I heard only these words everyday: YOU ARE USELESS! ALWAYS BEEN SUCH A PAIN, A SHAME FOR US! HAVE YOU EVER MADE US PROUD?!? INSTEAD OF LIVING SUCH A LIFE GO DIE! WE WILL BE REALLY HAPPY!!! I tried my best to ignore all possible specimen of distractions: stopped going for movies, minimized the time I spent on phone and tv, rejected the proposals from the most hottest and cutest boys and JUST STUDIED. Well nothing really turned out great and I flunked again. At the beginning of 12th I answered another exam on the basis of which the principal will decide is he would let me continue or not. When my parents heard this, I got beaten up by almost all the accessories at home and insults in each and every sentence. Those 7 days of my life were worst than hell. Everyone in the college knew for sure that i would clear that exam and believed me except my parents, and I did clear it with a good score. In my 1st formative I scored 95% but still my mom never came to collect my report card. My mom is sick now and my dad’s business is picking up pace after 4 years. I got the marks of 2nd formative in which i haven’t performed up to mark ( just 92%). I cried a lot at college today. I don’t have the courage to tell my marks to my mom. By now I assume that most of you must have pictured my parents as villains. But trust me they are not, I am really lucky to have them. Frankly speaking, I have failed to be a good daughter, sister, student……. They have always wanted the best for me and given me the best even if its beyond their level. To a lot of extent what they say is true, MARKS is all that matters in this stage of life at least, their are almost like a trade mark or a brand. They changed a lot and have always been encouraging me that i would surely get into an IIT but i know that its beyond my level and they never understand that. I don’t want to get into a private college because the fees id really high, money is never a matter for them but i don’t want to be a burden on them anymore. I am really freaked out thinking about my future. Although I can’t get into an IIT, I can surely get into a good NIT (my score has improved to 150/360 now). I am scared that I wouldn’t be able to make them happy and proud even this time, I don’t want to fail as a daughter again! These thoughts haunt me everyday. My dad doesn’t treat my mom very well neither did her parents, but to the world he is a sweetheart and my mom is a villain. She is a homemaker and has no one to go to. She always tells me that I should study well, get a good job, earn very well and be Independent, never depend on my husband just like the way she is doing now. When I was young, I did not like her much because she always scolds me and hits me even for a very small mistake and my dad used to take my side always. Now that i have grown up, i can understand her. I have been really harsh towards her but now I really Love her. I don’t want to break the trust and hopes she has on me now. She is the only soul who understands me. How much ever she scolds and hits me, she has bought me everything I wanted without telling my dad, has let me do whatever i want but it was me who has always misunderstood her. I Love You Amma! I will make sure that I make I will make you proud amma. I feel much better now. My heart feels light now. Thank you very much for taking your time to read my post. This is the first time i am writing on quora. Do excuse my grammatical errors. I hope I get the guts to tell my marks to her and I pray to God that that she gets well soon by then and understands my situation:)

I'm going to share a story written by my best friend. She is a survivor, she wrote her own life in the form of a short story. Each and everything written below happened in her life. She beautifully converted it in the form of a story. Please read and share your views. THE BROKEN WING: MENDED She was a girl, who had dreams, lot of dreams. When talking about her dreams, past tense suits the best. A girl with lot of love and passion. And that was very clear in her bright charming kajal defined eyes. Very talkative and a fun girl she was. Mostly like a butterfly giving and spreading joy. There were hardly anyone who hated her. Everyone thought, only the best will come for her. Everyone assured the same, throughout. Rest of the story reveals the truth though.. She was very romantic and a delicate girl. Like every other girl in twenties, she too dreamed a lot about her prince charming. She dreamed of long walks in the beach holding hands and watching sun kiss the beautiful ocean. She dreamed of never ending talks deep enough to understand each other's soul. She dreamed of never ending kisses till the last wick of the last candle submerged in that paraffin liquid. She dreamt of a family who considers her as their own daughter and not as the wife of their son. She dreamt of kids, a lot of them running around in their garden. Her dreams were never ending and they were never chained. When at last he came, that turned out to be a prince of disaster. She never realised that, coz she was busy loving him for what he was. But nothing was good enough for him. He took away all that she had from her. Her charm, her smile, her love, her nonstop talks,her beauty and everything that was hers, was taken away by that man who was wicked and cunning.He tortured her for nothing but his pleasure. Her cries and her pain made him more happy than her smile.Every inch of her body was tortured for his physical and sexual pleasure leaving her with blood and stains.. She never complained to anyone. She was still not able to remember hurting even an ant for pleasure. And still she was questioning her self, what has she done to go through all this pain. She still stayed as his loyal dog not telling about her plight to anyone. Everyone thought that she lived 'happily ever after', after her marriage. She too never thought that, happily ever after was just a myth. But her life proved that there was no happily ever after. Three months was all that she could bear him. But she and everyone else who knows her story now, know it very well that, even though it was just 3 months in calendar, it was a whole 30 year trial that she has gone through with him. She kept mum for everything except one thing. It happened when she got pregnant with her first kid from him. When he got to know that she was pregnant, he asked her to give him money for paying off his debts with one of his so called business partner, with whom he occasionally sleeps. She never was left with anymore money, as everything was looted by him and his family. When he realised that she don't have anymore money, he told her to kill their kid and demanded divorce. That came as a shock for her. She never could understand how he could ever tell something like that about their first kid. It’s then she realized, it's high time she tell her parents. Then she told the whole story to her parents from the start and they heard it with tears rolling down their cheeks and they promised her that, they will never ever let him touch her. Their warmth and love was the only thing that kept her going forward after that. She realized other than her dad and brother, she can trust no other man. She will have no other man in life. For her, all men are same except for two men in her life. She hated everymen. She hated love, romance, smile, kiss everything. Everything that was once dear to her became her worst nightmare ever. She never wanted a man in her life, coz of the scars her marriage has left on her. She was devastated. She was worried about her unborn baby and her failed marriage. She went into depression soon after. She ate only to keep the baby fine. She never cried in front of her parents. When with them, she strongly made them believe that she was fine. She gave them courage that she will be fine. But when she got back to her room, she cried her heart out. And spoke to her unborn baby. She loved her kid. She sang for the kid, she told stories and she told how much fun they will have in future together. She lived for the kid in her womb. But one day, when her mom came to room, she was shocked. Her bed was covered in blood and she was unconscious. She was rushed to the nearest hospital. There she was taken to labour room. And she woke up hours after and realized she lost her baby and she could never stop crying. All the pain she went through was for nothing. She lost the only thing that made her move on in life. She was more depressed than ever. She never smiled after that. Her tears also dried up. She dint cry to let out the pain. She never talked much after that. Nothing she did after that in fact. She just lived like a log. Inorder to change her from this depression, her parents made her join her forever dream, "Ph.D". The first one year, she never talked much, smiled, or laughed. She talked to all. All were her friends and she was a friend to all. But she was changing day by day after that. She was definitely a survivor, who was recovering from depression by her own, without even letting others know. Mending a broken wing will never make it the same, but still it's worth it... THE BROKEN WING: MENDED

Yes, I want to write my heart out here, bear with me, it might get confusing and a loooooong text! I’m male, 27 years old. So, last year in July I started an internship job in a media center for the youth (video & photography). At the time I started, there was also a girl (21 years) working there for a student job. We started talking about our passions (video and photo) often and became friends, not close but we had sympathy for each other. She was there 3 weeks and I would be there for 12 months. So in August she left again and I didn’t see her back (I didn’t got contact infos as I wasn’t really interested in her besides our professional relationship. So in October the girl brought her best male friend (26 years), who was a backpacker to the media center and he started an internship as well. We both became instantly good friends and hung out after work together often. As we hung out together this meant that he would bring the girl I knew already with him and so I got to befriend her stronger. The girl and the boy weren’t dating but I respected their friendship and didn’t even thought about doing a move on the girl in a romantic way. So the months went by and April 2018 something terrible happened. At that time she came back again to the media center for a month to work a student job and both her best friend and me are still on our internship. The girl and the guy went on a holiday together and when they came back the girl came to me and told me that he treated her very, very badly during their holidays. He said very terrible things to her, very selfish, arrogant things. He broke her heart and didn’t even care about it! This changed their friendship forever. She came to me in her sadness, poured her heart out and even cried in front of me. As we worked every day together we became closer (also in a romantic way). One day on lunch break, we both laid on a bench next to each other and we talked about personal stuff like background, family, past relationships. At that moment , suddenly without me realizing, I fell in love with her. My last girlfriend was 7 years ago and I haven’t felt such a strong attraction or attachment to a girl in a very long time! Now comes the confusing part. So our friend, as he is a backpacker, he lives in the media youth center which is also a hostel and offers rooms for foreign volunteers. As the girl and I live in the same region we take the same train after work. As we also spent more time after work together we became close friends, she trusted me and I trusted her. So one day after work I walked her to the bus station and we hugged for goodbye for the first time. It was a sincere and warm hug that I haven’t received in a long time (7 years without girlfriend!) At this moment we started hugging when we met in the morning in the train and in the evening for goodbye. Another confusing detail: the girl and our friend were both working on a big film project together and despite her having her heart broken by him they still spent way too much time together after work and in the weekends, they fought often over small things and decisions (he is proud, arrogant and impulsive and she is caring and wants to solve problems as fast as possible, and he doesn’t). One day they had a really, really big fight once again, that he ran away to a new female friend (which made my female friend jealous) and threatened to leave the job and continue backpacking to a foreign country. So that evening, the girl called me and wanted to meet up so that I may comfort her. When she met up she gave me a long (almost too long) warm hug that I almost melted in her arms and it just felt as time was standing still (FYI I’m 6′2″ and she is something between 5′5 and 5′7″ so it must have felt good to her too). That evening I listened to her and gave my opinion on the situation. I knew exactly what she needed to do: get as fast and as far away as possible from that emotional abusive relationship, but of course she didn’t listened and still believed in his good side and that he might change (someday). She held on to the past memories that, no doubt, have been positive. After her month at my workplace was over, we continued to text each other and I asked her out for drinks after work. At the bar I could really feel that the attraction was mutual and I noticed all the positive body language and flirting signs. After the bar we walked back to the bus station and on the way she mentioned her ex-boyfriend (for the first time) not in the sense that she missed him or anything, more like what he did wrong with her and she even stated (also in regard to our common friend) that ‘she always gets the wrong guys’. After that she also said a few times that I shouldn’t act like X (our common friend) when I didn’t want to talk about my personal problems with her. At the bus station we hugged again. After that we texted each other at least once a week. When I mentioned that I didn’t felt good since some days she wanted me to meet her at her home to talk about it but I declined as I didn’t felt like talking about it with her. Otherwise we couldn’t meet up again due to our busy schedules (she started a job at a tv station). We only met up once after that. She texted me and suggested a meet up at a park after work. As I was on my way to the park she suddenly suggested that Y should join us and he did. I felt miserable. What sounded great at first turned into a shitty hang out where I felt left behind and kind of betrayed by her. We sat in a public park and only after he left we both talked together. Again she insisted on talking about my problem (which in retrospective was kind of a mix of depression/after love depression/anxiety/loneliness but how the f*ck should I have told her that I love her and it’s because of my feelings and emotions that I’m feeling this way?) and mentioned that I really shouldn’t act like her best male friend and talk about problems instead of keeping it inside me and she invited me to go with her to her video job in the evening. I declined again and went home. Again we hugged for goodbye which might have driven me deeper into loneliness. We didn’t talk or text afterwards and only recently we hung out again (as part of a group hang out). Yesterday she texted me to ask for a hang out after work again. She also invited another common friend but (fortunately for me) he wasn’t available, so we spent a good 3 hours together, only the both of us. You can’t even imagine how good that felt to finally spend time alone with her. I hate hanging out with her in a group setting. She always seems to ignore me more or less (I’m rather shy and quiet, though). We visited the old part of the city as she wanted to show me a very beautiful spot of the city but access was closed down for some reason so we agreed to come back together when it is open again. The rest of the evening we spent in the local skatepark on a bench where we talked about personal stuff (cameras, my old hobby skateboarding, family, a documentary she watched recently, childhood and so on…). The light was really beautiful that evening as the sun went down. Later I helped her with her studying for her upcoming exams about camera stuff and photography (so I actually could help her haha). We walked back to the bus station and hugged for goodbye. And for the first time in some weeks I felt really, really happy again. I would really want to date her so that I can spent more time with her, hug her, hold her hand, kiss her (all that relationship jazz) but she is just to focused on the past and the memories with her best male friend that she doesn’t focus on building and strengthening OUR relationship. This guy will only hurt her over and over again and this makes me feel really sad because I can’t really help her (as she won’t really listen to me in that regard). As I’m a poem writer besides photography and videography I wrote a poem that suited the situation as I wrote it in April after she told me about what happened in her holiday, and it helped me deal with the situation she told me about. She liked the poem very much (and understood the deeper meaning of it) and for the first she seemed as if she understood what she needed to do. Thank you for reading this long ass text and if you have any suggestion of what I should do next, or shouldn’t do next, please let me know. THANK YOU FOR READING AND GIVING ME THE SPACE TO WRITE THIS DOWN!

I often think about people. The ones that could never relate themselves as the lead characters of a story with ‘Love at the first sight.’ People who could live through their lives craving for someone, but it would never be as easy for them, as just smiling and noticing someone. By that, I don’t mean average people or below average or a 5/10 or a 4.5/10. I mean people who don’t fall in the conventional definitions of beautiful. I mean people for whom one does not turn back for a second look. I mean people who may be spontaneous, unpredictable, charming worlds of their own. But Not Beautiful. I often think about people like me.

Well I'm a girl from a small town in bihar aged 22 I belong to extremely conservative family,here having a boyfriend is like you have no character, but as everyone knows we have no control over our hearts and I'm no exception to this I fall in love two times with extremely two different personalities,one came in my life to broke my heart whom we call first love. I gave all importance to him he was my first priority but it was all one sided for more than a year and then came a day when I have to call it off cause I found him with some other girl in a room After that it took hell lot of courage to move on from that and it took me two years to get out of that pain of unrequited love There I found this second man if my life who supported me who took me out of that dark phase and who loved me but destiny has its own way and as it is said that we fall in love with right person at wrong time His ex came back like in his life unexpectedly and he got confused and chose to leave me for her I again left alone and started doubting my existence my worth ,what did I make mistake,how can someone make you feel this special and loved and suddenly leaves you I started hating myself and out of frustration,anger and pain of rejection,I made out with a guy just cause his face resembled me of my ex and that is the biggest regret of my life It led me to depression and anxiety, I started hating myself ,even it's been an year but I feel it like yesterday I feel like insects crawling all over my body I want to ask what was my fault just loveing someone and getting dumped,where did I go wrong and why did I make out That make out with an stranger left me abrupted and depressed and I don't think I'll ever be able to come out of that pain

Starting the answer as- From a little background considered as bright student performed well in class but not in boards neither 10th nor 12th took a drop believed that i am gonna give it all and gonna show everybody what really iam ( I know a bad thought but still..) You can judge me but I know it’s not me. I too love the previous version of mine. So here’s the story start. I was in love with my classmate. She was the most beautiful girl in the class. I never got a chance to confess her in school due to my shy nature. Then after 12th, I went for IIT preparation. Sometimes In the night, I used to miss her so much that tears were coming from the eyes. Sometimes I used to scold myself that why I didn't tell her about my feelings. Time passed and I didn’t clear IIT but got a good rank in the state level college. I Got admission in the college in Delhi and till I never got a chance to talk to her. In my first year, in November or December, I saw her in FB and sent her a request. She accepted a day later. After then we started to talk day and night. I think she knew about my feeling but I never got a chance to confess her cause of my shyness nature. I still remember that In my second year, she called me her home, we talked, she said why I never asked her to come to my home, I told her about my family. We became our best friend. She told me everything about her family like Her family would never be allowed for love marriage. She too asked about my crush in which I told that she is my school crush. Even too in Diwali, Every family member in my home was decorating the house but I was talking to her. I was the only boy who visited her home. Even My friend started to tease me using her name. I was too happy. In my third year, One day a thought came in my mind, What if something happened to me or her so I decided to tell her about my feelings. But I didn't have enough courage to confess her on call So I confess her on mobile about how I feel about her and how my life changes when she came into my life. I was eagerly waiting for her reply. A reply came “We are a best friend and I don’t want to ruin our friendship and I didn't feel the same for you”. I asked about the problem with me. But then she started messaging me in like 3–4 days. I was angry with her then A week later, I met a girl, I proposed her same day and she accepted the same day. We used to talk day and night and yes, I started liking her the way she talked. A week later, one night She asked me to do phone sex. I told her that I don’t know how to do it and that night I saw her completely different. After that, we usually used to do it at night. Then a week later She told me that she had a bad habit of talking to the boys and she has 2–3 other BF. It was completely shocking for me but till I had got used to her. So I said ok but around after 3–4 months I received a message her that “You are really a good boy so I am leaving you because I can’t do it with you.” I was completely broken and I couldn't concentrate on my studies for the 2-3 week then I realized that the problem is in me and my nature. After that I about 50% changes myself. Now I am the completely new version of myself and now I see the girl in completely different ways. I am sometimes happy and sometimes really sad. Now I do not feel anything. Now I have 2 GF and I know they love me but I am with them only for sex. I tried to love them but can’t. I do not need any love, I am desperate about sex. Sometimes I am completely silent and don’t know why I started laughing suddenly. I don’t know it’s good or bad for me. But yes, Now I have time for myself. I saw a pic who completely define the stages of my life.  Thanks for listening to me.

Simple English Simple english is a joy to read and remember. It is easily understood and commited to memory. This results in an appreciation of the ideas underlying the sentence, paragraph or essay and equips the reader with new points of view. It also assists in accelerating the reading by providing an accessible piece of literature for the lay reader. The nature of language changes with the times and we are unaware of the twists and turns the structure of language has undergone in the interval lapsed. Illustrating this, I say that medieval english was markedly different from the english of the nineteenth century which is itself but a shadow of the format of modern english. Coming into the twenty first century, we witness the use of electronic devices for communication. The attention span of the consumer in this day and age is different from and perhaps shorter than the previous generations. This is specific to the field of assimilation of ideas introduced through language. English it seems has taken a nightmarish turn for the purists of this generation. Harking back to the glory days of classical english the scholars are appaled at the disintegration of the institution of complex language structure. At this point I wish to differ from the language technician. From now on, I will put forward my argument for the acceptance of simple english with certain minimum complexity required to make the language understood to the receiver. Starting at the basics I wish to define the word language accuracy and robustness. Accurate here means conforming to the undersatnding of the largest number of people, also accounting for the diversity within. The word robustly requires of the language to be able to withstand variations in its sentence, paragraph and essay structure without compromising on meaning. With our background definitions of accuracy and robustness, we start the definition of te word language. Language is defined as the part of human activity which communicates ideas and intentions between members of the group thus leading to responses which may be either competitive or co-operative. This definition requires of language the property of stimulus and for communication purposes. The response with respect to the stimulus may be positive (co-operative) or negative(competitive). The words in brackets may be re-ordered to change the response and these four scenarios complete the picture of human communication through language. Ideas are part of the personal language of an individual. These determine the intentions of any person. Moving to the receiver, if these are accurately communicated then the person may hope to receive from the other person the response as expected. However, in the case of inaccurate depiction of ideas, the response may not be deemed reasonable by the person. Here the robustness of language comes to the rescue of accuracy of thought. If language were to possess the property that its meaning remained unchanged through intentional or unintentional changes in structure upto a limit, then one could be confident of oneself in describing ones thoughts and feelings. This would remove uncertainty from the communication paradigm of human activity. The question that remains is difficult to answer but an attempt will be made. How is such a language to be constructed? There is some value which can be ascribed to the truth, which I broadly divide into two competing tendencies, the correspondence and coherence theories. Any language is an attempt at truth telling. This may be at the level of ideas, intentions or feelings or the outside environment. More generally it is the interaction of personality and environment that determines language. Thus language is used to interface with the world. Now coming to the two theories of truth, of which I hope to make a happy reunion, which is also logically valid. Correspondence theory requires that any truth be equivalent to a real world object. As an example, a door is an object used to provide a flexible structure for entry, exit and safety of a room or a house, perhaps also a building. Correspondence theory requires the word “door” to mean this structure from the real world. Coherence theory though requires only that the word “door” make sense to the receiver without recourse to corrspondence. In both these situations the nature of negation is different. In correspondence theory any entity which is not equivalent to a real world object is false. In coherence only those entities are false which are needed not coherent. By this I mean the entities which do not make sense are false. As illustration of the difference, in correspondence theory the unicorn is a falsehood because it has thus far not been seen to exist. However, in coherence theory it is a real object to anyone to whom it makes sense. As in a horse like creature with a horn on its snout. One may heave a sigh of relief in thinking that modern focus on details has made the question of combining the two possible. Let us see how. For the purposes of proof we will assume the correspondence theory as true and then assimilate the coherence theory into it. Our reasoning is based on the proof by observation criterion, in the same way as science finally gives credence to a theory. The part of the coherence theory which is to be made equivalent to a form of correspondence is from now called unicorn after the illustration. The unicorn is finally the change in electrical potential in the brain synapses and thus confroms to these structures. Hence, it is equivalent to these signals across the brain. How is one to consider the two parts, on one the unicorn and on the other the potential equal is an uninteresting question. Firstly any television converts signals of an electrical nature into metaphorical unicorns. Why does one not delve deep into the origins of this question? Precisely because we have assumed the ad hoc hypothesis of special position of humanity in the cosmos, the grand scheme of things. Now comes the technical side of the argument where the word energy has a meaning familiar in physics, the capacity to work. Entropy is the reduction in work per unit of effort applied. Since the entropy of the universe always increases by empirical testing, usable energy is always decreasing. This gives any person the evolutionary advantage if the person utilises less energy for a task under circumstances of isolation. This may be generally said to be true even in groups, for then the energy of a group is preserved if less of it is used. This of course keeps all else equal. This evolutionary advantage given by nature may be termed abstraction, the ability to remove redundant parts from any picture to read only the necessary and sufficient aspects. This is also in certain contexts intelligence. This provides an easy interpretation of association and analogy, collation and separation. This is part of the survival instinct of man given that evolution is true. Here an important word used is instinct, which is manifested as reflex and voluntary actions. One must be prepared to understand coherence in the light of the previous paragraph and terms introduced in it. We now consider the derangement problem of mathematics, wherein there are envelopes and letters none of which bears the correct address. Let us assume a fixed number of such pairs. Can they be put back into order by a switching process? Obviously they can because this is the essence of bubble sort. For each switch let there be a fixed cost incurred. Then in order for the ordering to be made an energy cost must be incurred. This will in turn contribute to the entropy reservoir and deplete the usable energy at the disposal of the group. Furthermore, the game now is between usable energy and entropy, because any reduction in the first is aggregated as entropy. Is man merely a player of this game, a part of the cosmos in frolic? This seems to be the case. Is the world is merely energy then man is a level of energy between the two sides, a door for exit and entry of energy, from the white unicorn of hope to the one of chaos. The human with the minimum cost of ordering may be considered to have a marked advantage over the other members of the group. This is a game with humans having to allocate their portions to the reservoir of entropy. However, now we have to talk about our English prospects and we will do it thoroughly. Correspondence and coherence can now be talked about on an equal footing by energy considerations. Thus we hope to see an emergence of language which is based on correspondence be it of the internal world of man, his personality, the outside sphere or any interaction thereof.
